43b5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog gi 'od kyi spras pa'i nam mkha' i rang bzhin no/ /rta rmig dang/ bar na dang/ chu srin gyi snam bu ni kha dog ji ltar mdzes par ro/ /'khor lo rnams ni gser gyi kha dog go/ kho cig rin po che gzhan las kyang byas pa'o zhes so/ /
43b6(rgyud 'grel): ri dags dang ri dags mo ni gser gyi rang bzhin te/ rin po che gzhan gyis spras pa'o/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba ni nag po'o/ /kha cig tu gtso bo'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go/ dbus gyi rwa rnams ni rang rang gi phyogs rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs
43b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mdog go /de las gzhan pa rnams ni de'i glo dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go/ rwa lnga pa la ni de las gzhan pa'i phyogs dang dbus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog ste/ ji ltar rigs par ro/ /phyogs gcig gi rwa thams cad kyang
44a1(rgyud 'grel): rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog kyang kha cig tu'o/ /'khor lo'i dbang po zhal bzhi pa nyid la rang rang gi phyogs kyi zhal gyi mdog go/ zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no/ /bum pa bzang
44a2(rgyud 'grel): po rnams ni gser las byas pa'o/ /dpag bsam gyi shing rnams ni de las gzhan pa'i shing bzang bo lta bu'o/ /pad+ma'i lte ba ni ljang gu'o/ /ge sar ni ser po'o/ /'dab ma rnams ni kha dog sna tshogs pa'o/ /de'i sa gzhi dmar po shas che ba'i dkar po'o/ /chos
44a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung gi rtsa'i re khA ni dkar po'o/ /khor yug gi phyogs la yang shel nyid yin na re khA dkar po 'am gser nyid yin na ni ser po'o/ /rdo rje rnams dang de'i re khA nag po'o/ /gzhan rnams ni dkar po 'am ser po'o/ zhes gsungs so/ /rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i mdog ni
44a4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar mdzes pa ste/ bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor la 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mdza' nas steng du 'og min gyi mdza' i bar du rdo rje'i rab gnas pa'i phyir dang rlung la sogs pa rnams ni ji ltar rigs par kha dog sna tshogs pa'i phyir ro/ 1 /'od zer rnams ni de bzhin
44a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog ste 'phro ba'i tshul lo/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje ni rdzogs sangs ye shes sku yin phyir/ /ngag dbang rdo rje'i rigs su brjod/ /chos sku'i rang bzhin dag pa la/ /'di yi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /zhes pa'i rigs pas/ dkar po ser po
44a6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu dang ni nag po nyid/ /rtsig pa'i tshon zhes gsungs so/ /gang gi tshe chos rnams rang bzhin gyis ni dkar/ /des na ngag dbang 'dir dkar nyid/ /ces gsungs pas/ gsung rdo rje dkar po gtso bor gyur pa de'i tshe ni tshon gyi re lA? dkar
44a7(rgyud 'grel): po dang ser po dang ljang gu dang/ dkar po'o/ /kha sbyor du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po nyid yin yang/ mi bskyod pa dang lhan cig ri gcig pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir/ nang gi rtsig pa nag po nyid do/ /gzhan du ni dkar po kho na yin te/ ji skad
44b1(rgyud 'grel): du/ gsung rdo rje gtso bor gyur pa kha cig tu dkar po nyid du 'gyur ba'o zhes gsungs so/ /rtsa ba'i thig gi nang gi dkyil 'khor du yang zur thig gnyis gnyis kyis bcad pa'i phyogs bzhi'i sa gzhi rnams rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go/ bsgom bya'i dkyil
44b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi'i thig rnams de bzhin no/ /ka ba rnams kyang de bzhin te/ /rang rang gi re mig gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ma'i phrod bas mtshan ma'o/ /gtso bo'i sa ni gtso bo'i mdog go/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab ma ni/ bdan bral ljang la dbang
44b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan nag/ me dang rlung gi mtshams ni ser/ phyogs rnams kyi ni dmar po'o/ /gtso bo'i snam bu la ni gtso ba'i mtshan ma'i phred? ba'o/ /re khA gzhan ni mdog dang sbom phra ji ltar mdzes pa'o/ /bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la ni thugs kyi 'khor lo nag po/
44b4(rgyud 'grel): de'i rtsibs kyi bar rnams ni dmar po ste/ gsung gi 'khor lo'i lte ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gsung gi 'khor lo dmar po'o/ /de'i rtsibs bar rnams ni dkar po ste/ /sku'i 'khor lo'i lte ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /sku'i 'khor lo ni dkar po'o/ /de'i rtsibs rnams kyi bar ni
44b5(rgyud 'grel): shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go/ mu khyud gsum ni go rims bzhin du rdo rje nag po dang/ pad+ma dmar po dang/ 'khor lo dkar ba'i phreng bas bskor ba'o/ phyi ngos nas brtsams te
44b6(rgyud 'grel): nang gi bar du ljang gu dang/ dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ ser po dang/ nag po'i kha dog gi re khA lnga'o/ /shar dang/ byang dang/ nub dang/ lho dang/ dbus kyi sa rnams dang/ thog rnams kyi kha dog dkar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ dmar po dang/ ser po dang/ nag
44b7(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /gzhan ni re khA lnga dang/ sa gzhi dang/ thog rnams nag po dang/ ljang gu dang/ dmar po dang/ ser po dang/ dkar po dang/ bsres pa'i sngon po'i mdog go zhes zer ro/ /de bzhin du snga ma dang/ phyi mar ka dog gi rim pa yongs su bsams nas rdul tshon dgye?
45a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /de yang skal ba dang mi ldan pa 'dus pa na mtshan ma dang phyag rgya ji ltar rig par bri'o/ /skal pa dang mi ldan pa med na ni/ lha'i sku bri bar bya zhing/ bris sku 'am/ lugs ma 'am/ 'dur du btong pa 'am/ legs par 'dus
45a2(rgyud 'grel): byas pa gzhag par bya'o/ /de ltar klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis ji ltar nus pas dkyil 'khor du/ sa bon dgong bya yang na ni/ /mtshan ma 'am lha'i gzugs nyid de/ /lugs ma 'am bzo byas dgod par bya/ zhes gsungs so/ /phyag rgya bri ba ni mngon par
45a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las gsungs te/ mi nus na ni bris pa yi/ /phyag rgya 'am mtshan ma dgod par bya'o/ /gang yang gsungs pa/ tshon nam yang na pir rnams kyis/ /bris pa rnams kyis rnam par spras zhes so/ /dpal kha sbyong? gyi rgyud du yang/ de ltar lugs
45a4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ 'dus byas pa la sogs pa'i gzugs dang/ mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o/ zhes gsungs so/ /de'i phyir 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la/ lte bar bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i zla ba la ral gri sngo bsangs/ /shar du zla ba la rnam
45a5(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad kyi 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa'o/ /lhor nyi ma la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rin po che ljang gu cha dgu pa'o/ /nub tu nyi ma la mgo po 'od dpag med kyi pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'o/ /byang du nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i ral gri
45a6(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu'o/ /med zla ba la spyan ma'i mig 'bras nag po can gyi mig dkar po gnyis sprin la gnas pa'o/ /bden bral du zla ba la mA ma kI'i rdo rje nag po rtse lnga pa ste/ rgyud du de ltar bshad pa'i phyir ro/ /rlung du zla ba la gos dkar mo'i pad+ma dmar po kha bye pa yu ba dang
45a7(rgyud 'grel): rtsa kha dang bcas pa'o/ /dbang ldan du zla ba la sgron ma'i utpa la mdog sngo ser ro/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi dang/ shar sgo'i g.yon dang g.yas su cha chung gnyis gnyis spangs pa'i 'gram dag tu zla ba rnams la go rim bzhin du gzugs dang sgra dang
45b1(rgyud 'grel): dri dang/ ro dang reg bya dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi me long dkar po dang/ dri za'i pi wang sngon po dang/ dri ser po'i dung dang/ ro'i snod dmar po dang/ ras sna tshogs dang/ chos 'byung dkar po'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor nyi ma rnams la gshin rje
45b2(rgyud 'grel): mthar byed dang/ shes rab mthar byed dang/ pad+ma mthar byed dang/ bgegs mthar byed kyi go rims bzhin du rdo rje tho ba nag po dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang/ pad+ma dmar po dang/ rdo rje kha gyes pa sngon po'o/ /'dir zla ba dang nyi ma bcu dgu ni
45b3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'o/ /mtshan ma thams cad ni 'od zer dang bcas pa rang rang gi phyogs su mgo bstan pa'o/ /'khor lo'i dbang phyug ni mgo nub tu bstan pa'o/ /de ltar phyi ma rnams su yang ngo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor lo'i dbang phyug nyid la ni dbus
45b4(rgyud 'grel): su chu skyes dang/ zla ba la zhi ba'i rdo rje sngon po'o/ /kha cig ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o zhes so/ /mkhas pa rnams ni dbus kyi 'od zer gyi thig zlum po la tshon gyi re khA mi bya'o zhes so/ /zlum po'i thig gi phyi ngos su tshangs pa'i thig gi glo?  so sor cha chung bzhi dong nas bum pa cha
45b5(rgyud 'grel): chung bzhi pa ste/ bdud rtsis bkang ba'i gser gyi bum pa cha brgyad do zhes phyogs gcig go/ gzhan ni rin po che'i rang bzhin rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go zhes so/ /'di dang phyi ma rnams la dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan pa'i
45b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma 'god pa na/ de'i gnas su dbus kyi mtshan ma bri bar bya'o/ /bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ dbus su nyi ma la mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje kha gyes pa rtse lnga ba in+d+ra nI la lta bu dang/ reg bya rdo rje ma'i sna tshogs pa'i gos so/ /rnam
45b7(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rim pa dang po dang gnyis par gnas pa bcu gnyis po rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no/ /rim pa gsum pa'i sgo'i 'gram gyi snam bu la tshangs pa'i thig nas cha chung bzhi dor bar g.yon du byams pa'i klu shing gi
46a1(rgyud 'grel): me tog 'khor lo dang bcas pa'o/ /g.yas su sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dkar po'o/ /lhor de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje'i dang nam mkha' snying po'i rdo rje dang/ rin po che mar gang cha dgu pa'o/ /nub tu de bzhin du 'jig rten
46a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi pad+ma dmar po dang rdo rje'o/ /byang du de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang/ kun tu bzang po'i ral gri dang rdo rje'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rim pa bzhin du gshin rje gshed la sogs pa
46a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi rdo rje tho ba dang/ rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang/ pad+ma dmar po dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams su go rims bzhin du mi g.yo ba dang/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang/ dbyug pa sngon po dang/ stobs po che rnams kyi
46a4(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang/ rdo rje dang/ rdo rjes mtshan ba'i dbyug pa sngon po dang/ rdo rjes mtshan paS dbyug ba nag po'o/ /gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i rdo rje sngon po ni gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma las phyi ngos su'o/ /kha cig ni 'khor lo ser po zhes bya'o/
46a5(rgyud 'grel): gnod mdzes rgyal po'i rdo rje ni pad+ma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma las gyi phyi ngos su'o/ /byams pa la sogs pa brgyad rnams kyi mtshan ni zla ba gnas pa'o/ /gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bcu ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /'dir nyi ma dang zla ba
46a6(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa gcig ni sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'o/ /bum ba bri pa ni sngar bzhin no/ /kha sbyor du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor la dbus su zla ba la rdo rje sems dpa' i rdo rje rtse lba pa sngon po'o/ /shar du zla ba la rnam par snang mdzad kyi
46a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'o/ /lhor nyi ma la rin po che dbang po'i rin chen no/ /nub tu nyi ma la snang ba mdza' yas kyi mnga' o/ /byang du nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /spyan ma'i sprin la gnas pa'i mig gnyis so/ /mA ma kI'i mda'o/ /gos dkar
46b1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i mda'o/ /sgrol ma'i utpa la dmar po'o/ /rim pa gnyis par shar du drag mo'i mda'o/ /lhor rdo rje gzugs pa'i rdo rje'o/ nub tu 'dod chaD rdo rje ma'i ral gri'o/ /byang du rdo rje zhib mo'i tal pa thung du'o/ /dbang ldan du rdo rje gnod sbyin ma'i dbyug pa dkar ser po/ /mer mkha' 'gro ma'i pad+ma dmar
46b2(rgyud 'grel): ser ?/ /bden bral du sgra rdo rje ma'i shag ti'o/ /rlung du sa rdo rje ma'i bum pa dkar ljang ngo/ /rim pa gsum bar shar gyi phyogs su gzhad ma'i rdo rje kha dog dmar po'o/ /lhor sgeg ma'i rdo rje'o/ /nub tu glu ma'i 'khang rnga'o/ /byang du gar ma'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa ljang
46b3(rgyud 'grel): gu'o/ /dbang ldan du gling bu ma'i gling bu'o/ /mer pi wang ma'i pi wang ngo/ /bden bral du mu kuN+Da ma'i mu kud Da'o/ /rlung du rdza rnga ma'i rdza rnga'o/ /phyi'i snam pu'i mer me tog ma'i me tog gi phreng ba'o/ /bden bral du bdug spos ma'i spos phor ro/ /rlung du mar me
46b4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i mar me'i mchod sdong ngo/ /dbang ldan du dri ma'i dri'i dung chos so/ /shar du me long ma'i me long ngo/ /lhor ro ma'i ro'i snod do/ /nub tu reg bya ma'i gos sna tshogs so/ /byang du chos ma'i chos 'byung dkar po'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor ni go rims bzhin
46b5(rgyud 'grel): du rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang/ rdo rje zhags pa ma dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrogs ma dang/ rdo rje dril bu ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ rdo rje zhags pa dang/ rdo rje phreng ba'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje lcags sgeg dang/ rdo rje dril bu ma rnaMs te/ nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /'dir brjod
46b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa'i mtshan ma bdun las mtshan ma gzhan ni zla ba la gnas ba'o/ /nyi ma dang zla ba sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du thod pa rnams la gnas pa'o/ /bum pa bri ba ni snga ma bzhin te/ thig zlum po drug pa
46b7(rgyud 'grel): las phyi rol du zhes pa ni khyad par ro/ /ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor la dbus dang/ shar dang byang dang/ nub dang/ lho rnams su go rims bzhin du ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dang/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang/ mkha' 'gro ma mi zad ma dang/
47a1(rgyud 'grel): ro langs ma dang/ gtum mo rnams kyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha TwAM ga rnams so/ /dbang ldan dang/ me dang bden bral dang rlung rnams su seng+ge mo dang stag mo dang/ ce spyad ma dang 'ug pa mo rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu rnams so/ /shar dang/
47a2(rgyud 'grel): byang dang/ nub dang/ lho'i sgo rnams su rgyal po'i dbang mo dang/ gsal byed ma dang/ 'jib byed ma dang/ kaM po dzI rnams kyi go rims bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim pa kha bye ba dang/ thal mo kha sbyar ba dang/ snyim pa khrag gis bkang ba dang/ rdo rje thal mo kha
47a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba'i the bo'i rtse mo gnyis sbyar ba'i mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba'o/ /'dir mtshan ma dang phyag rgya rnams ni sna tshogs ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /bsgom par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma
47a4(rgyud 'grel): na rim pa bzhin du/ seng+ge dang/ mche ba can dkar po dang/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phung bo dang/ ma he dang/ sbrul gyi dbang po brgyad kyi mjug ma dang/ ro bzhi la gnas pa ste/ de ltar rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la ni bskal pa dang mi ldan pa 'dus pa na
47a5(rgyud 'grel): bri bar mi bya'o/ /gzhan du ni ngal bas 'jigs dang/ yon bdag bsdus pa la dga' bas so/ /skal ba dang ldan pa rab tu dang bar bya ba'i don du ni yon bdag gi dbang las bri bar bya'o/ /de ltar phyi ma rnams la yang ji ltar 'byung ba bri ba dang mi bri
47a6(rgyud 'grel): bar rig par bya'o/ /phyi ngos kyi thig zlum po'i ngos su bum pa bri'o/ /bcu bdun gyi bdag nyid kyi kye'i rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba la khro bo'i rdo rje sngon po'o/ /shar dang lho la sogs pa dang/ dbang ldan dang me la sogs pa'i
47a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dag ma rnams la ni rim pa bzhin du rdo rje drag po dang/ rdo rje gzugs ma dang/ 'dod chags rdo rje ma dang/ rdo rje zhi ba mo dang/ rdo rje gnod sbyin ma dang/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang/ sgra rdo rje ma dang/ sa rdo rje ma rnams kyi mnga' dang/ rdo rje dang/ ral gri dang/ tal?
47b1(rgyud 'grel): pa thung du dang/ dbyug pa ser po dang/ pad+ma dmar ser dang/ shaka ti dang/ bum pa dkar ljang ngo/ /rim pa gnyis par dbang ldan dang me la sogs pa rnams su gling bu ma dang/ pi wang ma dang mu kuN+Da ma dang/ rdza rnga ma rnams kyi gling bu dang/ pi wang dang/ rnga mu kuN Da
47b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdza rnga rnams so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang/ rdo rje zhags pa ma dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang/ /rdo rje dril bu ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ rdo rje zhags pa dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog dang/ rdo rje dril bu rnams so/ /mtshan
47b3(rgyud 'grel): ma bcu bdun po 'di rnams ni thod pa dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /gling bu ma la sogs pa brgyad kyi ni thod pa'i 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma'o/ /phyag gnyis pa dang bzhi pa la ni thod pa med do/ /phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba khro bo'i rdo rje
47b4(rgyud 'grel): sngon po'o/ /shar la sogs pa dang/ dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la gau rI dang/ tsau rI dang/ ro langs ma dang/ za phod ma dang/ spos mo dang/ ri khrod ma dang/ gtum mo dang/ rab tu rmongs byed ma rnams kyi rim pa bzhin du mda' dang/ rdo rje dag
47b5(rgyud 'grel): thod pa khrag dang bcas pa la gnas pa'i rus sbal dang/ tshil gyi rkang pa la gnas pa'i sbrul dang/ shas bkang ba la gnas pa'i seng+ge dang/ khu ba dang bcas pa'i thod pa la gnas pa'i dge slong dang/ khrag dang bcas pa'i thod pa la gnas pa'i stag
47b6(rgyud 'grel): dang chang gi snod rnams so/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i mtshams rnams su gling bu ma la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni snga ma bzhin no/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor stag gdong ma dang/ phag gdong ma dang/ khyi gdong ma dang/ seng ge'i gdong ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags
47b7(rgyud 'grel): kyu dang/ rdo rje zhags pa dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog dang/ rdo rje dril bu'o/ /mtshan ma bcu bdun po 'di rnams nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /gling bu la sogs pa brgyad kyi nyi ma'i 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma rnams so/ /dbus kyi 'od zer gyi phyi ngos su sngar bzhin du bum pa
48a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams so/ /bdag med pa'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba dang/ shad la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la go rims bzhin du bdag med ma dang/ rdo rje ma dang/ dkar mo dang/ chu ma dang/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang/ rim pa gnyis par phyag bcu
48a2(rgyud 'grel): drug pa'i dkyil 'khor du brjod pa'i dkar mo la sogs pa rnams kyi rdo rje'o/ /gling bum la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni snga ma bzhin no/ /rta gdong ma la sogs pa'i gri gug rnams so/ /mkha' spyod ma'i rdo rje ni rta gdong ma'i phyi ngos su'o/ /sa spyod ma'i rdo rje ni khyi gdong ma'i
48a3(rgyud 'grel): phyi ngos su'o/ /'dir gri gug bzhi ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /mtshan ma gzhan ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o/ /phyi'i dkar mo la sogs pa bco brgyad po rnams kyi zla ba dang/ nyi ma ni sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'o/ /gling bu ma la sogs pa brgyad
48a4(rgyud 'grel): med pa ni lhag ma lha mo bco lnga po rnaMs kyi zla ba la gri gug rnams so/ /mkha' spyod ma'i mtshan ma ni dkar mo'i phyi ngos so/ /ro langs ma'i phyi ngos su sa spyod ma'o/ /de bzhin du ku ru ku l+le'i dkyil 'khor la yang yin te/ khyad par ni zla ba la yu ba dang bcas pa'i utpa la
48a5(rgyud 'grel): dmar po kha 'bus pa'i mnga' yod pa'o/ /'dir lha mo bco lnga po rnams kyang ku ru ku l+le bzhin du mdog dmar po'o/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor dang po la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba dang/ shar la sogs pa dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma
48a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams la go rims bzhin du rdo rje bdud rtsi dang/ zhi ba mo dang/ zhi gdong ma dang/ zla ldan ma dang/ ri bong can ma dang/ zla dkyil ma dang/ zla tshes ma dang/ yid 'ong ma dang/ yid tshim byed ma rnams kyi rdo rje'o/ /khyad par ni zla tshes ma'i zla ba cha gcig pa'o/
48a7(rgyud 'grel): rim pa gnyis par dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams su me tog ma dang/ bdug sbos ma dang/ mar me ma dang/ dri chab ma rnams kyi me tog gi za ma tog dang/ sbos phor dang/ mar me'i mchod sdong dang/ dri'i dung chos rnams so/ /shar la sogs pa'i snam bu
48b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams su gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi'i gling bu la sogs pa bzhi'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su khro gnyer rim par ldan dang/ 'jigs sdigs dang/ rta gzugs dang/ tshogs kyi gtso bo rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags sgrog dang/
48b2(rgyud 'grel): dril bu rnams so/ /mtshan ma nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di rnams ni zla ba la gnas pa'o/ /me tog ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis kyi zla ba'i 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma'o/ /yang na dkyil 'khor pa thams cad la chos 'byung bri bar bya'o/ /'di nyid kho na bri bar bya'o zhes pa ni
48b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag go/ gzhan rdo rje bdud rtsi gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan ma rnams ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud du rigs par bya'o/ /dgu'i bdag nyid can kyi'i rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar nyi ma la rdo rje sngon po kha gyes pa'o/ /shar
48b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab mar zla ba rnams la go rims bzhin du dkar mo dang/ chom rkun ma dang/ ro langs ma dang/ za phod ma dang/ sbos mo dang/ ri khrod ma dang/ gtum mo dang/ g.yud mo rnams kyi gri gug dang/ chang te'u dang/ rus
48b5(rgyud 'grel): sbal dang/ sgrul dang/ seng+ge dang/ dge slong dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje rnams so/ /phyag bcu drug pa'i nyi ma la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i thod pa dkar po zhes pa ni khyad par ro/ /phyi ngos kyi zlum po las phyi ngos su bum pa rnams so/ /sgyu ma chen mo'i dkyil
48b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la pad+ma dmar po'i lte bar nyi ma la bcom ldan 'das ma sgyu ma chen po'i pad+ma'i snod do/ /shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma'i zla ba rnams la g.yas bskor du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang/ rin chen mkha' 'gro ma dang/ pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma dang/ sna
48b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang/ rin po che'i snye ma dang/ sna tshogs chu skyes dang/ ral gri'o/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje sems dpa' la 'khyud nas gnas pas de'i mtshan ma tha dad du mi dgod do/ /dgu'i bdag nyid sangs
49a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar nyi ma la cang te'u'o/ /shar dang/ byang dang/ nub dang/ lho dang/ dbang ldan dang/ me dang/ bden bral dang/ rlung gi 'dab mar nyi ma rnams la sna tshogs sde ma dang/ 'dod ma dang
49a2(rgyud 'grel): sa 'og na gnas ma dang/ legs bzangs ma dang/ chang 'tshong ma dang/ 'byung mo dang/ phyag bzhi ma dang/ nam mkha' la gnas ma rnams kyi gri gug rnams so/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la dbus su rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi rdo rje'o/ /shar la sogs
49a3(rgyud 'grel): par g.yon skor du rdo rje dbyug pa dang/ nyi ma me dang/ rdo rje gtsug tor dang/ rdo rje 'khyil pa rnams dang/ me la sogs bar g.yas skor du rdo rje gnod sbyin dang/ rdo rje dus dang/ nag po chen po dang/ rdo rje bsdigs pa dang/ gtsug tor dang /rdo rje sa 'og rnams
49a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje tho ba dang/ rdo rje dbyug pa dang/ chu skyes dmar po dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ lcags kyu dang/ dgra sta dang/ rtse gsum dang/ ral gri dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje'i gtun shing rnams te/ mtshan ma thams cad ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma
49a5(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'o/ /yang na shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su g.yas skor du gshin rje mthar byed dang/ shes rab mthar byed dang/ pad+ma mthar byed dang/ bgegs mthar byed rnams kyi rdo rje'i tho? ba dang/ rdo rje mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang/ pad+ma
49a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje'/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams su mi g.yo ba dang/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang/ dbyug pa sngon po dang/ stobs po che rnams kyi ral gri dang/ rdo rje dang/ rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon pa dang/ rdo rjes mchan pa'i
49a7(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa nag po'o/ /gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma las phyi ngos su gtsug tor 'khor lo can gyi rdo rje'o/ /pad+ma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma las phyi ngos su gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje'o/ /mtshan ma bcu gcig po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la
49b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o/ /yang na bgegs dgra'i rdo rje kha gyes pa'o/ /me la sogs pa rnams su 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang/ dbyug pa sngon po dang/ stobs po che dang/ mi g.yo ba rnams kyi lcags kyu dang/ rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang/ rtse gsum pa dang/ ral
49b2(rgyud 'grel): gri'o/ /gtsug tor 'khor lo can gyi 'khor lo ser po chen po'o/ /gzhan rnams kyi bshad ma thag pa snga ma bzhin no/ /yang na gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bzhi po rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ rdo rje zhags pa dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog dang/ rdo rje
49b3(rgyud 'grel): dril bu rnams te/ gzhan gyi ni bshad ma tag pa snga ma bzhin no/ /bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar gnas pa'i nyi ma la dpal bde mchog gi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po kha gyes pa'o/ /phyogs bzhi'i 'dab ma la mkha' 'gro ma
49b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lA ma dang/ dum skyes ma dang/ gzugs can ma rnams kyi gri gug rnams so/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la pad+ma'i snod rnams so/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rtsibs nyi shu rtsa bzhi la rab tu gtum mo dang/ /gtum mig ma dang 'od ldan
49b5(rgyud 'grel): ma dang sna chen ma dang dpa' po'i blo can ma dang/ mi'u thung ma dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dang/ shing grib ma dang sa bsrungs ma dang/ 'jigs byed chen mo dang/ rlung gi shugs can ma dang/ chang 'thung ma dang/ lha mo sngo bsangs ma dang/ rab tu bzang
49b6(rgyud 'grel): mo dang/ rta rna mo dang/ bya gdong ma dang/ 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang/ dum skyes ma dang/ chang 'tshong ma dang/ 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang/ rab tu dpa' mo dang/ stobs chen mo dang/ 'khor lo sgyur ma dang/ brtson 'grus chen mo rnams kyi gri
49b7(rgyud 'grel): gug go /gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir dpa' bo rnams kyi mtshan ma mi bri'o/ /sgo rnams su khwa gdong ma dang/ 'ug gdong ma dang/ khyi gdong ma dang/ phag gdong ma rnams dang/ mtshams su gshin rje brtan ma dang/ gshin rje pho nya mo dang/ gshin rje mche ba
50a1(rgyud 'grel): mo dang/ gshin rje 'joms ma mo rnams kyi sna tshogs chu skyes ma/ nyi ma rnams la gri gug go/ 'dir shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su g.yon bskor du dang/ me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su g.yas skor du mtshan ma dgod do/ /
50a2(rgyud 'grel): phyi ngos su zlum po'i thig las phyi rol gyi mtshams kyi tshar bum pa rnams bri'o/ /de las gzhan pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa dang/ rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil rnams kyi mtshan ma rnaMs ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi phreng bar brjod do/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid
50a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes la nyi mar cang ti'u'o/ /lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams kyi gri gug rnams te/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su g.yon bskor dang/ me la sogs pa'i mtshams su g.yas bskor ro/ /de la
50a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo nag po'i rtsibs kyi steng du phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams la legs phreng can ma dang/ thod pa can ma dang/ 'jigs ma dang/ mi thub ma rnams kyi'o/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la thod pa rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje sngon po'i phreng ba'o/ /rim
50a5(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis pa la rtsibs brgyad dmar po la gnas pa'i chu skyes brgyad rnams la phyogs rnams su dge ba'i ska rags ma dang/ gzugs can ma dang/ rnam rgyal ma dang/ 'od can ma rnams kyi'o/ /mtshams rnams su dus can mo dang/ mtsho chen
50a6(rgyud 'grel): mo dang/ byed ma dang/ bsod ma rnams kyi'o/ /de nas rdo rje phreng ba dmar po'o/ /rim pa gsum par rtsibs brgyad dkar po la gnas pa'i pad+ma brgyad la phyogs su sgrol ma dang/ 'jigs mthong ma dang/ legs mthong ma dang/ thub dka' ma rnms
50a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi'o/ /mtshams rnams su dge ma dang/ grib gnon ma dang/ dus mtshan mo dang/ grags chen ma rnams kyi'o/ /de nas rdo rje phreng ba dkar po'o/ /sgo'i pad+ma rnams la mdzes ma dang/ nor 'dzin ma dang/ skal bzang mo dang/ mthong ba yid 'ong
50b1(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams kyi'o/ /pad+ma nyi shu'i steng du nyi ma rnams la gri gug rnams so zhes gdams so/ /rnal 'byor nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi sna tshogs pad+ma dang/ rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa'o/ /shar dang/ byang dang/ nub dang/ lho'i re mig rnams la pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas
50b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i kha TwAM? ga rnams so/ /dbang ldan dang me la sogs pa'i re mig rnams la kha TwAM ga dang/ lcags kyu dang/ dgra sta dang/ dbyug pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i re mig rnams la kha TwAM ga rnams kyi phyi ngos su rim pa bzhin du khar bsdus pa'i lag pa gnyis dang/
50b3(rgyud 'grel): snyim pa sbyar ba dang khrag gi snyim pa dang gtun shing ngo/ /kha TwAM ga la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams pad+ma dang nyi mar gnas pa'o/ /'od zer gyi khor yug gi phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su bdud rtsi'i thod pa gsum mo/ /byang du sgron ma'i thod pa gsum dang/ nub tu gtor ma'i
50b4(rgyud 'grel): thod pa gsum dang/ lhor? btung ba'i thod pa gsum dang/ dbang ldan du snyems pa'i lag pa dang/ dri'i snod do/ /mer ni pi wang dang/ me tog gi za ma tog ge/ bden bral du sdigs mdzub kyi lag pa dang spos snod do/ /rlung du thal mo dang mar me'o/ /de nas
50b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phreng ba'i khor yug gi phyi'i shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams la so sor bzhi bzhi dang sgo dang mtshams su brgyad te kha TwAM ga nyer bzhi'o/ /bdud rtsi'i thod pa la sogs pa ni mtsho skyes ma nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /gshin rje gshed gyi dkyil 'khor la
50b6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das gshin rdo rje gshed kyi rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa kha gyes pa'o/ /shar dang lho la sogs pa'i rwa'i rtsa ba rnams su rtag pa dang/ rin chen dbang po dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang/ don yod grub pa rnams kyi
50b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa dang/ rin po che ljang gu cha dgu pa dang/ pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa dang/ ral gri ljang gu rnams so/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i me dang/ bden bral la sogs pa'i grwar rdo rje tsar tsi ka dang rdo rje phag mo dang rdo rje dbyangs
51a1(rgyud 'grel): can ma dang/ dkar mo rnams kyi 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje dang/ pad+ma dang/ ral gri'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'phreng ba'o/ /de nas sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyogs so sor rwa lnga'o/ /shar dang lho la soD pI sgo rnaMs su thob gshin rje gshed dang/ dbyug ? gshin rje gshed dang/
51a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma gshin rje gshed dang/ ral gri gshin rje gshed rnams kyi rdo rje rtse mo nyi shu pas mtshan pa'i tho ba dang/ dbyug pa dkar po dang/ pad+ma dmar po dang/ ral gri'o/ /'dir rtag pa dang/ lha mo rnams kyi mtshan ma ni zla ba la gnas pa'o/ /gzhan gyi ni
51a3(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'og tu ni sna tshogs pad+ma'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su pad+ma la gnas pa'i thod pa gzhi'o/ /rwa'i glo rnams su bum pa rnams so/ /rdo rje'i sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshoD pad+ma'i lte bar zla ba la rdo rje rtse dgu pa gsol
51a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdog can no/ /shar dang lho la sogs pa'i 'dab mar zla ba rnams la me tog sgrol ma dang/ bdug spos sgrol ma dang/ mar me'i sgrol ma dang/ dri'i sgrol ma rnams kyi me tog phreng ba dang/ spos phor dang/ mar me'i skong bu dang/ dri'i dung chos rnams so
51a5(rgyud 'grel): me la sogs pa'i 'dab mar rtag pa dang/ mi bskyod pa dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang/ don yod grub pa rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje dang/ pad+ma dang/ ral gri rnams so/ /shar dang lho la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang/ rdo rje
51a6(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa mo dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang/ rdo rje dril bu ma rnams kyi lcags kyu la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i phyi ngos su gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i 'khor lo sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la'o/ /rdo rje
51a7(rgyud 'grel): lcags sgrog ma'i phyi ngos su rdo rje gnod mdzes ma'i sprul gyi zhags pa ste/ sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la'o/ /me la soD pI mtshams su pad+ma las spyan ma dang mA ma kI dang/ gos dkar mo sgrol ma rnam par dag pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi bum pa dang/
51b1(rgyud 'grel): ri rab dang/ me thab dang rgyal mtshan chen po'o/ /pad+ma'i phyi ngos su bum pa rnams so/ /'od zer can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi sna tshogs pad+mar nyi ma 'am/ zla ba la mnga' ste mtshan mo zla ba la gnas shing nyin par nyi ma la gnas te lha mo rnam par rgyu'o/ /shar dang lho la sogs pa'i
51b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su a rka ma si dang/ marka ma si dang/ an dar d+ha na ma si dang/ te dzom si'i lha mo rnams kyi go rims bzhin du khab dang skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang/ a sho ka'i yal ga dang mda' rnams so/ /me dang srin po la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su ud yo ma
51b3(rgyud 'grel): si dang/ gul ma ma si dang/ ba nam si dang/ tsI bar ma si rnams kyi mtshan ma ni go rims bzhin du arka ma si la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bzhin no/ /phyi'i pho brang gi snam bu'i shar du ma hA tsI bar ma si dang/ barA ha mu khi'i lha mo dag gi rdo rje dang lcags kyu
51b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis so/ /lho phyogs su lha mo pa dA kra ma si dang/ bar li dag gi a sho ka'i 'dab ma gnyis so/ /nub tu lha mo par kra ma si dang/ ba da li dag gi mda' gnyis so/ /byang du lha mo u rnam si dang ba rA li dag gi khab gnyis so/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams su ba t+tA pa dang?
51b5(rgyud 'grel): ba t+tA? li dang/ barla la dang ba rA ha mu khi rnams kyi khab dang skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang a sho ka'i lo ma dang mda' rnams so/ /shar sgor lha mo a lo'i rdo rje lcags kyu'o/ /lhor lha mo ta lo'i rdo rje zhags pa'o/ /nub tu lha mo ka lo'i rdo rje lcags sgrog?
51b6(rgyud 'grel): byang du lha mo sangs lo saM ba mU ra d+ha Ti'i rdo rje dril bu'o/ /'dir sgo skyong ma'i mtshan ma rnams ni pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /gzhan dag gi ni pad+ma dang zla ba la'o/ /bsrung ba lnga'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar zla ba la so sor 'brang
51b7(rgyud 'grel): ma chen mo'i rin po che'i chun po'o/ /shar du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i 'khor lo'o/ /lhor sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa'i rdo rje'o/ /nub tu sna tshogs pad+ma dang/ nyi ma la
52a1(rgyud 'grel): bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i pad+ma'o/ /byang du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la rma bya chen mo'i rma bya'i mjug sgro'o/ /rim pa gnyis par me la sogs pa'i mtshams su nag mo dang/ dus mtshan mo dang/ rna ba nag mo dang/ dkar mo rnams kyi dung
52a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan dang/ dgra sta dang/ rtse gsum rnams so/ /snam bu rnams la bum pa rnams so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma rnams la rdo rje lcaD kyu ma la sogs pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bzhi'o/ /rdo rje dbyings
52a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar zla ba la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po'o/ /lte ba'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar zla ba rnams la go rims bzhin du g.yas skor du sems ma rdo rje ma dang/ rin chen rdo rje mdang
52a4(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi rdo rje ma dang/ las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi rdo rje dmar po rtse lnga pa dang/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rtse mo can gyi rin po che dang/ rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i pad+ma 'dab brgyad dkar dmar dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog gi sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /shar
52a5(rgyud 'grel): la soD pa'i pad+ma'i lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la go rims bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ 'od dpag med dang/ don yod grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po dang/ rdo rje rin po che dang/ rdo rje pad+ma dang/ sna tshogs
52a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rnams so/ /mi bskyod pa'i pad+ma'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar zla ba rnams la rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ rdo rje rgyal po dang/ rdo rje chags ba dang/ rdo rje legs pa rnams kyi rim pa bzhin du rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang/ rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ mda'
52a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdo rje'o/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gyi pad+ma la rdo rje rin chen dang/ rdo rje gzi brjid dang/ rdo rje tog dang/ rdo rje bzhad pa rnams kyi rim pa bzhin du rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba dang/ nyi ma dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor
52b1(rgyud 'grel): bu'i rgyal mtshan dang/ so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'o/ /snang ba mdza' yas kyi rdo rje chos dang/ rdo rje rnon po dang/ rdo rje rgyu dang/ rdo rje bsrung ba rnams kyi pad+ma dmar po dang/ ral gri dang/ 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang/ rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i lce'o/ /don
52b2(rgyud 'grel): yod grub pa'i rdo rje las dang/ rdo rje bsrung ba dang/ rdo rje gnod sbyin dang/ rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyi lha tshogs rdo rje dang/ rdo rje go cha dang/ rdo rjes mtshan pa'i mche ba dang/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o/ /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa so so'i byang chub sems dpa' gsum
52b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshan ma ni byang gi 'dab mar dang/ bzhi pa'i mtshan ma ni nub kyi 'dab ma la bri bar bya'o/ /me la sogs pa'i pad+ma'i lte ba'i zla ba rnams rdo rje sgeg mo dang/ rdo rje 'phreng ba ma dang/ rdo rje glu ma dang/ rdo rje gar ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang/ rin po che'i phreng ba
52b4(rgyud 'grel): dang pi wang dang/ rdo rje'o/ /dbus kyi gzhal yas khab las phyi rol gyi snam bu'i shar du byams pa dang/ mthong ba don yod dang/ ngan song kun 'dren dang/ mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros rnams kyi pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje rtse ?
52b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams so/ /lho phyogs su spos kyi glang po dang/ dpa' bar 'gro ba dang/ nam mkha' mdzod dang/ ye shes tog rnams kyi pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje rin po che rnams so/ /nub tu 'od dpag med dang/ zla 'od dang/ bzang skyong dang/ dra ba can gyi 'od rnams
52b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi chu skyes dang/ zla ba rnams la rdo rje pad+ma rnams so/ /byang du rdo rje snying po dang/ glo gros mi zad pa dang/ spobs pa rtsegs pa dang/ kun tu bzang po rnams kyi pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la sna tshoD rdo rje rnams so/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor kyi me la sogs pa'i grwa rnams su
52b7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo rjairje dri chab ma rnams kyi mtshan ma ni snga ma bzhin no/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ rdo rje zhags pa dang/ rdo rje
53a1(rgyud 'grel): lcags sgrogs? dang/ rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams so/ /snam bu rnams la bum pa rnams so/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid can 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa lnga ni sngon po dang/
53a2(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ ser po ste/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dang/ dbus kyi sa thams cad kyang ngo/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la rtsig pa gsum ste/ sngon po dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po'o/ /'khor lo gsum pa la rtsig pa
53a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po gcig go/ de lang dus kyi sa gzhi ser po la sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la 'jam dpal gyi ral gri yu ba ser po can no/ /shar la sogs pa'i re mig gi nyi ma rnams la mi bskyod pa dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang/ don
53a4(rgyud 'grel): yod grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje sngon po dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ ral gri'o/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i de mig gi zla ba rnams la spyan ma dang/ mA ma kI dang/ gos dkar mo dang/ sgrol ma rnams kyi rdo rje ser po dang/ rdo rje sngon po
53a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdo rje dkar po dang/ rdo rje ljang gu'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su zla ba rnams la sems ma rdo rje ma dang/ rin chen rdo rje ma dang/ chos kyi rdo rje ma dang/ las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mi bskyod pa
53a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa bzhin no/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su zla ba rnams la tsun d+ha dang/ rin chen dkar mnga' dang/ khro gnyer can dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog ma rnams kyi ral gri dang/ rin po che ser bo dang/ rdo rje dkar po dang/ rdo rje lcags
53a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrog ljang gu rnams so/ /rim pa gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor la shar gyi zla ba rnams la byams pa dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ sbos kyi glang po dang/ ye shes tog rnams kyi klu shing gi yal ga me tog dang bcas pa dang/ ral gri dang/ lag
53b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan gyi snam bu la gnas pa dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu ser po'o/ /lho'i zla ba rnams la bzang skyong dang/ blo gros rgya mtsho dang/ blo gros mi zad pa dang/ spobs pa brtsegs pa rnams kyi mnga' dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ ljang gu'o/ /nub kyi
53b2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba rnams la mthu chen thob dang/ ngan song kun 'dren dang/ mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang/ dra ba can gyi 'od rnams kyi pad+ma dkar po dang/ mnga' dkar po dang/ mnga' ser po dang/ utpa la dmar bo la gnas pa'i
53b3(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'o/ /byang phyogs kyi zla ba rnams la zla 'od dang/ 'od dpag med dang/ nam mkha' mdzod dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba rnams kyi utpa la la gnas pa'i zla ba dang/ bum pa dmar po dang/ mnga' ser po dang/ mnga' sngon po'o/ /
53b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dir go rims bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams kyi logs gnyis kyi snam bu la mtshan ma gnyis gnyis so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor nyi ma rnams la gshin rje mthar byed dang/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang/ rta mgrin dang/ bdud rtsi 'khyil?
53b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyi ral gri yu ba nag po can dang/ rdo rje ser bo dang/ rdo rje dbyug pa dmar po dang/ ral gri yu bsngon ? can dang/ dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi nyi ma rnams la mi g.yo ba dang/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang/ dbyug pa sngon po dang/
53b6(rgyud 'grel): stobs po che rnams kyi ral gri sngon po dang/ rdo rje sngon po dang/ rdo rje dbyug pa sngon po dang/ rdo rje dbyug pa sngon po'o/ /gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi rol du nyi ma la gnod mdzes kyi ral gri'o/ /rta mgrin gyi mtshan ma'i phyi ngos su nyi ma la rdo rje
53b7(rgyud 'grel): sa 'og gi rdo rje lcags kyu'o/ /zla ba dang nyi ma thams cad kyi 'og tu sna tshogs chu skyes so/ /snam bu rnams la bum ba rnams so/ /kha cig tu ni gshin rje gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi rol su nyin la gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'khor lo dang de'i phyi ngos su
54a1(rgyud 'grel): gnod mdzes kyi ral gri'o zhes gsungs so/ /chos kyi dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la nang gi 'khor lo tshon dkar pos dgang bar bya'o/ /gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sna tshogs
54a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i lte bar zla ba la 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ral gri yu ba ser po can no/ /shar la sogs pa dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma'i zla ba rnams la go rims bzhin g.yas bskor du gtsug tor chen po dang/ gdugs dkar po dang/ gzi
54a3(rgyud 'grel): brjid phung po dang/ rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang/ 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba dang/ 'phags pa dang/ cher 'phags pa dang/ rgyal ba ste gtsug tor brgyad po rnams kyi 'khor lo ser po rnams so/ /shar gyi re mig gi dbus su sna tshogs chu
54a4(rgyud 'grel): skyes dang nyi ma la mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje sngon po'o/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ rdo rje rgyal po dang/ rdo rje chags pa dang/ rdo rje lags pa rnams kyi rdo rje dang/ rdo rje lcags kyu dang/
54a5(rgyud 'grel): mda' dang/ rdo rje'o/ /lho'i re mig gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma dang/ nyi ma la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu ser po'i rgyal mtshan no/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi sna tshogs chu skyes dang/ zla ba la rdo rje rin chen dang/ rdo
54a6(rgyud 'grel): rje nyi ma dang/ rdo rje tog dang/ rdo rje bzhad pa rnams kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis kyi mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang/ so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'o/ /nub kyi re mig gi dbus su
54a7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pad+mar nyi ma la snang ba mdza' yas kyi pad+ma dmar po'o/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs chu skyes dang/ zla ba rnams la rdo rje chos dang/ rdo rje rnon po dang/ rdo rje rgyu dang/ rdo rje bsrung ba rnams kyi pad+ma dang/ ral gri dang/ chos
54b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi? 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i lce'o/ /byang phyogs kyi re mig gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+mar nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i ral gri'o/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs pad+mar zla ba rnams la rdo rje las dang/ rdo rje bsrung ba dang/ rdo rje gnod
54b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin dang/ rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyi rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang/ rdo rje go cha dang/ rdo rjes mtshan pa'i mche ba dang/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi re mig gi pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la spyan ma dang/ mA ma kI dang/ gos dkar mo dang/ sgrol
54b3(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang/ mi bskyod pa dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang/ don yod grub pa'i mtshan ma bzhin no/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ rdo rje zhags pa
54b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog dang/ rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'o/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor 'di las dkyil 'khor gnyis par shar phyogs su sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la sa bcu gnyis so/ /mos pa spyod pa dang/ rab tu
54b5(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba dang/ dri ma med pa dang/ 'od 'byed pa dang/ 'od 'phro ba dang/ spyang dkar ba dang/ mngon du gyur pa dang/ ring du song ba dang/ mi g.yo ba dang/ legs pa'i blo gros dang/ chos kyi sprin dang/ kun tu 'od kyis rnams kyi go rims bzhin du g.yas
54b6(rgyud 'grel): skor du pad+ma dmar po dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang/ utpa la dang/ nor bu mar gata dang/ pad+ma la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang/ sna tshogs chu skyes kyi steng du sna tshogs
54b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje yu ba dang bcas pa'i pad+ma dang/ zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po dang/ utpa la'i steng du ral gri dang/ chos kyi sprin gyis yongs su bskor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang/ pad+ma la bzhugs pa'i yang dag par
55a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku'o/ /lhor sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rin po che pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab dang/
55a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang/ stobs dang/ smon lam dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gnyis rnams kyi pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'bru sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i snye ma dang/ lo ma dang bcas pa'i a
55a3(rgyud 'grel): sho ka'i me tog gi chun po dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ utpa la sngon po dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ pad+ma la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang/ chu skyes ser po la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang/ utpa la la gnas pa'i ral gri dang/
55a4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang/ rin po che sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bus brgyan pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi yal ga dang/ utpa la la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /nub tu sna tshogs chu skyes dang/ zla ba rnams la tshe dang/ sems dang/ yo byang
55a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ las dang/ skye ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ mos pa dang/ smon lam dang/ ye shes dang/ chos la dbang ba rnams dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste/ dbang bcu gnyis rnams kyi nor bu pad+ma rA ga la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
55a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i tshe dpag med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang/ rdo rje dmar po rtse lnga pa dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ me tog dzA ti kha dog sna tshogs pa'i yal 'dab dang/ pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi
55a7(rgyud 'grel): zla'i dkyil 'khor dang/ bri yang ku'i me tog gi snye ma dang/ utpa la sngon po dang/ utpa la la gnas pa'i ral gri dang/ pad+ma la gnas pa'i bum pa bzang po dang/ 'dam skyes dkar po dang/ chu skyes ser po la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o/ /byang
55b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la dbyig gi blo gros ma dang/ rin po che'i skar mda' dang/ gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dang/ 'od zer can dang/ ri khrod lo ma can dang/ dzeM gu lI dang/ sgo mdza' yas ma dang/ sku la byed ma dang/ shes rab 'phel ma dang/ las dang
55b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ma dang/ ye shes mi zad pa'i za me tog dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi mdzod ldan ma rnams te/ gzungs bcu gnyis rnams kyi 'bras bu snye ma dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang/ nor bu zla ba chu shes gyi buM pa dang
55b3(rgyud 'grel): skud? pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang/ rma bya'i mjug sgro dang/ dug mi me tog gi chun po dang/ pad+ma dmar po la gnas pa'i mi zad pa'i gter chen po'i bum pa dang/ ril ba spyi blugs la phreng ba dpyangs ba dang/ utpa la sngon bo la gnas pa'i ral gri dang/ rdo rje
55b4(rgyud 'grel): rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i pad+ma dkar dmar dang/ rin po che'i za ma tog dang/ pad+ma la gnas pa'i rin po che sna tshogs pa'i dpe sgrom mo/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor chu skyes dang/ nyi ma rnams la chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ don so so yang
55b5(rgyud 'grel): dag par rig pa dang/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ rin po che'i zhags pa dang/ mdza' gnyis su pad+mas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog dang/ rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan
55b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dril bu'o/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams su sgeg mo dang/ phreng ba ma dang/ glu ma dang/ gar ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang/ rin po che'i phreng ba dang/ pi wang dang/ rdo rje'o/ /dkyil 'khor gsum par pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la shar phyogs su kun tu bzang
55b7(rgyud 'grel): po'i utpa la la gnas pa'i ral gri dang/ blo gros mi zad pa'i ral gri dang/ sa'i snying po'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing dang/ nam mkha' i snying po'i rin po che'o/ /lho phyogs su nam mkha' mdzod kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang/ phyag na
56a1(rgyud 'grel): rin chen gyi rin po che dang/ blo gros rgya mtsho'i dur dang/ rdo rje snying po'i rdo rje'o/ /nub tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma dang/ mthu chen thob kyi ral gri dang/ zla 'od kyi rdo rje dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo dang/ dra ba can gyi 'od kyi ral gri'o//
56a2(rgyud 'grel): byang du pad+ma dang nyi ma rnams la 'od dpag med dang/ spobs pa rtsegs pa dang/ mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang/ sgrib ba thams cad rnam par sel ba rnams kyi sna tshogs pad+ma dang pad+ma la gnas pa'i ral gri dang/ rdo rje rtse
56a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa dang/ ral gri'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor pad+ma dang zla nyi ma rnams la gshin rje mthar byed dang /shes rab mthar byed dang/ pad+ma mthar byed dang/ bgegs mthar byed rnams kyi lcags kyu dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags sgrog dang/ dril bu
56a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams so/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma rnams la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang/ rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba dang/ he ru ka rdo rje dang/ rta mchog rnams kyi ral gri dang/ rdo rje dang/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang/ sna
56a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs? rdo rje rnams so/ /gshin rje mthar byed kyi mtshan ma'i phyir gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'khor lo ser po'o/ /pad+ma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma'i phyir gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje'o/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma
56a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i phyi ngos? dkyil 'khor gsum pa kho na'i zur gyi nang du re khA bya'o/ /de'i phyi ngos kyi gnas kyi me la sogs pa'i zur thig rnams kyi g.yas logs su gnas pa'i pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la me tog ma dang/ bdug spos ma dang/ mar me dang/ dri?
56a7(rgyud 'grel): chab ma rnams kyi me tog gi snod dang/ spos phor dang/ rin po che'i sgrol ma'i mchod sdong dang du ngo/ /g.yon logs su gnas pa'i pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje gzugs ma dang/ rdo rje sgra ma dang/ rdo rje ro ma dang/ rdo rje reg bya ma rnams kyi me long
56b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ pi wang? dang/ ro'i snod dang/ gos sna tshogs so/ /phyi rol rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la pad+ma rnams la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su dbang po dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu bdag dang/ lus ngan po rnams kyi rdo rje dang/ dbyug pa dang/ klu'i zhags pa dang/ lcags
56b2(rgyud 'grel): kyu'o/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su dbang ldan dang/ me lha dang/ srin po'i bdag po dang/ rlung lha rnams kyi rtse gsum ba dang/ blugs gzar dang/ ral gri dang/ rlung ras so/ /de nas dbang ldan gyi phyi ngos dang nye bar dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas/
56b3(rgyud 'grel): brtsams te/ mtshan ma rnms rims kyis par bya'o/ /de la tshangs pa'i bgrang phreng ngo/ /khyab mjug gi 'khor lo'o/ /dbang phyug chen po'i rtse gsum pa dang/ gdong drug gi shag ti dang/ tshangs mo'i phreng ba dang/ drag mo'i phreng ba dang/ drag mo'i rtse gsum dang/ khyab 'jug
56b4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i 'khor lo dang/ gzhon nu ma'i shag ti dang/ dbang mo'i rdo rje dang/ phag mo'i nya ro haM ta dang/ tsa mun Da'i gri gug dang/ 'bring gi ri ti'i phreng ba dang/ tshogs bdag gi dgra sta dang/ nag po chen po'i rtse gsum dang/ dga' byed dbang phyug gi rdza rnga dang/ nyi ma'i
56b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor dang/ zla ba'i kun ta ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ mig dmar gyi gri sgur dang/ lag pa'i mda' dang/ phur bu'i phreng ba dang/ pa lnga sangs kyi phreng ba dang/ spen pa'i dbyug pa nag po dang/ sgra gcan gyi
56b6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba dang/ mjug rings kyi kru'i zhags pa dang/ stobs bzangs kyi gshol dang/ rgyal bar byed pa'i me tog gi phreng ba dang/ sbrang rtsir byed pa'i chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang/ dpyid kyi zla dang/ mdza' yas dang/ nor rgyas dang/ 'jog po dang/
56b7(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyi rgyu dang/ pad+ma dang/ pad+ma chen po dang/ dung skyong dang/ rigs ldan rnams kyi thal mo sbyar ba 'am/ yang na rang rang gi pha'i mtshan ma dang 'dra ba'i mtshan ma'o/ /de la mdza' yas dang rig ldan ni bram ze ste me lha'i bu'o/ /nor rgyas dang
57a1(rgyud 'grel): dung skyong ni rgyal rigs te dbang po'i'o/ /'jog po dang pad+ma chen po ni rje'u'i rigs te rlung lha'o/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma ni dmar rigs te chu lha'i'o/ /thag bzangs ris dang/ stobs ldan dang/ rab tu chi ma byed dang/ rnam par snang byed la
57a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi ral gri la sogs pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs pa'o/ /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i pi wang ngo/ /dri za'i rgyal po zur phung lnga pa'i pi wang ngo/ /rig pa 'dzin
57a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyal po don kun grub pa'i me tog gi phreng ba'o/ /gang ba bzang po dang/ nor bu bzang po dang/ nor sbyin dang/ rnam thos kyi bu dang/ rtsi pi kuN+Da li dang/ ki li mA li dang/ sgo'i dbang po dang/ /spyod ba'i dbang po ste/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams kyi
57a4(rgyud 'grel): shing tog dzi bUr rnams so/ /'phrog ma'i chang bu gnyis so/ /tha skar dang/ bra nye dang/ smin drug dang/ snar ma dang/ mgo dang/ lag dang/ nab so dang/ rgyal dang/ skag dang/ mchu dang/ gre dang/ dpo dang/ me bzhi dang/ nag pa dang/ sa ri dang/ sa ga
57a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lha mtshams dang/ snron dang/ snubs dang/ chu stod dang/ chu smad dang/ gro bzhin dang/ mon gre dang/ mon gru dang/ khrums stong dang/ khrums smad dang/ nam gru dang/ byi bzhin rnams kyi ni lag pa thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya rnams so/ /'dir
57a6(rgyud 'grel): yang sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi pa la bum pa rnams so/ /ngan song yongs su spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje phreng ba sngon po'i nang du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad po'i dbus su chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ser po'o/ /shar
57a7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams la sa gnon gyi phyag rgya dkar po dang/ mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya sngon po dang/ bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya dmar po dang/ mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya ljang? gu rnams so/ /me la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams la nyi ma dang/ yid
57b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang/ ral bri dang/ gdugs so/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi'i me la sogs pa'i mtshams su sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la sgo'i g.yon du mtshan ma gnyis te/ g.yas su yang ngo/ /der klu shing gi me tog dang/
57b2(rgyud 'grel): spyan dang bcas pa'i chu skyes dang/ lcags kyu dang/ dbyug pa dang/ dung dang/ ral gri dang/ pad+ma la gnas pa'i chos kyi sgrom dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang/ bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang/ pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs dang/ rin po che
57b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos rdo rje gur dang/ rdo rje dang bcas pa'i utpa la dang/ bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang/ chu skyes la gnas pa'i rin po che dang/ rin po che'i snye ma'o/ /mi la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams la me tog la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams so/ /sgo rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu
57b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa rnams so/ /mtshan ma sum cu rtsa bdun po rnams sna tshogs pad+ma dang/ zla pa la gnas pa'o/ /mgrin pa sngon po la sogs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mi bri ba yang ngo/ /'byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor la rtsig pa lnga dang/ shar la sogs pa'i
57b5(rgyud 'grel): sa ni dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ nag po'o/ /thig gi re khA gsuM ni dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ nag po'o/ /thig gi re khA gcig dang/ rdo rje phreng ba'i re khA gnyis ni nag po'o/ /nang gi pho brang gi dbus kyi re mig la sna tshogs pad+ma
57b6(rgyud 'grel): dang zla ba la bcom ldan 'das 'byung po 'dul byed kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po'o/ /shar du nyi ma la dbang phyug chen po'i rtse gsum pa'o/ /lhor nyi ma la khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo'o/ /nub tu zla ba la tshangs pa'i phreng ba'o/ /byang du nyi ma la smin drug gi bu'i shag
57b7(rgyud 'grel): te'o/ /dbang ldan du zla ba la tshogs bdag gi dgra sta'?/ /mer nyi ma la nyi ma'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /bden bral du nyi ma la sgra gcan gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /rlung du zla ba la dga' byed dbang phyug gi cang ti'u'o/ /rims
58a1(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis par shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su dbang po dang/ thig le mchog ma dang/ zla ba mo dang/ dka' bzlog ma rnams kyi zla ba la pad+ma dkar po dang/ spos phor dang/ mar me'i mchod sdong dang/ gdengs ka'i rnam pa'i lag
58a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /me la sogs par rin chen dpal mo dang/ dbyangs can ma dang/ lha mdzes ma dang / kun tu 'byor ma rnams kyi zla ba rnams la rim pa bzhin du dri'i dung chos dang/ pi wang dang/ rin po che'i phreng ba dang/ rdo rje rtse gsum pa'o/ /rim pa gsum
58a3(rgyud 'grel): par shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su dbang po dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu bdag dang/ lus ngan rnams kyi zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang/ nyi ma la gnas pa'i thod pas mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dang/ zla ba la gnas pa'i klu'i zhags pa dang/ zla ba la gnas
58a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbyug to'o/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams su me lha dang/ bden bral dang/ rlung lta dang/ zla ba rnams kyi nyi ma la gnas pa'i phreng ba dang/ nyi ma la gnas pa'i ral gri dang/ zla ba la gnas pa'i rlung ras dang/ zla ba dang/ ku mu ta la gnas
58a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /zla ba'i mtshan ma dang nye bar dbang ldan gyi nyi ma la rtse gsum mo/ /rim pa bzhin par shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su seng+ge'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin ma dang/ rnam rgyas ma dang/ pad chen ma dang/ chang 'phrog ma rnams kyi
58a6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba la seng+ge'i rgyal mtshan dang/ lcags kyu dang/ mnga' dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o/ /dbang ldan la sogs par mchog 'phrog ma dang/ rin chen dbang phyug ma dang/ rgyal ma dang/ 'gro skyong ma rnams kyi zla ba la me tog gi snod dang/ spos ?
58a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dri'i dung chos dang/ mar me'i mchod sdong ngo/ /'dir nyi ma dang/ zla ba thams cad ni sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'o/ /rim pa bzhi par bum pa rnams so/ /mkha' 'gro lnga'i dkyil 'khor la dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su shes rab
58b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i kye'i rdo rje'i gri gug dang thod pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor dkar mo dang/ chom rkun ma dang/ ro langs ma dang/ za phod ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags sgrog dang/ dril bu rnams so/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i
58b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams rnams su sbos mo dang/ ri khrod ma dang/ gtum mo dang/ g.yung mo rnams kyi byang chub sems kyi bum pa dang/ ri rab dang/ me khab dang/ rgyal mtshan chen po'i ba dan no/ /de las shar gyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rtag pa'i thod pa la gnas pa'i
58b3(rgyud 'grel): rma bya'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i skor skam pa mo dang/ zhags pa ma dang/ dol zlum ma dang/ lcags kyu 'dzin ma rnams kyi skam pa dang/ zhags pa dang/ nya rgya zlum po dang/ lcags kyu'o/ /dbang ldan la sogs bar me tog ma dang/ bdug spos ma dang/ mar
58b4(rgyud 'grel): me ma dang/ dri chab ma rnams kyi me tog gi snong dang/ spos phor dang/ mar me'i mchod sdong dang/ dri ser bos gang ba'i dung ngo/ /lho'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rdo rje nyi ma'i thod pa la gnas pa'i bya ka ran da ka dang/ shar la sogs pa'i sgor nyi lag
58b5(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ mar me ? dang/ rin chen skar mnga' ma dang/ phyag na glog thogs ma rnams kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang/ mar me'i mchod sdong dang/ rin po che dang/ glog gi phreng ba'o/ /dbang ldan la sogs par sgeg mo dang/ phreng ba ma dang/ glu ma dang/ gar
58b6(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang/ rin po che'i phreng ba dang/ mkhar rnga dang/ rdo rje'o/ /nub kyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi thod pa la gnas pa'i ngom dang/ shar la sogs pa'i sgor pad+ma ma dang/ chos 'byung ma dang/ sgrag? ma dang/ rang
58b7(rgyud 'grel): mkhyud ma rnams kyi pad+ma dang/ chos 'byung dang/ sgrog dang/ sgrog dang/ rdo rje'o /dbang ldan la sogs par gling? bu ma dang/ pi wang ma dang/ rnga mu kuN+Da ma dang/ rdza rnga ma rnams kyi rang rang gi rol cha rnams so/ /byang gi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rta mchog gi thod pa
59a1(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i gza' lhag dang/ shar la sogs pa'i sgor sgo lcags ma dang/ lde skyog ma dang/ sgo glegs ma dang/ yol ba 'dzin ma rnams kyi sgo lcags dang/ lde skyog dang/ sgo glegs dang/ yol ba'o/ /dbang
59a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan la sogs par spyan ma dang/ mA ma kI dang/ gos dkar mo dang/ sgrol ma rnams kyi 'khor lo dang/ rnga? dang/ pad+ma dang/? utpa la'o/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo rnams su dkar mo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams dang/ dbang ldan la sogs par sbos
59a3(rgyud 'grel): mo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams so/ /mtshan ma 'di rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /rtag pa kho na'i zla ba la gnas pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor so so la bdud rtsi 'bum pa rnams so/ /kha cig ni dkyil 'khor chen po kho na la'o
59a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes so/ 'khor lo sgyur ba drug gi dkyil 'khor la mtshan ma rnams sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa ste/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro kho na'i zla ba la gnas pa'o/ /gzhal yas khang drug po rnams kyi grwa rnams su sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas
59a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thod pa rnams so/ /de la dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi pad+ma la rdo rje de'i rdo'o/ /mtshams kyi pad+ma rnams la mkha' 'gro ma dang/ lA ma dang/ du ma skyes ma dang/ gzugs can ma rnams kyi cang ti'u rnams so/ /'dir dgod pa'i rim pa ni
59a6(rgyud 'grel): shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su g.yon bskor dang/ me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su g.yas skor ro/ /sgo'i pad+ma rnams la thod pa'i dum bu dang/ rab tu gtum mo dag dang/ keng rus chen po dang/ gtum pa'i mig can ma dag dang
59a7(rgyud 'grel): keng rus dang/ 'ong ldan ma dag dang/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs ma dang/ sna chen ma dag gi rdo rje bzhi'o/ /khor yug gi dbus su rdo rje'i phreng ba'o/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du dbus su pad+ma la 'khor lo dang/ sgo'i pad+ma rnaMs
59b1(rgyud 'grel): ? lha dgra dang/ dpa' bo'i bla ma dag dang/ 'od dpag med dang/ mi thung ma dag dang/ rdo rje 'od dang/ lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dag dang/ rdo rje lus dang/ shing grib ma ngag gi 'khor lo rnams so/ /khor yug gi dbus su 'khor lo'i phreng ba'o/ /rin
59b2(rgyud 'grel): chen mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su rin po che'o/ /sgo'i chu skyes rnams la nyu gu can dang/ e ra pa ti dag dang/ rdo rje ral pa can dang/ 'jigs byed chen mo dag dang/ dpa' bo chen po dang/ rlung shugs ma dag dang/ rdo rje hUM mdzad dang/
59b3(rgyud 'grel): char thur ma dag gi rin po che rnams so/ /khor yug gi dbus su rin po che'i phreng ba'o/ /pad+ma mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su pad+ma'/ /sgo'i pad+ma rnams la shin tu bzang po dang/ lha mo sngo sangs ma dag dang/ rdo rje bzang po dang/ shin tu bzang mo dag
59b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'jigs byed chen po dang/ rta sna ma dag dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ bya gdong ma rnams kyi pad+ma rnams so/ /khor yug gi dbus su pad+ma'i phreng ba'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /sgo'i pad+ma rnams la stobs po che
59b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dag dang/ rin chen rdo rje dang/ dum skyes ma dag dang/ rta mgrin dang/ chang tshong ma dag dang/ nam mkha' i snying po dang/ 'khor lo'i go cha ma dag gi rdo rje rnams so/ /khor yug gi dbus su rdo rje'i phreng ba'o/ /sna tshogs mkha' 
59b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /sgo'i pad+ma rnams la he ru ka dang shin tu dpa' mo dag dang/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen mo dag dang/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ 'khor los sgyur ma dag dang/ rdo rje seMs dpa' dang/ brtson 'grus chen mo
59b7(rgyud 'grel): dag gi sna tshogs rdo rje rnams so/ /khor yug gi dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'o/ /gzhal yas khang chen po'i sgo rnams la khwa gdong ma dang/ 'ug gdong ma dang/ khyi gdong ma dang/ phag gdong ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ zhags pa dang /
60a1(rgyud 'grel): lcags sgrog dang/ dril bu'o/ /mtshams rnams su gshin rje brtan ma dang/ gshin rje pho nya ma dang/ gshin rje mche ba ma dang/ gshin rje 'joms ma rnams kyi me long dang/ pi wang dang/ dri'i dung dang/ ro'i snod rnams so/ /
60a2(rgyud 'grel): bum pa rnams ni ji ltar rig par ro/ /de ltar brjod pa'i rjes su 'brangs te dkyil 'khor gzhan rnams la rdul tshon dgye ba yang shes par bya ste/ gzhung mngas bas 'jigs pas ma bstan to/ /dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la ni tshon gyi kha
60a3(rgyud 'grel): dog gi rim pa bshad pa dag dang phal cher mi mthun pas/ rdul tshon gyi kha dog gi rim pa brjod par bya'o/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje'i phreng ba gnyis pa'i bar gyi nang gi sa thams cad ni nag po'o/ /thugs dang/ gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor
60a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi shar gyis thams cad ni nag po'o/ /lho ni dmar po'o/ /nub ni ser po'o/ /byang ni dkar po'o/ /stegs bu ni dkar po'o/ /rin chen snam bu ni dmar po ste/ de la rin po che sna tshogs pas spras pa'o/ /dra ba dang pra phyed ba'i sa ni nag po ste/ de
60a5(rgyud 'grel): la dra ba dang dra ba phyed ni dkar po'o/ /sa nag po la rin chen shar bu dkar po'o/ /sa nag po la mnga' yab rnams dkar po'o/ /rta babs kyi ka ba rnams ser po'o/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la ni gtso bo'i pad+ma ljang gu'o/ /zhi ba la sogs pA ni kha dog
60a6(rgyud 'grel): dkar po la sogs bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje phreng ba dang/ ka ba bcu drug ni nag po ste/ shar du ral gri nag po dang/ lhor rin po che dmar po dang/ nub tu 'khor lo ser po dang/ /byang du pad+ma dkar po rnams dang ldan pa'o/ /bum pa brgyad ni pad+ma la gnas
60a7(rgyud 'grel): shing dkar po ste/ pad+mas kha brgyan pa'o/ /thams cad du pad+ma'i gdan gyi sum cha ni lte ba'o/ /rdo rje phreng ba gnyis pa ni ljang gu'o/ /lha snam ni dkar po'o/ /rtsig pa'i re kha' gsum ni nang nas brtsams nas dkar po dang dmar po dang nag po'o/ /de
60b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis ni chad sur byas te/ de la cha re dor nas cha gnyis la re khA so so bya'o/ /sgo dang sgo khyud kyi mtshams su rdo rje dang rin po ches spras ba'o/ /rtab pas bcu gnyis ni kha dog sna tshogs pa'o/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dkar po'o/ /de'i pad+ma brgyad ni
60b2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba dang nyi ma dang bral ba ste/ phyogs rnams su dmar po dang/ mtshams rnams su dkar po'o/ /re khA lnga'i kha dog ni nang nas brtsams te ljang gu dang/ nag po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po rnams so/ /de rnams kyi sa cha bco lngar byas te der snga ma bzhin ra? kha
60b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams ni dkar po'o/ /de'i pad+ma rnams ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang bral ba'o/ /re khA lnga ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin no/ /rta babs kyi ka ba rnams kyi 'og gi stegs bu'i gnas sprul gyi gdan rnams te/ so sor cha chung bcu
60b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis so/ /de la shar gyi phyogs su nag po zlum po gnyis kyi steng du rgyal mtshan gnyis so/ /lhor gru gsum dmar po gnyis la bkra shis kyis mtshan pa'o/ /nub tu gru bzhi ser po gnyis la rdo rjes mtshan pa'o/ /byang du zla ba phyed pa'i rnam par dkar
60b5(rgyud 'grel): po gnyis pa la pad+mas mtshan pa'o/ /shar gyi g.yas kyi zlum po'i g.yas su klu'i rgyal po rgyal ba zhes pa'i bdud rtsi'i bum pa'o/ /nub kyi g.yon gyi gru bzhi pa'i g.yon du rnam par rgyal ba zhes pa'i bdud rtsi'i bum pa'o/ /shar gyi rta babs kyi
60b6(rgyud 'grel): rim pa dang po'i myos pa srung ba'i steng gi dbus kyi gru bzhi pa la chos kyi 'khor lo nag po /de'i g.yas dang g.yon du ri dags dang ri dags mo nag po'o/ /lhor bum pa bzang po dmar po'o/ /de'i g.yas dang g.yon du dung dang/ pad+ma dmar
60b7(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /nub tu byang chub kyi shing ser po'o/ /de'i g.yas dang g.yon dag tu mi 'am ci dang mi 'am ci mo ser po'o/ /byang du rnga'o che dkar po ste de'i g.yas dang g.yon du dbyug pa dang tho ba dkar pa'o/ /mnga' yab dang sa'i 'khor yug gi dbus kyi sa ni nag
61a1(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /der ji ltar mdzes par mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bri bar bya'o/ /sa'i khor yug ni ser po'o/ /der dbang ldan gyi mtshams su zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba cha chung bcu gnyis pa dang/ bden bral du nub bzhin pI
61a2(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma cha chung bcu gnyis pa'o/ /chu'i khor yug dkar po'o/ /me'i khor yug dmar po'o/ /rlung gi khor yug nag po'o/ /me dang rlung gi khor yug de dag gi dbus su so sor cha chung bcu gnyis pa'i rtsibs brgyad pa'i dur khrod kyi 'khor lo brgyad
61a3(rgyud 'grel): de/ phyogs su dmar po rnams dang/ mtshams su dkar po rnams so/ /shar gyi 'khor lo'i phyi ngos su stong pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /nub kyi 'khor lo'i phyi ngos su yang stong pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /stong pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis 'dri ba ni sgrub thabs kyi le'ur gsung
61a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul gyis so/ /bcu char la yang mtshan ma ni gri gug go/ rlung gi khor yug la mtshan ma sna tshogs pa bri bar bya ste/ 'dir 'dod pa spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /nam mkha' i khor yug ni nag po'o/ /de'i logs gnyis su cha chung gsum gsum dor la der re khA
61a5(rgyud 'grel): zlum skor gnyis so/ /dbus kyi cha chung drug ni rdo rje phreng ba ljang gu bya'o/ /'od zer 'bar ba rnams ni kha dog rnam pa lnga'o/ /yang nang gi dkyil 'khor du shar phyogs kyi tshon nag po'i dpangs su nas kyi bzhi cha gcig go/ lho'i dmar po ni gnyis so/ /nub kyi
61a6(rgyud 'grel): ser po ni bzhi'o/ /byang gi dkar po ni gsum mo/ /rtsig pa'i re khA rnams kyi dpangs su rdul tshon ser po sum 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje phreng ba rnams kyang ngo/ /re khA gzhan ni tshon ser po las nyis 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma rnams ni snam bu las nyis 'gyur gyis so/ /
61a7(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla dag ni chu skyes kyi re khA las so/ /de ltar brjod pa'i dpangs las gsung gi dkyil 'khor la dpangs ni nyis 'gyur ro/ /de rnams las nyis 'gyur ni sku'i dkyil 'khor la'o/ /mnga' yab las phyi'i mchod pa'i sa la ni nas gcig go /sa pa
61b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i khor yug dang re khA zlum skor gnyis kyi dpangs ni sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa'i re khA'i tshad du'o/ /sa thams cad du rdul tshon gzhan dgyes pa thams cad ni nyis 'gyur gyi dbye bas mnyam pa'o/ /de la gtso bo'i lte bar lte ba dang mnyam pa'i dkar
61b2(rgyud 'grel): po dang dmar po dang nag po dang dmar po'i zla ba dang nyi ma dang/ sgra gcan dang dus kyi me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo'i rdo rje sngon po rtse gsum pa'o/ /shar gyi 'dab ma la spos phor nag po'o/ /lhor mar me dmar po'o/ /nub
61b3(rgyud 'grel): du dung ser po'o/ /byang du lha bshos dkar po'o/ /me la sogs par rnga yab nag po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po'o/ /de'i phyi ngos su dbang ldan du chos kyi dud dkar po'o/ /mer yid bzhin gyi nor bu nag po'o/ /bden bral du chos kyi gaN+Di dmar
61b4(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /rlung du dpag bsam gyi shing ser po'o/ /rim pa gnyis par shar du pad+ma dkar por nyi ma la ral gri nag po'o/ /mer pad+ma dmar por zla ba la utpa la sngon po'o/ /lhor pad+ma dkar por nyi ma la rin po che cha dgu pa dmar po'o/ /
61b5(rgyud 'grel): bden bral du pad+ma dmar por zla ba la pad+ma dmar po'o/ /nub tu pad+ma dkar por nyi ma la 'khor lo ser po'o/ rlung du pad+ma mar por zla ba la 'khor lo ser po'o/ /byang du pad+ma dkar por nyi ma la pad+ma dkar po'o/ /dbang ldan du pad+ma dmar por zla ba la utpa la dkar po'o
61b6(rgyud 'grel): rim pa gsum pa'i snam bu la sgo so so'i logs gnyis su gnyis te de ltar pad+ma brgyad do/ /de la drug rnams nyi ma la'o/ /nub dang byang gi sgo'i g.yon dag tu zla ba gnyis so/ /mtshams rnams su pad+ma dang zla ba bzhi ste de rnams su dbang ldan nas brtsams te me long
61b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdo rje dang/ ral gri dang/ gos dang rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang rdo rje dang ro'i snong dang/ chos 'byung dang/ 'khor lo dang/ dri'i dung dang/ pi wang dang/ pad+ma rnams te/ dkar po dang/ sngon po dang/ nag po dang/ nag po dang/ ljang gu dang/ dmar po
62a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ ser po dang/ ser po dang/ sngon po dang/ dkar po'o/ /shar sgo'i pad+ma dang nyi ma la ral gri nag po dang/ lhor dbyug pa dmar po dang/ nub tu pad+ma ser po dang/ byang du tho ba dkar po'o/ /'dir nyi ma'i
62a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rnams ni pad+ma dkar po la gnas shing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni pad+ma dmar la'o/ /shar gyi stegs bu la rta babs kyi ka ba'i rtsa ba'i g.yon du dung nag po dang/ g.yas su me tog sngon po'i phreng ba'o/ /lhor spos phor dmar po dang/ mar
62a3(rgyud 'grel): me'o/ /nub tu cod pan ser po dang/ do shal ser po'o/ /byang du 'bras bu dkar po dang bdud rtsi dkar pos gang ba'i snod do/ /stegs bu thams cad la ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams so/ /shar gyi rta babs kyi mchod pa'i lha mo'i
62a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas la dbus su gos so/ /lhor pad+ma'o/ do shal ser po'o/ /byang du 'bras bu dkar po dang bdud rtsi dkar pos gang ba'i snod do/ /stegs bu thams cad la ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams so/ /shar gyi rta babs kyi mchod pa'i lha mo'i
62a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams so/ /bden bral du shag ti dmar po rnams so/ /nub tu rdo rje ser po rnams so/ /rlung du tshangs pa'i dbyug gu rtse mo ser po can rnams so/ /byang du rtse gsum dkar po rnams so/ /dbang ldan du pad+ma dkar po rnams so/ /sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu la
62a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i lte ba dang 'dab ma rnams la mtshan ma rnams so/ /de la shar gyi sgo'i g.yas su ral gri rnams so/ /mer dpag bsam gyi shing rnams so/ /lho'i sgo'i g.yon du rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa rnams so/ /g.yas su shag ti rnams so/ /bden bral du shag ti
62a7(rgyud 'grel): 'am yang na mdud rnams so/ /nub kyi sgo'i g.yon du rin po che 'am/ dbyus to rnams so/ /g.yas su rdo rje rnams so/ /rlung du khab rnams so/ /byang sgo'i g.yon du rtse gsum rnams so/ /g.yas su zhags pa rnams so/ /dbang ldan du dgra sta rnams so/ /shar
62b1(rgyud 'grel): sgo'i g.yon du 'khor lo rnams so/ /shar sgor dbyug pa'o/ /de'i phyi rol tu rdo rje ljang gu'o/ /lho sgor mda' dmar po'o/ /nub sgor dbyug to ser po'o/ /de'i phyi ngos su rtse gsum sngon po'o/ /byang sgor gtun shing dkar po'o/ /dbyug pa la sogs pa'i
62b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma 'di rnams pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor dag gi phyogs kyi pad+ma rnams ni dmar po'o/ /mtshams kyi pad+ma rnams ni dkar po'o/ /'dir gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu la shar du sgo'i g.yas su utpa la dang/
62b3(rgyud 'grel): gos dang/ gri gug dang/ 'khor lo dang/ kha TwAM ga rnams nag bo'o/ /g.yon du gri gug dang/ ral gri dang/ gri gug rnams nag po'o/ /lho'i stegs bu la sgo'i g.yas su pad+ma dang/ ro'i snod dang/ dbyug pa dang/ shag ti dang/ pad+ma rnams
62b4(rgyud 'grel): dmar po'o/ /g.yon du mnga' dang/ gri gug dang/ gri gug rnams dmar po'o/ /nub sgo'i g.yas su 'khor lo dang/ dri'i dung chos dang/ rdo rje dang/ khab dang/ 'khor lo rnams ser po'o/ /g.yon du chos 'byung ljang gu dang/ 'khor lo dang/
62b5(rgyud 'grel): gri gug dang/ gri gug rnams ser po'o/ /byang du sgo'i g.yas su utpa la dang/ me long dang/ rtse gsum dang/ pad+ma dang/ utpa la rnams dkar po'o/ /g.yon du pi wang sngon po dang/ thob ba dang/ gri gug dang/ gri gug rnams dkar po'o/ /de ltar mtshan ma sum cu
62b6(rgyud 'grel): so drug po rnams ni sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu rnams la yang ngo/ /de nas 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor bris la rnam pa thams cad du bsal bar gyur par shes nas/ yi ge hUM dang/ 'khyil pa 'das pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang/
62b7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i dri'i chus dkyil 'khor gyi phyi ngos su byugs la de bzlas pa'i chus 'khor lo bsangs te rdul tshon lhag ma rnams la/ oM A:hUM badzra mu:zhes pas ye shes kyi tshon gshegs su gsol te/ snod na gnas pa'i tshon rnams dben par gzhag par
63a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /tshon dgye ba'i cho ga'o// //de nas sngar lhag par gnas par byas pa'i buM pa rnams g.yas skor du dgod par bya'o/ /de la 'khor lo'i dbang po'i rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la g.yas
63a2(rgyud 'grel): skor byas nas rdo rjer ba'i bdag nyid kyi khor yug dang/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i sa'i phyi ngos su dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo'i thad ka'i gnas las cung zad g.yas su gzhag par bya'o/ /g.yon logs su go rims bzhin g.yas skor du rnam par snang mdzad dang/
63a3(rgyud 'grel): spyan ma dang/ las thams cad pa'i bum pa rnams so/ /g.yas su gzugs rdo rje ma dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma dang /gshin rje gshed ma rnams kyi'o/ /lho'i g.yon du rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ mA ma kI dag gi dang/ g.yas su sgra rdo rje ma
63a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ shes rab mthar byed dag gi'o/ /nub kyi g.yon du snang ba mdza' yas dang/ gos dkar mo dag gi dang/ g.yas su dri rdo rje ma dang / pad+ma mthar byed ma dag gi'o/ /byung gi g.yon du don yod grub pa dang/ sgrol ma dag gi dang/ g.yas su
63a5(rgyud 'grel): ro rdo rje ma dang/ reg bya rdo rje ma dang/ bgegs mthar byed rnams kyi'o/ /kha cig ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa khro bo rnams kyi ni/ me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su'o/ /zhes so/ /gzhan ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de ma thag tu khro bo
63a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi rigs kyi yum rnams kyi ni sgo'i g.yas phyogs rnams su'o zhes so/ /'di'i rjes su 'brangs te phyogs gzhan rnams su yang dgod pa shes par bya'o/ /bzhed pa gzhan yang yod de des ci zhig bya / de lta bu de ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil
63a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du bum pa dgong pa'i tshul lo/ /bsdus pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor la g.yon du rigs kyi yum gyi de ma thag tu dang/ g.yas su yang dang por byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa rnams kyi'o/ /zur gyi khro bo rnams kyi zur rnams su'o/ /gshin rje
63b1(rgyud 'grel): gsheD? kyi rjes la gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'o/ /pad+ma mthar byed kyi rjes la gnod mdzes kyi zhes pa khyad par ro/ /'di'i rjes su 'brengs te dkyil 'khor gzhan rnams la bum pa dgod pa rtogs sla bas ma spros so/ /grwa'i bum pa rnams la sgro dang bcas
63b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mnga' bzhi ste/ oM badzra yak+Sha hUM zhes pa'i sngags kyis dgod do/ /dus kyi 'khor lo'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la ni phyi ngos su shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su bum pa bzhi'o/ /rgyal ba'i buM pa yang shar du ste lnga pa'o/ /de'i steng gi rnam par rgyal
63b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bum pa'i dung chos ni drug pa'o/ /de lta bu ni bum pa lnga pa'i phyogs la'o/ /bum pa bcu pa'i phyogs la ni phyogs brgyad du bum pa brgyad do/ /nub kyi bum pa las phyi ngos su sor gnyis spangs par rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'o/ /shar gyi bum pa la
63b4(rgyud 'grel): phyi ngos su sor gnyis spangs par rgyal ba'i bum pa'o/ /de'i steng du rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i bum pa dung chos ste bcu gcig pa'o/ /de ltar bum pa stong dang brgya rnams su yang zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang/ las thams cad pa la rnam par rgyal ba chen po
63b5(rgyud 'grel): dung chos yin no/ /bum pa dgod pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas dkyil 'khor la phyi ngos su phyogs bzhir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i dam pa'i chos bzhi klog tu gzhug par bya'o/ /ga bur dang/ a ku ra dang/ du ru ka la sogs pa'i spos
63b6(rgyud 'grel): phor? brgyad gzhag par bya'o/ /na bza' sna tshogs pa stong la sogs pa'am/ lha so so la re re 'am/ ji ltar nus pa yang rung ste/ slob ma la sogs par gzhag pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan rnams dang/ rta babs dang/ gos
63b7(rgyud 'grel): bzang po dang/ dril bu dang bcas pa'i rnga yab dang/ bum pa gang ba dang/ lo ma dang bcas pa'i chu shing gi sdong po'i ka ba rnams la yi ge hUM dang/ bdag po'i sngags kyi bzlas pa/ oM badzra spha ra Na kham zhes pas phul te/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin
64a1(rgyud 'grel): gshag par bya'o/ /de nas khrus byas te dri zhim po'i lus stod g.yogs dang gtsug tor dang rgyan dang bcas pa yis 'khyil pa bzlas pa'i chus dkyil 'khor bsangs te/ yi ge gsum dang 'khyil pa'i sngags kyi bsrungs nas rdo rje dang dril bu
64a2(rgyud 'grel): bzung ste/ shar gyi sgo dang/ nye bar nub tu kha bltas te 'dug la 'khor lo'i dbang po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bris pa'i dkyil 'khor skad cig gis stong pa nyid kyi rjes la bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang/ bgegs la phur bus gdab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga
64a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pas bsgom par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du nges par brtags nas/ btsun mo mdzes shing mdangs bzang ba/ lo grangs bcu drug lon rnyed nas/ /dri dang me tog rgyan byas te/ /de yi dbus su 'dod pa bya/ /yon tan ?
64a4(rgyud 'grel): rags mA ma kI/ /shes rab can gyis de byin brlabs/ /zhi ba spros byas sangs rgyas nas/ /nam mkha' i dbyings ni rab tu brgyan/ /ces gsungs pas bsgrubs pa'i phyi rol gyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par zhugs pas sam/ de med na ye shes kyi byang chub
64a5(rgyud 'grel): dang snyoms par 'jug pas kyang rung ste/ yang dag bar bskyod pa'i dga' ba'i sgras ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs la zhabs bsil dang/ mchod yon bul ba sngon du 'gro bas rang gi nang du bcug nas 'dod chags chen pos zhu bar gyur te/ rdo rje'i lam
64a6(rgyud 'grel): nas pad+mar phyung ba'i ye shes kyi lha'i 'khor lo'i bdag nyid spros te dam tshig gi 'khor lo la gnas ji lta bar zhugs par bsams nas mig dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i de ma thag tu rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i
64a7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ lha mo rnams kyis dbang bskur nas ji ltar rigs par rgyas gdab po/ /rigs mi shes pa rnams la ni mi bskyod pa'am rdo rje sems dpas so/ /de nas lha mo spros pa rnams kyis yid kyi rang bzhin gyi mchod pas mchod de/
64b1(rgyud 'grel): bsil ba'i gos dang/ gos zung dang/ bla res la sogs dar dbyangs dang/ yi ge gsum gyis bsngags pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dang bldag pa dang 'ji? pa dang btung ba'i nye bar spyod pa la sogs pa dang/ gser dang/ bu mo dang/ glang po che dang/ rta
64b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ba lang la sogs pa phul nas phyi rol gyi rnal 'byor ma bcu drug gam brgyad dam bzhi gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i ngo bo rnams kyi rang rang gi mchod pas mchod nas dril bu dkrol zhing mi bskyod rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pas bstod de/ rang
64b3(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab kyi me tog dang bcas pa'i byang chub kyi sems pad+ma'i snod du bcug nas bdud rtsir byas pa phul te/ de rnams bdud rtsi myang bas tshim par byas nas bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du mos par byas la 'khor lo'i dbang po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dang
