109b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan cing thugs ka'i sa bon dang ldan pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ lha mo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ khro bo la sogs pa dpag tu med pa spros te/ ji ltar gzhan la phan par nus pa'i chos ston pa la sogs pas
109b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan bsod nams kyi tshogs mthar phyin pa la bzhag cing/ bsdu ba'i byas pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i skur bskyed par bya'o/ /de la 'di'i yan lag la sogs pa ni sa 'og gi mthar thug par ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyad/ /gcig tu sra zhing
110a1(rgyud 'grel): mkhregs? la 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi dang bskal pa'i mdza' i me 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan pas mtshams bcing ba dang/ sa 'og nas steng gi bar du shin tu mtho zhing mkhregs la sra zhing 'bar ba'i rdo rje ra ba dang/ rdo
110a2(rgyud 'grel): rje'i ra ba'i steng du bar mtshams med par dum bu gcig tu gyur cing steng du rdo rje'i mda'i dra ba dang/ 'og tu rdo rje'i bla res brgyan pa'i rdo rje'i gur 'bar ba'o/ /de'i nang du gnas pa'i sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa ser po
110a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas skor du 'khor ba'o/ /de'i shar gyi rtsibs la gshin rje mthar byed nag po/ zhal dkar po dang dmar po rdo rje'i tho ba nag po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /lto'i rtsibs la shes rab mthar byed dkar po zhal nag po dang dmar po/ rdo rjes
110a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang/ ral gri dang/ nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /nub kyi rtsibs la pad+ma mthar byed dmar po zhal sngon po dang dkar po pad+ma dmar po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /byang gi rtsibs la bgegs mthar
110a5(rgyud 'grel): byed nag po zhal dkar po dang dmar po khro bo'i rdo rje dang ral gri dang nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /mer 'dod pa'i rgyal po sngon po zhal dkar po dang dmar po/ lcags kyu dang ral gri dang nor bu dang mtsho skyes 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du dbyug pa sngon
110a6(rgyud 'grel): po nag po zhal dkar po dang dmar po/ dbyug pa sngon po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du stobs po che nag po zhal dkar po dang dmar po/ /rtse gsum pa dang ral gri dang nor bu dang pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /dbang ldan du mi g.yo ba
110a7(rgyud 'grel): sngon po zhal dkar po dang dmar po ral gri dang rdo rje dang nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /steng du gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ser po zhal sngon po dang dmar po/ /'khor lo ser po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /'og tu gnod mdzes rgyal po sngon
110b1(rgyud 'grel): po zhal dkar po dang dmar po rdo rje dang ral gri dang nor bu dang pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /de la gtsug tor dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang mi g.yo ba dang gnod mdzes rnams ni rin po che'i cod pan can/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par gyur pa/ /mcheb? bcung zad
110b2(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs pa ston pa/ sma ra dang bral ba'o/ /de las gzhan pa rnams ni mi sdug pa'i gzugs can smin ma 'khyog pa dang bcas pa dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/ smin ma dang sma ra dmar ser dang bcas pa/ zhal gdangs pa/ mche ba gcigs
110b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ ljags 'gyur ba/ gang rgyangs dang ldan pa/ drag po'i klu brgyad kyis brgyan pa sku bong thung zhing rags pa lto ba 'phyang ba'o/ /bcu po 'di dag ni g.yon brkyang ba g.yas bskum pas rtsibs kyi rtse mo la cung zad ma reg ba'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang/ nyi ma'i
110b4(rgyud 'grel): gdan dang bcas pa brtan par gnas pa/ nyi ma'i 'od can shin tu khros pa dang 'bar bas shin tu 'jigs pa bskal pa 'jig pa'i dus kyi me lta bu'i 'od dang ldan pa'i rang gi sku'i sprul pa dpag tu med pa'i tshogs kyis kyang khams gsum mdza' yas
110b5(rgyud 'grel): pa na gnas pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs ma lus pa yang dang yang du brlag par byed pa phyag drug pa rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab la 'khyud pa zhal gsum pa khyad par du rtsa ba'i zhal gyi mdog ni sku mdog lta bu ste/ g.yas pa dang g.yon
110b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yi ni gong du brjod do/ /zhal re re la'ang dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum mo/ /'khor lo yang rgyun mi 'chad par drag tu 'khor bas brtan par gnas ba lta bu 'bar ba'i tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phro ba'o/ /de'i lte ba'i nang du 'og gi rtsibs kyi steng du chos
110b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byung gru gsum dkar po shin tu yangs pa'i nang du 'og gi zur la gnas pa'i sna tshogs pa'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje dang bcas pa'o/ /rdo rje de'i phyogs kyi rwa rnams dang lte ba ni ji ltar rigs par rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i mdog dang 'dra ba'o/ /
111a1(rgyud 'grel): der rin po che kha dog lnga las yongs su rdzogs pa thub pa'i dbang po'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba phyogs kyi 'khor lo thams cad sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer gyis khyab pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo/ /de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das dpal
111a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sku gur kum gyi mdog lta bu g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal nag po dang dkar po/ /rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab la 'khyud pa ral gri dang mda' dang utpa la dang gzhu 'dzin pa rin po che'i cod
111a3(rgyud 'grel): pan can/ rin po che sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ 'od zer mdza' yas pa'o/ /de'i shar gyi phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad dkar po g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal nag po dang dmar po dang rnam na 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dkar po dang/ ral
111a4(rgyud 'grel): gri dang nor bu dang pad+ma'o/ /ltor rin chen 'byung ldan ser po rin po che mar ga ta zur dgu pa dang/ ral gri dang 'khor lo dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu snang ba mdza' yas dmar? po pad+ma dmar po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang/ 'khor lo dang pad+ma
111a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du don yod grub pa ljang gu ral gri dang 'khor lo dang nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /'di gsum gyi g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal ni nag po dang dkar po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad rin po che'i cod pan dang ldan
111a6(rgyud 'grel): pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /mer sbyan ma rnams snang dang mtshungs pa'o/ /bden bral du mA ma kI mi bskyod pa lta bu utpa la dmar po dang/ ral gri dang nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa ste/ sgrub thabs thams cad las de ltar bshad pa'i phyir ro//
111a7(rgyud 'grel): rlung du gos dkar mo snang ba mdza' yas dang mtshungs pa'i dbang ldan du sgrol ma rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu utpa la ser po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /dbus kyi rim pa las phyi rol du me'i mtshams su gzugs rdo rje ma rnam
111b1(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad lta bu rin po che'i me long dang ral gri dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o/ /srin por sgra rdo ma mi bskyod pa lta bu pi wang sngon po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du dri rdo rje ma rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu dri chab kyi dud ser po dang ral gri dang
111b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dang/ chu skyes 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du ro rdo rje ma dang snang ba mdza' yas dang mtshungs pa ro'i snod dmar po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /shar sgo'i g.yon logs reg bya rdo rje ma don yod grub pa dang mtshungs pa gos sna tshoD
111b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ral gri dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o/ /shar sgo'i g.yas logs su chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma rdo rje sems dpa' dang mtshungs pa chos 'byung dkar po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha 'di rnams ni zhal
111b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa phyag drug pa phyag mtshan dang po gnyis ni g.yas pa dag gis so/ /gzhan gnyis ni g.yon pa dag gis 'dzin pa'o/ /thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i zhal ni sku mdog bzhin no/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo ru gshin rje mthar byed dang shes rab mthar byed dang
111b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma mthar byed dang bgegs mthar byed rnams so/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje dang rnam par snang mdzad dang lha dang lha mo rnams ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /gzhan ni nyi ma la'o/ /zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma'o/ /de bzhin
111b6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa rnams kyis gtso bo'i phyag dag gis rang 'od kyi shes rab dag la 'khyung pa ste de bzhin du shes rab rnams rang 'od kyi thabs la'o/ /dbu la rigs kyi bdag po ste 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i d bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mA ma kI dang
111b7(rgyud 'grel): smra? rdo rje ma dang/ ? ba'i 'khor lo'i khro bo brgyad la ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /spyan ma dang gzugs rdo rje ma dang gshin rje gshed rnams la ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /dri rdo rje ma la ni rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /gos dkar mo dang ro rdo rje ma dang pad+ma mthar byed rnams
112a1(rgyud 'grel): la 'od dpag med do/ /sgrol ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma la ni don yod grub pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma la ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /gzhan ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /'dir rdo rje sems dpa' ni sku mdog dkar po la cung zad dmar ba'i mdangS dang ldan pa
112a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa dang cig shes kyi zhal ni sngon po dang dmar po gtso bo'i phyag dag gis rang 'od kyi shes rab la 'khyud pa rdo rje sngon po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa sna tshogs rma? dang/ zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa zla ba'i mdog
112a3(rgyud 'grel): can rin po che'i cod? pan dang/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa dbu la mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa'o/ /'dir 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i thugs kar dam tshig sems dpa' lta bu'i ye shes sems dpa' de'i thugs kar zla bar ral gri'i yu ba la gnas pa'i
112a4(rgyud 'grel): sa bon maM? ngo/ /rtag pa dagn rin 'byung dang/ 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa dang mi bskyod pa rnams kyi thugs kar phyag mtshan la ji ltar rigs par zla ba 'am/ nyi ma la/ buM/ a'o/ dzrE/ khM hUM ngo/ /spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams/ laM/ maM/ pAM/ tAM/ dza:?
112a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): khaM raM mo/ /khro bo rnams la hUM ngo/ /lha thams cad kyi snying po'i sngags ni rdo rje phreng bar bshad do/ /'dir rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor du mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa dang/ ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug la sogs pa ni ma bshad do/ /
112a6(rgyud 'grel): de med kyang mig gi mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pas mdzes par byas pa'i yi dam gyi lha'i sku cig car kho na la legs par yongs su dag cing rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
112a7(rgyud 'grel): par rgyun du yang dang yang lhag par mos pa brtan par bya'o/ /snying po'i sngags la sogs pa brtan pa ni bum pa lhag par gnas pa la sogs pa la nye bar mkho ba'i phyed du'o/ /gang gi tshe dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gtso bor gyur pa?
112b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i dbus su gnas pa gzhan de'i gnas su dgod do/ /'od dpag med dkar por yang 'gyur te/ chos rnams dkar po'i rang bzhin gyis/ /'dir ni ngag gi dbang phyug dkar zhes gsungs pa'i phyir/ 'dir dang 'chad pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su gang gi
112b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i gtso bo'i gnas gang du bshad pa de nyid du gtso bo de dkyil 'khor gyi dbang po la mngon par phyogs shing dang 'khyud pa ni de la mngon du phyogs pa nyid de gzhan gyi gnas su phyin pa'i phyir ro/ /'dir ni gzhal yas khang gi yan
112b3(rgyud 'grel): lag rnam gsum ste/ rdo rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i rdo rje'i gur dang/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang/ chos 'byung ngo/ /de la rdo rje'i gur ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzhal yas khang thams cad la'o/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang/
112b4(rgyud 'grel): chos 'byung ni 'ga' zhig kho na la 'chad do/ /bri bar bya ba'i gzhal yas khang rnams la ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo chos 'byung ngam chos kyi dbyings kyi khongs su chud par mtshon pa'i ched du rdo rje phreng ba bri bar bshad do/ /ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nas
112b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas rdzogs rims kyi dkyil 'khor rtogs par bya ba'i ched du 'jig rten khams kyi khor yug mtshen pa'i rdo rje phreng ba bri ba ni nges par ro/ /'dir bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ni de ltar ma yin pas/ bri mi dgos te/ bgegs bzlog pa ni
112b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis kyang byed pas so/ /gzhan yang stong pa nyid kho na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bgegs kyi tshogs ma lus pa rtsa ba dang bcas pa brlag par byed pa'i nus pa rab tu gyur pas/ de la lhag par mos pa brtan pa nyid bskyed pa'i ched du
112b7(rgyud 'grel): bri ba'i dkyil 'khor la bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bri bar ma bstan to/ /bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor la yang kha cig tu bsgom par gsungs pa las thams cad du ma yin no/ /bgegs bsal ba'i rjes la stong pa nyid la rab tu zhugs
113a1(rgyud 'grel): pas bsgom par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la bsrung ba'i 'khor lo med de de'i phyir mi 'dri'o zhe na/ de ltar na khor yug mtshon pa'i rdo rje'i rab yang mi 'dri bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na gzhal yas khang bskyed pa'i dus su de yang bskyed do/ /
113a2(rgyud 'grel): zhe na/ ma yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rjer ba lan gnyis bskyed par ni gang nas kyang ma gsungs so/ /lan gnyis bskyed pas ci zhig bya cig car rdzogs pa nyid kyang rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang mtshams bcing ba dang rdo rje'i ri ba la sogs kun brtags mdza' 
113a3(rgyud 'grel): dag stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i ngo bor gnas pa nyid do/ /des ni bsrung ba'i 'khor lo yod kyang dkyil 'khor du mi bri ba'i 'thad pa brjod pa nyid do/ /kha cig ni kha cig la bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bri bar bya'o zhes 'dod do zhes bya ba ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i
113a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ro// //bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni gzhal yas khang gi bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /khro bo rnams kyi khyad par ni bshad par bya'o/ /gzhal yas khang gi dbus su mi bskyod pa nag po drag
113a5(rgyud 'grel): po g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal dkar po dang dmar po phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis khro bo'i rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang pad+ma bsnams pa/ /g.yon pa rnams ni dril bu dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang ral gri 'dzin pa rang dang 'dra ba'i reg bya rdom la 'khyud pa'o//
113a6(rgyud 'grel): de'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su rnaM par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang/ me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su spyan ma la sogs pa'o/ /de la rnam par snang mdzad ni zhi ba dkar po'o/ /zhal dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang
113a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dkar po dang dril bu dang nor bu dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /bshad zin dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag mtshan rnams dang po nas rim pa bzhin du phyag g.yas par steng nas 'og tu dang/ g.yon par 'og na steng du rig par bya'o/ /rin
113b1(rgyud 'grel): chen 'byung ldan ni ser po ste zhal ser po dang nag po dang dkar po'o/ /zhal gyi mdog gsum ni rim pa bzhin du rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon yin no/ /nor bu dang rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang/ dril bu dang pad+ma ser po dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /snang ba mdza' 
113b2(rgyud 'grel): yas dmar po zhal dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po phyag g.yon pas dril bu dang bcas pa'i pad+ma dmar po'i yu ba thugs kar bzung ba/ phyag g.yas pas kha 'byed pa'o/ /gzhan rnams kyis rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang/ ral gri 'dzin
113b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /don yod grub pa ni ljang gu dang nag po dang dkar po ral gri dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang dril bu dang pad+ma ljang gu dang nor bu 'dzin pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po 'di dang 'chad par 'gyur pa'i kun tu bzang po'i bar ni ral pa'i thor
113b4(rgyud 'grel): cog dang rin po che'i cod pan dang rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /spyan ma ni rnam par snang mdzad dang mtshungs pa ste/ 'on kyang pad+ma dkar po'i gnas su utpa la dkar po'o/ /mA ma kI ni mi bskyod pa lta bu ste 'on kyang pad+ma'i gnas
113b5(rgyud 'grel): su utpa la sngon dmar ro/ /gos dkar mo ni snang ba mdza' yas dang mtshungs pa'o/ /sgrol ma ni don yod grub pa lta bu sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang utpa la sngo ser dang dril bu dang nor bu rin po che dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /rim pa gnyis par me'i
113b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su gzugs rdo rje ma spyan ma lta bu ste 'on kyang dang po'i phyag dag gis me long dmar po 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du sgra rdo rje ma ser mo zhal ser po dang nag po dkar po dang ldan pa rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis pi wang sngon po sbreng ba'o/ /phyag
113b7(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma rnams kyis rdo rje dang utpa la sngon po dang rin po che dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du dri rdo rje ma ni gos dkar mo lta bu rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis dri'i dung chos ser po 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du ro rdo rje ma ljang gu zhal ljang gu dang nag po
114a1(rgyud 'grel): dang dkar po phyag dang po gnyis ro'i snod dmar po 'dzin pa'o/ /lhag ma rnams kyis rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /rim pa gsum pa'i shar gyi snam bu la byams pa dang sa'i snying po'o/ /lho'i snam bu
114a2(rgyud 'grel): la phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha' i snying po'o/ /nub kyi snam bu la spyan ras gzigs dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs so/ /byang du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang kun tu bzang po'o/ /brgyad po 'di dag ni rang gi rigs kyi bdag po dang mtshungs pa ste 'on kyang
114a3(rgyud 'grel): byams pa ni rtsa ba'i phyag gis 'khor los mtshan pa'i yal ga dang bcas pa'i klu shing gi me tog 'dzin pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo dang me la sogs pa'i mtshams dang steng dang 'og tu go rims bzhin du khro bo bcu'o/ /de la gshin rje
114a4(rgyud 'grel): gshed ni nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po rdo rje'i tho ba dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang thugs kar zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdig mdzub dang/ dril bu dang/ dgra sta 'dzin pa'o/ /shes rab mthar byed ni dkar po zhal dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po/ /rdo rje
114a5(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang/ ral gri dang thugs kar zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdig mdzub dang dril bu dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o/ /pad+ma mthar byed ni dmar po zhal dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po/ /pad+ma dmar po dang ral gri dang
114a6(rgyud 'grel): gtun shing dang dril bu dang/ dgra sta dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /bgegs mthar byed ni sngon po zhal sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po/ /sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang gtun shing dang zhags pa dang bcas pa'i bsdigs mdzub dang ?
114a7(rgyud 'grel): dril bu dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o/ /mi g.yo ba ni sngon po zhal sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po/ ral gri dang rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang sdigs mdzub dang dgra sta dang/ zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po ni sngon po zhal sngon po dkar po dang dmar po/ /phyag
114b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa gzhan rnams kyi rdo rje dang ral gri dang/ zhags pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /dbyug pa sngon po ni nag po zhal nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po/ rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang/ ral gri dang 'khor lo dang
114b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs kar zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang/ pad+ma dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o/ /stobs po che ni nag po zhal nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po/ /rdo rje mtshan pa'i dbyug pa nag po dang ral gri dang 'khor lo dang thugs kar zhags pa dang bcas pa'i
114b3(rgyud 'grel): sdigs mdzub dang pad+ma dang dgra sta 'dzin ba'o/ /gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba ni nag po zhal nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po/ rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis gtsug tor spyi bor 'dzin pa'o/ /phyag lhag ma rnams kyis rdo rje dang pad+ma dang sdigs mdzub dang ral
114b4(rgyud 'grel): gri rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo gan rgyal du mnyam par brkyang ba'i srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo'i steng du mthe bo gnyis kyi sen mos mnan te mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ngo/ /de bzhin du gung mo gnyis kyi sen mo mnyam par yang dag par
114b5(rgyud 'grel): rtse sbrang la/ /mdzub? mo gnyis dbus su rwa rnam pa ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /zhes kha cig go/ 'ga' zhig tu ni gzhan no/ /gnod mdzes rgyal po nag po dang zhal nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po/ rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang
114b6(rgyud 'grel): rin po che dang thugs kar zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang pad+ma dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa 'di dag ni sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du go rims bzhin du rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang 'khor lo dang rin po che mar ga ta cha dgu pa dang pad+ma
114b7(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang klu shing gi me tog dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang rdo rje dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang rdo rje dang tho ba dang pad+ma dmar po dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje dang ral gri'i yu ba
115a1(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rje dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang dbyug pa nag po dang rdo rje dang rdo rje la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dang zla ba la bzhugs pa zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o/ /yang gzhan nas ni rang rang gi lha'i mdog lta bu'i rin po che
115a2(rgyud 'grel): las byas pa'o/ /de la rnam par snang mdzad dang lha mo rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams zla ba la gnas pa'o/ 1 /gzhan rnams ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams ni rdo rje'i skyil krung can no/ /khro bo rnams ni zhabs
115a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon brkyang ba g.yas bskum pa zhal so so la dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum mnga' ba sgra sgrogs shing 'bar ba ste/ shin tu 'jigs pa bsrung ba'i 'khor lor brjod pa'i 'jigs pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'o/ /'dir
115a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po kho na yum dang bcas pa ste gnod mdzes kyi bar du lta gzhan rnams yum med pa'o/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i gshin rje gshed la sogs pa ni rang gi 'od kyi shes rab dang bcas pa ste de rnams ni go rims bzhin du rdo rje ro
115a5(rgyud 'grel): langs ma dang/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang/ khro gnyer can dang ral pa gcig ma dang/ sna tshoD rdo rje ma dang/ sna tshogs rin chen ma dang/ sna tshoD pad+ma dang/ sna tshoD laS ma dang/ nam mkha' 'gro rdo rje ma dang/ sa 'dzin ma rnams so/ /mi bskyod pa'i thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' 
115a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis pa dmar po yum dang bcas pa'o/ /de'i thugs kar ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' hUM nag po'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi oM/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi swA /snang ba mdza' yas kyi A(rgyud 'grel): /don yod grub pa'i hA/ spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyi lA
115a7(rgyud 'grel): mAM pAM tAM/ dza:hUM baM ho:reg bya rdo rje ma'i khaM ngo/ /byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po rnams kyi mai? thliM/ oM oM oM hUM oM saM ngo/ /khro bo bcu po rnams kyi hUM ngo/ /lha rnams kyi snying po'i sngags ni rdo rje phreng bar brjod do/ /rigs kyi bdag po ni mi
115b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa dang kun tu bzang po gnyis kyi gong du brjod pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ 'on kyang rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang/ pad+ma dang dril bu dang/ nor bu dang ral gri 'dzin pa rang 'dra ba'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas yang dag par 'khyud pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
115b2(rgyud 'grel): dang mA ma kI dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang 'jam dpal dang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang/ gnod mdzes rgyal po rnams kyi ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /spyan ma dang gzugs rdo rje ma dang/ byams pa dang sa'i snying po dang gshin rje gshed dang mi g.yo ba rnams kyi rnam
115b3(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad do/ /sgra rdo rje ma dang nam mkha' i snying po dang/ shes rab mthar byed dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi ni rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /gos dkar mo dang/ dri rdo rje ma dang/ spyan ras gzigs dang pad+ma mthar byed dang dbyug pa sngon po rnams kyi ni snang ba mdza' yas so//
115b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma dang ro rdo rje ma dang reg rdo rje ma dang sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang/ bgegs mthar byed dang/ stobs po che rnams kyi ni don yod grub pa'o/ /rgyas 'debs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rang 'od kyi yum dang bcas pa'o/ /dpal kun tu kha sbyor gyi
115b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyud las gsungs pa yi/ rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus su rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor dang ri rab kyi steng du ches 'byung gi dkyil du gzhal yas khang ngo/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lor gshin
115b6(rgyud 'grel): rje gshed phyag g.yas pa gsum gyis rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje rnams bsnams pa/ g.yon gsum gyis snying gar sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang dril bu dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o/ /shes rab mthar byed ni rdo rje zhags pa dang ral gri
115b7(rgyud 'grel): dang snying gar sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o/ /pad+ma mthar byed ni lcags sgrog dang pad+ma dang ral gri dang/ dril bu dang dgra sta dang zhags pa'o/ /bgegs dgra ni rdo rje dril bu dang rdo rje rgya gram dang 'khor lo dang/ snying gar sdigs mdzub dang bcas
116a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zhags pa dang gtun shing dang dgra sta'o/ /mi g.yo ba ni ral gri dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub dang dgra sta dang zhags pa'o/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po ni g.yas dang cig shos kyi phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang
116a2(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu dang ral gri dang/ rdo rje dang zhags pa'o/ /dbyug pa sngon po ni rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang/ ral gri dang 'khor lo dang/ sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang pad+ma dang dgra sta'o/ /stobs po chen rtse gsum pa dang ral gri
116a3(rgyud 'grel): dang 'khor lo dang snying gar sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang pad+ma dang dgra sta'o/ /gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ni g.yas dang/ cig shos kyi phyag dang po gnyis kyis spyi bor gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang 'khor lo dang pad+ma dang sdigs mdzub dang ral
116a4(rgyud 'grel): gri'o/ /gnod mdzes ni rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin po che'o/ /snying gar sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang pad+ma dang ral gri'o/ /bcu po 'di dag ni dbu la thod pa lngas brgyan pa 'khor lo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa mi mgo'i phred pa rke la
116a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byang ba go rims bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa dang rtag pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa dang mi bskyod pa dang mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa'o/ /gzhal yas
116a6(rgyud 'grel): khang gi dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' zhal 'dzum pa bcas pa'i sku mdog dkar po la cung zad? dmar ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa ral pa'i thor cog nag po la gnas pa'i nor bu dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang de'i 'og tu g.yon ngos su gnas pa'i zla ba phyed pa dri ma med
116a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can dpral ba'i steng du thod pa lnga dang gtsug gi 'khor lo dang/ rna cha dang mgul rgyan dang lag gdub dang ska rags dang thal ba rnams kyi brgyan ba zhal gsum pa g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal sngon po dang dmar
116b1(rgyud 'grel): po zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa phyag drug pa rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bus rnam par mdzes pa'i phyag gnyis yis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab la 'khyud cing chu skyes la mnyam par sbyor ba'i dga' ba dang ldan pa phyag g.yas pa dag gis ral gri dang lcags
116b2(rgyud 'grel): kyu 'dzin pa g.yon pa dag giS thod pa dang zhags pa 'dzin pa nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can sna tshogs pad+ma dang thod pa dang zla ba'i gdan la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa'o/ /de'i thugs kar sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la ye shes
116b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' sku mdog dkar dmar sems dpa' i skyil krung can/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyis spras pa rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab la 'khyud pa/ de'i thugs kar zla ba la ting nge
116b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin sems dpa' i rang bzhin hUM nag po'i rnam pa'o/ /'dir sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can rdo rje 'chang gi shar du rnam par snang mdzad dkar po zhi ba phyag g.yas pa dag gis 'khor lo dang dril bu dang g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang zhags pa rnams so//
116b5(rgyud 'grel): lhor rin chen 'byung ldan ser po phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis rin po che dang lcags kyu g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /nub tu 'od dpag med dmar po phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis mda' dang pad+ma g.yon pa dag gis
116b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du don yod grub pa ljang gu phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang lcags kyu/ g.yon pa dag gis dril bu dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du spyan ma dkar mo phyag brgyad ma g.yas rnams kyis 'khor lo dang
116b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' rnams so/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis thod pa dang dril bu dang zhags pa dang gzhu rnams so/ /mer mA ma kI sngon mo phyag bcu gnyis pa g.yas pa rnams kyis mda' dang ral gri dang rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang/ rin po che dang pad+ma'o/ /g.yon pa rnams
117a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis gzhu dang lcags kyu dang dril bu dang zhags pa dang thod pa dang kha TwAM ga'o/ /bden bral du gos dkar mo dmar mo phyag brgyad ma g.yas rnams kyis mda' dang pad+ma dang ral gri dang rdo rje rnams so/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis gzhu dang
117a2(rgyud 'grel): thod pa dang zhags pa dang/ dril bu rnams so/ /rlung du sgrol ma ljang gu phyag brgyad ma g.yas pa rnams kyi utpa la dmar po dang ral gri dang/ lcags kyu dang mda'o/ /cig shos rnams kyis 'khor lo dang zhags pa dang thod pa dang gzhu rnams so/ /rim pa gnyis
117a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la shar gyi phyogs su rdo rje drag po dkar mo phyag na mnga' dang/ lcags kyu dang gzhu dang byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor rdo rje gzugs ma ser mo phyag na rdo rje dang/ mdung dang zhags pa dang thod pa dang khrag gis gang ba'o/ /nub tu 'dod
117a4(rgyud 'grel): chags rdo rje ma dmar me phyag na ral gri dang rdo rje dang chus gang ba'i thod pa dang dril bu'o/ /byang du rdo rje zhi ba ma ljang gu ni phyag na tal ba thung du dang ba dan gsum pa dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha TwAM ga dang sman gyis gang ba'i thod pa rnams so/ /dbang ldan du rdo rje
117a5(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin ma ni dkar ser gyi mdog la phyag na dbyug to dang utpa la dang thod pa dang DA ma ru'o/ /mer rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dmar ser phyag na pad+ma dang me long dang/ rkang mar gyis gang ba'i thod pa dang dgra sta'o/ /bden bral du sgra rdo rje ma sngon dmar phyag na
117a6(rgyud 'grel): sha gaM? ta dang dud dang 'khor lo dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa'o/ /rlung du sa rdo rje ma dkar ljang pad+ma dang rdo rje dang bdud rtsi lnga dang sha ldas gang ba'i thod pa mi lpags kyis g.yogs pa dang dril bu'o/ /brgyad po 'di dag ni phyag bzhi pa dang po'i phyag
117a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan gnyis ni g.yas pa dag gis 'dzin pa gzhan gnyis ni g.yon pa dag gis 'dzin pa'o/ /rim pa gsum pa'i shar du bzhad ma dmar mo phyag gnyis rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pas mngon par bzhad pa'i tshul can no/ /lhor sgeg
117b1(rgyud 'grel): mo sngon mo phyag gnyis rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas bsnyems pa dang bcas pas mngon par sgeg pa'i tshul can no/ /nub tu glu ma ser mo ni sku cung zad g.yo zhing sgeg pa'i phyag gnyis kyis ting ting shag 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du gar ma ljang gu pang skor gyi tshul
117b2(rgyud 'grel): la sa gag? pa'i gar gyis g.yo ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang/ rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du gling bu ma dmar mo'o/ /mer pi wang ma ser mo phyag gnyis ma sgeg mo'i nyams kyis bag tsam lus g.yo ba'o/ /bden bral du mu kun
117b3(rgyud 'grel): Da ma dkar mo'o/ /rlung du rdza rngam du ba'i mdog can no/ /bzhi po 'di dag ni phyag gnyis kyis rang rang gi rol cha brdung ba'o/ /de nas phyi'i snam bu la me'i mtshams su me tog ma dkar mo phyag g.yon gyis me tog gi phreng ba dang cig shos kyis 'khor lo 'dzin
117b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /bden bral du bdug spos ma du ba'i mdog can phyag g.yon gyis bdug spos kyi snod dang cig shos kyis rin po che 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du mar ne ma gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yon du mar me'i skong bu g.yas su pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du dri chab ma
117b5(rgyud 'grel): dmar mo phyag g.yon gyis dre'i dung chos dang cig shos kyis ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /shar gyi phyogs su me long ma dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis me long 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor ro ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis ro'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu reg ma ljang gu phyag
117b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis gos sna tshogs 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du chos ma dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis chos 'byung dkar po 'dzin pa'o/ /'di rnams dang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha rnams ni zhal gcig spyan gsum pa ral pa'i cod pan nag po la zod pa lnga dang
117b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo la sogs pas brgyan pa lha'i na bza' gon pa skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa'o/ /shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu ma nam mkha' i mdog lta bu sngo bsangs zhal g.yas nag po g.yon dkar po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis lcags kyu
118a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ral gri dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon rnams kyis zhags pa dang sdigs mdzub dang dril bu'o/ /lho sgor rdo rje zhags pa ma dkar ser zhal g.yas nag po g.yon dmar po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis zhags pa dang/ /
118a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang dril bu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa'o/ /nub sgor rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dmar mo zhal g.yas nag po g.yon dkar po phyag drug pa g.yas rnams kyi lcags sgrog dang rdo rje dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon
118a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis 'khor lo dang dril bu dang lcags kyu'o/ /byang du rdo rje dril bu ma ljang gu zhal g.yas nag po g.yon dkar po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis dril bu dang rdo rje dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang lcags kyu dang zhags pa'o/ /bzhi po
118a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni zhal re re la spyan gsug ? dang ldan pa dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du brdzes pa thod pa lnga dang 'khor lo la sogs pas brgyan pa stag gi pags pa gon pa zhabs g.yas brkyang ba g.yon bskum pas gar byed pa'i tshul gyis sna tshogs
118a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang thod pa dang nyi ma la bzhugs pa'o/ /rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dang ga med dang/ don yod grub pa rnams sna tshogs pad+ma dang thod pa dang nyi ma'i gdan la'o/ /lha gzhan thams cad ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang thod pa dang zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa'o/ /
118a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyang nyi ma'i 'od zer can kho na'o/ /'dir rdo rje sems dpa' kho na shes rab dang bcas pa ste/ lha gzhan thams cad shes rab dang bral ba'o zhes pa ni phyogs gcig go/ rang lta bu'i shes rab ma dang bcas pa zhes pa ni phyogs gnyis pa'o/ /rigs
118a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi bdag po ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mA ma kI dang sgra rdo rje ma dang glu ma dang reg rdo rje ma dang choS kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma rnaMs kyi mi bskyod pa'o/ /spyan ma dang rdo rje drag mo dang sa'i rdo rje ma dang me tog ma dang/ bzhad ma dang
118b1(rgyud 'grel): gling bu ma dang rdo rje lcags kyu ma rnams kyi rnam par snang mdzad do/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje sku ma dang rdo rje bdug spos ma dang/ sgeg mo dang pi wang ma dang rdo rje zhagS pa ma rnams kyi rin 'byung ngo/ /gos dkar mo dang rdo rje chags pa ma dang/ mar me ma dang dri chab ma
118b2(rgyud 'grel): dang mu kun Da ma dang lcags sgrog ma rnams kyi snang ba mdza' yas so/ /sgrol ma dang rdo rje zhi ba ma dang rdo rje gnod sbyin ma dang/ gar ma dang re ma dang/ rdza rnga ma dang dril bu ma rnaMs kyi don yod grub pa'o/ /thugs ka'i sa bon ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa
118b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams dkyil 'khor la dgod pa'i rim pas/ hUM buM/ AM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): khaM b+hUM(rgyud 'grel): hUM h+rI:taM aM AM:aiM a'iM:auM a'uM(rgyud 'grel): oM A(rgyud 'grel): raM hAM/ AM rIM laM dzhaM liM/ /gaM baM lIM naM raM oM aauM oM iM dzA(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:zhes pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i snying po'i sngags ni/ oM badzrA mi ta ma hA
118b4(rgyud 'grel): su kha haM swAhA zhes pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu'i sngags oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra g+heN+Da ho(rgyud 'grel): haM swAhA zhes pa ni thams cad pa'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa la ni 'khor lo'i gtso bo'i snying po'i sngags nyid kyis lha gzhan rnams kyi snying po'i sngags kyi bsgrub bya
118b5(rgyud 'grel): yang 'grub par 'gyur bas de rnams ni ma bris te gzhung mangs pas 'jigs pas so/ /de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma yang rig par bya'o/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du sna tshogs pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte bar gnas
118b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su gdugs dkar po dang bcas pa'i seng+ge la gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi mar ye shes mkha' 'gro ma sngon mo'o/ /'di'i cod pan dar gyis bcings pa'i steng du rdo rjes mtshan pa sangs rgyas lnga 'od 'phro bas brgyan
118b7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ rtsa ba'i zhal khro zhing gang rgyangs dang bcas pa/ g.yas dkar ba bzhad pa dang bcas pa/ g.yon dmar bsgeg pa dang bcas pa/ zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa/ g.yas pa'i phyag gsum na steng du bstan pa'i kha TwAM ga dang dag sta dang rdo rje'o/ /
119a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi gsum la dril bu dang khrag gis bkang ba thod pa dang ral gri rnams so/ /'di'i shar phyogs su rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o/ /byang phyogs su 'jigs byed mkha' 'gro ma gser gyi mdog can no/ /nub tu ro
119a2(rgyud 'grel): langs ma dmar mo'o/ /lho phyogs su gtum mo sngon mo'o/ /bzhi po 'di dag kyang seng ge la gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gnyis kyi steng du bsgreng ba'i kha TwAM ga dang khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan
119a3(rgyud 'grel): du seng+ge mo ni seng+ge'i gdong ba can g.yas ser g.yon dkar ba'i lus phyed pa'i glang po che dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /me'i mtshams su stag mo stag ? gi g.yon sngon mo g.yas dkar ba phyed phyed kyi sku rin po che bdun gyi phung po la gnas pa'o/ /srin
119a4(rgyud 'grel): po'i mtshams su ce spyang ma ce spyang gi gdong pa can g.yas dmar ba g.yon nag po'i lus phyed phyed pa ma he la bzhugs pa'o/ /rlung gi mtshams su 'ug pa ma 'ug go? pa'i gdon can g.yon pa dang g.yas pa'i lus phyed phyed pa ser po dang dmar po'o/ /
119a5(rgyud 'grel): glu? brgyad kyi gzhug mo rnams la bzhugs pa'o/ /bzhi po 'di dag ni g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i rdo rje zhags pas brgyan cing sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ de'i shar sgor rgyal ba'i dbang
119a6(rgyud 'grel): phyug ma dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis thal mo khar bcug pa'o/ /byang du gsal byang ma ser mo mar ma lta bu'i thal mo kha sbyar ba spyi bor 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu 'jigs byed ma dmar mo khrag gis gang ba'i snyim pa steng du byas te kha'i thad kar bzung nas khrag gis
119a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyun bzung bar byed pa'o/ /lhor skam po dzi nag po rdo rje'i snyim pa la mtho ba'i rtse mo gnyis phan tshun sbyar te sdigs mdzub gnyis kyi rtse mo brkyang ba sbyar nas rang gi gsang ba'i gnas ston bar byed pa'o/ /bzhi po 'di dag ni sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i ?
119b1(rgyud 'grel): dags kyi snying gar nyi ma'i gdan la gzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis ni zhal cig la spyan gsum pa'o/ /lha mo bcu gsum po thams cad kyang lha'i gos dmar po bsnams pa dbu la thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya lnga dang
119b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa sems dpa' i skyil krung can? klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan pa bskal pa'i mdza' i me 'bar ba'i 'od lta bu'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis 'jiD par byed pa go rims bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mdza' yas dang/
119b3(rgyud 'grel): don yod grub pa dang mi bskyod pa dang/ /rnam snang dang rin 'byung dang snang mdza' dang/ rtag pa dang 'od dpag med dang/ don yod grub pa rnams kyis rgyas btab pa'o/ /hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ iM a'iM a'iM ri liM iM aauM A(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams ni thugs ka'i sa bon rnams so/ /oM h+ri:
119b4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes bya ba ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po'i sngags so/ /oM bait+ta la'i hUM swAhA/ zhes bya ba ni ro langs ma'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o/ /bcu bdun gyi bdag nyid kyi kyi'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi dkyil na gnas pa'i gzhal
119b5(rgyud 'grel): yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la gnas pa'i ro'i snying gar gnas pa'i khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa'i steng du nyi ma la kye'i rdo rje rnam pa gsum mo/ /bzhi pa la ni ro dang bral ba'o/ /de la 'jig rten gsum kun tu bskyod pa nag po sna tshogs rdo
119b6(rgyud 'grel): rjes mtshan pa dub skra kham ser gyen du brdzes pa thong pa lnga dang phyag rgya drug dang mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o/ /rgyab kyi char stag gi pags pa'i smad dkris can zhabs g.yon pa'i brla la g.yas ba'i zhabs kyi rtse mo yang dag par bzhag pa'i skyil ?
119b7(rgyud 'grel): phyed pas gnas pa spyan gsum dmar ba zlum pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa phyag g.yon pas thod pa khrag gis gang ba rdo rjes mtshan pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin gyis bdag med ma la 'khyud pa/ phyag g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i dbyug
120a1(rgyud 'grel): pa brdeg pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa'o/ /yang na phyag bzhi pa phyag gnyis pa lta bu gzhan gnyis kyis bdag nyid lta bu'i rdo rje phag mo la yang dag par 'khyud pa'o/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni khyad par ro/ /yang na phyag drug pa nag po zhal gsuM
120a2(rgyud 'grel): pa nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po/ /zhal re re la spyan gsum pa ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa phyag g.yas pa rnams ni rdo rje dang mda' dang rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dril bu dang gzhu dang thod pa'o/ /rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu dang
120a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i phyag gnyis kyis bdag nyid lta bu'i rdo rje lu gu bzhin no/ /he ru ka 'di gsum gyi shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma bzhin no/ /he ru ka 'di gsum gyi shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma brgyad la rdo rje drag mo la sogs pa brgyad/ /de dag gi phyi rol du
120a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su gling bu ma dang pi wang ma dang mu kunDa ma dang rdza rnga ma rnams so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang/ rdo rje zhag spam dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang/ rdo rje dril bu ma rnams so/ /lha mo bcu drug po 'di
120a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni gong bzhin te/ yab dang bral ba'o/ /he ru ka gsum gyis rigs kyi bdag po mi bskyod pa'o/ /thugs ka'i sa bon hUM ngo/ /snying po'i sngags ni oM A:hUM h+ri:swAhA/ /so so'i sngags ni rim pa bzhin du oM tre lo kyA k+She pa hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/
120a6(rgyud 'grel): oM dzwa la dzwa la dzwa la b+hyo? hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ki Ti ki Ti badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA zhes so/ /kye'i rdo rje'i bzhi pa ni phyag bcu drug pa mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa bdag med ma dang snyoms par 'jug pa/ 'on kyang 'di la gang du bshad pa'i de'i gnas su bdud
120a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ste/ de la phung po'i bdud kyi rang bzhin tshangs pa ser po nyan mongs ba'i bdud khyab 'jug nag po/ 'chi bdag gi bdud dbang phyug chen po dkar po/ /lha'i bu'i bdud ni brgya byin kham ser po/ /der bcom ldan 'das zhabs bzhi pa'i zhabs
120b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis rdo rje'i skyil krung byed pa dang gzhan gnyis kyis ni g.yon bskum pa dang g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ sku mdog nag po dang sna tshogs rdo rje la sogs pa nas stag gi lpags pa'i bar du sngar bshad pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa zhal brgyad pa
120b2(rgyud 'grel): spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa rtsa ba'i zhal nag po gad mo can g.yas pa dkar po g.yon pa dmar po steng du gnas pa'i mche ba gtsigs pa lhag ma rnams ni nag po'o/ /g.yas pa'i phyag rnams ni rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang 'khor lo dang thod pa dang dbyug pa
120b3(rgyud 'grel): dang rtse gsum pa dang lcags kyu rnams so/ /g.yon pa rnams su dril bu dang pad+ma dang gzhu kha TwAM ga bsgreng ba dang thod pa dang rin po che dang sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa'o/ /shar gyi 'dab ma go rI dkar ser phyag g.yas pa gnyis na mda' phyung ba dang rdo rje gri gug go/
120b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gnyis na gzhu dang nya ro hi ta dang bcas pa'i khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa'o/ /lhor tso? ri dmar mo rdo rje dang DA ma ru dang lcags kyu dang phag pa dang bcas pa'i thod pa khrag gis gang ba'o/ /nub tu ro langs ma ni sku mdog dkar ser ral gri dang rus sbal
120b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i thod pa khrag gis gang ba dang chang gis gang ba'i thod pa dang dri chus gang ba'i thod pa'o/ /byang du bAsma? rI ljang gu cung zad ser ba rkang mar gyis gang ba'i thod pa gnas pa'i sprul dang mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i me
120b6(rgyud 'grel): thab dang dgra sta'o/ /dbang ldan du puk+ka sI ser mo shas gang ba'i thod pa la gnas pa'i seng+ge dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang dpag bsam shing gi yal ga dang rin po che'o/ /me'i mtshams su sha ba rI dkar mo byang chub sems kyis gang ba'i thod par
120b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i dge slong dang rdo rje dang kha TwAM ga dang zhags pa'o/ /srin bu'i mtshams su tsaN+Da li sngon po g.yas su khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa la sngag? dang g.yon du pad+ma dkar po dang phyag gnyis na rlung ras so/ /rlung gi mtshams su DaM bi ni nag mo chang gi thod pa dang rtse?
121a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum ba gyen du bstan pa dang bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i thod pa la gnas ba'i ce sbyang dang gshol lo/ /de dag gi phyi'i zung rnams su gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi snga ma bzhin du'o/ /shar gyi sgo ru rta gdong ma nag mo zhal rnams nag mo dang dkar
121a2(rgyud 'grel): po dang ser mo dang steng gi rta gdong ljang gu'o/ /lho ru phag gdong ma ser mo zhal rnams ni ser mo dang nag mo dang dkar mo'i steng du phag zhal dmar po'o/ /nub tu khyi gdong ma dmar mo zhal rnams ni dmar mo dang nag mo dang dkar mo'i steng du khyi
121a3(rgyud 'grel): gdong ser po'o/ /byang sgor seng gdong ma ljang gu zhal rnams ni ljang gu dang nag mo dang dkar mo'i steng du seng+ge'i gdong pa dmar po'o/ /'di ltar rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang cig shos dang steng gi rim pas zhal bzhi pa'o/ /sgo skyong ma rnams phyag
121a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhin du phyag mtshan 'dzin pa sna tshogs pad+ma dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa la gnas pa'i ro'i steng du g.yas bskum pa dang g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa dbu skra dmar se byen du brdzas pa'o/ /lha gzhan
121a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni skyil krung phyed pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad kyang zhal re re zhing spyan gsum pa phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan ba yab med pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo/ /snying po'i sngags ni/ oM de ba bi hUM badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/
121a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'o/ /g+hasma rI'i oM oM swAhA zhes pa ni las thams cad pa'i sngags so// //bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang gi chos 'byung gi dbus su gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi nang du sna tshogs pad+ma'i lta bar bdag
121a7(rgyud 'grel): med pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi pad+ma'i 'dab mar rdo rje ma dang go rI dang chung ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams so/ /rim pa gnyis par sna tshogs pad+ma rnams la shar la sogs par go ri tsa rI pe ta bI g+hasma rI rnams so/ /dbang ldan la sogs par ?
121b1(rgyud 'grel): ? dang sha ba rI dang tsat+ta ri dang DoM bi nI rnams so/ /bdag med ma'i steng gi shar ngos kyi pad+ma la gnas pa'i mkha' spyod ma steng zhal can no/ /'og gi nub ngos kyi pad+ma la gnas pa'i sa sbyong ? zhal can no/ /'dir phyi ma la gnas pa'i gau rI la sogs pa brgyad ni phyag bcu
121b2(rgyud 'grel): drug pa'i dkyil 'khor lta bu ser po la sogs pa'i mdog can no/ /gzhan bdun ni sngon mo'o/ /bco lnga po yang skyil krung phyed pas ro'i snying gar gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o/ /zhal gcig ba spyan gsum pa dmar ba dbu skra dmar ser
121b3(rgyud 'grel): gyen du brdzes pa stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can phyag bzhi pa g.yas dag gis rdo rje dang gri gug go/ g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang/ gyen du bsgreng ba'i nya TwAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /dbu la thod pa lnga'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa'o/ /zur rnaMs
121b4(rgyud 'grel): la gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi ni snga ma bzhin no/ /shar gyi sgor rta gdong ma dkar sngo/ lhor phag gdong ma ser sngo/ /nub tu khyi gdong ma dmar sde/ byang du seng gdong ma ljang sngo/ bzhi po 'di dag kyang g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum kyis nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /g.yas
121b5(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin ba ming gi rjes su mthun pa'i zhal gcig ma mdog gnyis gnyis dang ldan pa'o/ /'di dag gi khyad par gzhan ni bdag med ma dang mtshungs pa'o/ /bdag med ma la sogs pa rnams la ? bzhin
121b6(rgyud 'grel): du mi bskyod ba dang rtag pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mdza' yas dang/ don yod grub pa dang/ mi bskyod pa dang/ rtag pa dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang/ rnam bar snang mdzad dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ snang ba mdza' 
121b7(rgyud 'grel): yas dang/ rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod ba rnams kyis rgyas btab pa'o/ /gling bu ma la sogs pa dang rta gdong ma la sogs pa rnams la rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mdza' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams kyis so/ /bdag
122a1(rgyud 'grel): med ma'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni AM/ oM oM swAhA/ zhes bya ba ni g+hasma rI'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o/ /yang na bdag med ma la sogs pa lha mo bco lnga'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de la lha mo thams cad sku mdog nag mo g.yaS
122a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa mchod phyir thogs pa 'dra ba'i kha TwAM ga dang bcas pa'o/ /gzhan rnams ni gong bzhin no/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra g+hasma rI oM hUM swAhA/ zhes bya ba ni g+hasma rI'i sngags so// //gang gi tshe
122a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po ku ru kul+le dmar mo phyag bzhi ma g.yas gnyis kyis mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ g.yon gnyis kyis utpa la dmar po dang gzhu 'dzin pa zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa snang ba mdza' yas kyis rigs kyi bdag po
122a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa rdo rje ma la sogs pa bcu bzhi sku mdog dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin ba bco lnga bo thams cad kyang pad+ma dmar po dang ro'i snying gar zla ba la skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa'o/ /ku ru kul+le'i snying ga'i sa bon ni h+rI :aoM ? kul+le'i h+rI:
122a5(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sngags so/ /gzhan ni sngar bzhin du ste de'i tshe ku ru kul+le'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro// //rdo rje bdud rtsi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi dbus su gnas pa'i gzhal yas kha rig dbus su sna tshogs
122a6(rgyud 'grel): ? ze 'brur zla ba la dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi sems dpa' i skyil krung gis gnas pa me tog pri yang ku lta bu ljang ser rtsa ba dang g.yas ba dang g.yon pa'i zhal gsum me tog pri yang ku lta bu ljang ser dang dkar po dang dmar bo sna tshogs pa'i lag
122a7(rgyud 'grel): gdub dang rkang gdub la sogs pa dang gos rnams kyis brgyan pa phyag drug pa rdo rje dang dril bur bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rang 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa g.yas pa gnyis kyi 'khor lo dang/ ral gri g.yon pa gnyis kyi zhags pa dang lcaD
122b1(rgyud 'grel): kyu 'dzin pa 'od dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can zhi ba dang sgeg pa'i nyams kyis tshogs can no/ /shar gyi 'dab mar ni ba mo dkar mo zhal gsum ni dkar ba dang gnag pa dang dmar ba'o/ /lhor zhi gdong ma ser mo zhal gsum ni ser po dang/ dkar bo dmar
122b2(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /nub tu zla ldan ma dmar mo zhal gsum ni dmar bo dang nag po dang dkar po'o/ /byang du ri bong can ma ljang gu zhal gsum ni ljang gu dang dkar po dang dmar po'o/ /me'i mtshams su zla dkyil ma sngon mo zhal gsum ni sngon mo dang dkar po dang dmar po'o//
122b3(rgyud 'grel): bden bral du zla tshes ma me tog pri yang ku lta bu ljang ser mo zhal gsum ni ljang ser dang dkar po dang dmar po'o/ /rlung du yid 'ong ma utpal la sngon mo'i mdog can zhal gsum ni sngon mo dang dkar po dang dmar po'o/ /dbang ldan du yid tshim byed ma
122b4(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi mdog can ma zhal gsum ni ser po dang dkar po dang dmar po'o/ /lha mo 'di rnams ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i phyag mtshan lta bu 'dzin pa'o/ /'on kyang 'khor lo'i gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /zla tshes ma ni zla ba'i cha
122b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig 'dzin pa'o/ /rim pa gnyis par dbang ldan gyi mtshams su me tog ma dkar mo ni zhal gsum pa dkar po dang nag bo dang dmar bo'o/ /mar bdug spos ma du ba'i mdog can zhal gsum pa du ba'i mdog dang dkar ba dang dmar pa'o/ /bden
122b6(rgyud 'grel): bral du mar me ma gser gyi mdog can zhal gsum pa gser mdog dang dkar po dang nag po'o/ /rlung du dri chab ma dmar mo zhal gsum pa dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po'o/ /'di rnams ni go rims bzhin du g.yas kyi dang pos me tog gi za ma
122b7(rgyud 'grel): tog dang spos phor dang mar me'i mchod sdong dang dri'i dung chos 'dzin pa'o/ /phyag lhag ma rnams kyis gtso bo'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la gling bu ma dang pi wang ma dang mu kun Da ma dang rdza rnga ma rnaMs ni dmar po dang ser
123a1(rgyud 'grel): po dang dkar po dang du ba'i mdog can gyi zhal gcig ma phyag gnyis kyi gling bu la sogs pa'i sgra sgrogs par brtson pa'o/ /shar gyi sgor khro gnyer rim par ldan ma sngon po nam mkha' lta bu sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal
123a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum mo/ /lho'i sgor 'jigs sdigs dkar po 'jigs su rung ba dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po'i zhal gsum mo/ /nub sgor rta'i gzugs dmar po dang dkar po dang nag po'i zhal gsum mo/ /byang sgor tshogs kyi gtso bo ljang gu ljang gu dang/ dkar po dang dmar
123a3(rgyud 'grel): po'i zhal gsum mo/ /'di dag ni 'gying pa'i khro bo 'gying ba'i stang stabs kyis bzhugs pa dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /khyad par ni g.yas dang po'i phyag gi rim pa ji lta bar lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrog dang dril bu 'dzin
123a4(rgyud 'grel): pa mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'o/ /'dir dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i gzugs brnyan ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang rdo rjes mtshan ba'i rin po che sna tshogs pa'i cod pan dang ldan pa'o/ /de las gzhan pa'i lha nyi shu pa rnams ni rdo rje bdud rtsi dang
123a5(rgyud 'grel): mo? tis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i cod pan can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo lta bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa la sogs pa'o/ /me tog ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis pa rnams kyi zla ba'i 'og tu sna tshogs
123a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'o/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni ha(rgyud 'grel): 'o /oM ha(rgyud 'grel): badzra a mri ta swAhA zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sngags so/ /las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang 'di nyid yin no/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi gzhan rnam pa gsum gyi 'di ltar bsgom pa'i khyad par gyi rim pa ni rdo rje
123a7(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i rgyud nyid las shes bar bya'o/ /mangs bas 'jigs pas 'dir ma bshad do// //dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dgyes pa rdo rje rnam pa bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du gnas pa'i chos 'byung la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khong//
123b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag bcu drug pa la slar yang 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor lta bu bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa yang yod do zhes pa ni phyogs gnyis pa'o/ /gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba'i nang du gan rkyal du gnas pa'i tshangs pa dang khyab
123b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jug dang dbang phyug dang/ lha'i dbang bo ste/ bdud rnam pa bzhi'i rang bzhin can gyi snying gar gnas pa'i nyi ma la zhabs bzhi pa gcer bu gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan ba/ zhabs gnyis kyis skyil krung phyed ba dang/ zhabs gnyis kyis g.yon bskum
123b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ g.yas brkyang pa'i gar gyi tshul gyis gnas pa dang spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa dpral ba'i steng du bags pa dang bral ba'i mi mgo skam bo lngas brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ sku mdog nag
123b4(rgyud 'grel): po phyag bcu drug ba zhal brgyad pa/ zhal re re la dmar zhing zlum ba'i spyan gsum gsum yod ba rtsa ba'i zhal nag po g.yas pa rnams ni dkar po dang nag po dang nag bo'o/ /g.yon pa rnams ni dmar po dang nag po dang nag po'o/ /steng gi zhal ni du ba'i
123b5(rgyud 'grel): mdog can mi sdug pa zhal thams cad ni smin ma skyog po dang bcas pa khro gnyer can mche ba'i myu gu gtsigs pa g.yas pa'i phyag brgyad kyis bsnams pa'i thod ba rnams la glang po che dang rta dang bong bu dang/ glang dang rnga mo dang mi dang sha ra b+ha dang dyi la
123b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i phyag brgyad pa'i thod pa rnams ni sa dang chu dang rlung dang me dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang/ gshin rje dang nor sbyin rnams so/ /gtsug gi 'khor lo dang rna cha dang mgul brgyan dang lag gdug dang ska rags dang thal ba rnams dang mi
123b7(rgyud 'grel): mgo rlon pa khrag 'dzam+bu? pa lnga bcu'i phreng ba dang dpung brgyan dang rkang gdub rnams kyis brgyan ba'o/ /'di'i yum bdag med ma nag mo gcer bu gri gug dang thod par ldan pa'i phyag gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par 'khyud pa/ g.yas
124a1(rgyud 'grel): bskum pa g.yon brkyang pa'i gar gyis gnas pa phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa dmar la zlum pa mche ba gtsigs pa dbu skra dmar ser 'bar ba gyen du brdzes pa dpral ba'i mtshams su thod pa lnga yis brgyan ba/
124a2(rgyud 'grel): mgrin par mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba 'phyang ba dang/ rkang gdub la sogs pas brgyan pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar gnas pa'i tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang drag po'i snying ga'i steng du zla ba rnams la gau rI la sogs pa'o
124a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab mar gnas pa'i gshin rje dang lus ngan dang srin po dang/ thag bzangs ris kyi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas ba'i puk+ka sI la sogs pa'o/ /de la gau rI nag mo g.yas na gri gug g.yon na ro hi ta'i nya 'dzin pa'o/
124a4(rgyud 'grel): tso? rI dmar mo g.yas Da ma ru g.yon phag ba 'dzin pa'o/ /ro langs ma gser gyi mdog can g.yas g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis rus sbal dang pad+ma'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /g+hasma rI ljang gu phyag g.yas pa na sbrul g.yon pa na rnal 'byor gyi snod 'dzin pa'o/ /puk+kra? sI
124a5(rgyud 'grel): sngon? mo phyag g.yas pa na seng+ge g.yon pa na dgra sta 'dzin pa'o/ /sha bA ri dkar mo phyag g.yas pa na dge slong g.yon pa na bsil byed 'dzin pa'o/ /tsaN+Da lI ni nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs ma phyag g.yas pa na 'khor lo g.yon pa na gshol 'dzin
124a6(rgyud 'grel): la'o/ /DoM bi nI khra mo phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje g.yon pa sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa'o/ /brgyad po 'di dag ni skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyiS bzhugs pa'o/ /khyad par gzhan ni sar brjod pa'i bdag med ma bzhin no/ /he ru ka dang bdag med ma dag gi rigs kyi bdag po mi bskyod pa'o/ /gau rI la sogs pa rnams ni mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ snang ba mdza' yas so/ /puk+ka sI la sogs pa rnams kyi yang ngo/ /yang na dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo phyag gnyis
124b1(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yas pas rdo rje gyen du 'phyar ba g.yon pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i thod pa 'dzin pas bdag med ma la 'khyud pa kha TwAM ga dpung pa g.yon pa la brten pa'o/ /yang na dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo phyag bzhi pa sngon po phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa g.yon pas thod
124b2(rgyud 'grel): pa khrag gis bkang ba 'dzin pa phyag lhag ma dag rang dang mtshungs pa'i rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa'o/ /yang na dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo phyag drug pa sngon po rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal gsum sngon po dang/ dkar po dang/ dmar po phyag g.yas pa dag
124b3(rgyud 'grel): gis rdo rje dang gri gug dang g.yon pa dag gis rtse gsum pa dang dril bu 'dzin pa lhag ma dag gis rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma la 'khyud pa'o/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma ni sku mdog dang zhal dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa rnams bdag med ma dang mtshungs par yan lag med
124b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rdo rje'i zhabs kyis gsungs so/ /phyag gnyis pa la sogs pa 'di rnams sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la ro'i snying gar nyi ma la skyil krung phyed pas gar mdzad ba mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan ba dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa mi mgo
124b5(rgyud 'grel): lngas dbu brgyan pa smin ma 'khyog ba dang bcas pa'i khro gnyer can mche ba gtsigs pa phyag bcu drug pa bzhin du gtsug gi 'khor lo la sogs pas brgyan pa gau rI la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis skor ba'o/ /lha mo thams cad ni thal ba dang bral ba'o/ /do
124b6(rgyud 'grel): rje phag mo dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma ni mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa'o/ /kye'i rdo rje rnam pa bzhi'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo/ /oM de ba bi tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes bya ba ni phyag bcu drug pa'i snying po'o/ /oM tre lo kyA k+She ba hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes pa ni phyag
124b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'o/ /oM dzwa la dzwa la b+hyo hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ phyag bzhi pa'o/ /oM ki Ti ki Ti badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ phyag drug pa'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra g+hasma rI oM hUM swAhA/ zhes bya ba ni g+hasma rI'i sngags te las thams cad ba'o// //sgyu 'phrul chen po'i 
125a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang na gnas pa'i chos 'byung gi dbus su gzhal yas khang ngo/ /kha cig ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung med par gzhal yas khang ngo/ /zhes so gzhal yas khang gi dbus su pad+ma dmar po
125a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dab brgyad pa'i ze 'brur nyi ma la sgyu ma chen mo las byung ba'i he ru ka nag po nyi ma lta bu'i 'od zer can 'bar ba'i phreng ba du mas 'khrigs pa 'gying ba'i khro bo dbu skra dmar ser 'bar ba gyen du brdzes pa thod pas brgyan pa'i cod pan can rtsa ba
125a3(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yas dang rgyab dang g.yon gyi zhal bzhi sngon po dang ser po dang dkar po dang ljang gu'o/ /zhal re re la dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum pa phyag bzhi pa'i g.yas gnyis na thod pa dang mda'/ g.yon gnyis na kha TwAM ga dang gzhu 'dzin
125a4(rgyud 'grel): pa phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa'i mi'i phags pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa/ skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma ni sku mdog dmar mo gtso bo lta bu'i phyag mtshan can phyag gnyis kyis de'i mgul nas 'byung ba/ dmar
125a5(rgyud 'grel): po dang ser po dang dkar po dang/ ljang gu'i zhal lo/ /shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma sngon mo ser po dang dkar po dang ljang gu'i zhal rdo rje dang thod pa dang dril bu dang kha TwAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor rin chen mkha' 'gro ma ser mo ser po dang sngon po dang
125a6(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang ljang gu'i zhal rin po che'i pa tra dang tri shu la dang mgrin pa btsir ba'i ce spyang dang ba dan 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo dkar po dang ser po dang sngon po dang/ ljang gu'i zhal sna tshogs pad+ma dang mda' dang thod pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'i
125a7(rgyud 'grel): byang du sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma ljang gu dang ser po dang dkar po dang/ sngon po'i zhal lo/ /ral gri dang DA ma ru dang zhags pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o /thams cad kyang phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa/ zla ba'i gdan dang 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /'di rnams kyi khyad par
125b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan rnams ni gtso bo lta bu'o/ /bcom ldan 'daS kyis rigs kyi bdag po ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyang go rims ji ltar rnam snang dang/ mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang dag gi dbang phyug dang don yod grub ba
125b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo/ /oM hUM hUM snying po'i sngags so/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang/ oM oM hUM oM hUM hUM/ oM swA hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM haM hUM/ sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni las thams cad
125b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// //bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod pa lha dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang gi chos 'byung la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma'o/ /de'i ze 'brul ro'i snying gar nyi ma'i gdan la shes rab ma dang bral
125b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bcom ldan 'das sku mdog la sogs pa phyi nas 'chang ba'i 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thod pa bzhin no/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i 'dab ma la rim pa ji lta bas sna tshogs sde ma dang 'dod ma dang sa 'og na gnas ma
125b5(rgyud 'grel): dang legs bzangs mo rnams ni sku mdog sngon mo g.yas bskum pa g.yon brkyang ba stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can phyag g.yas gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa/ g.yon gnyis kyis kha TwAM ga dang DA ma ru 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan dang me dang bden
125b6(rgyud 'grel): bral dang rlung gi 'dab ma la chang tshong ma dang/ 'byung mo dang phyag bzhi ma dang nam mkha' la gnas ma rnams ni ser mo na bza' ser po gon pa 'od ser po 'phro ba zhabs gnyis kyis g.yas brkyang ba g.yon bskum pa klu brgyad kyi brgyan pa/ phyag
125b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas ba gnyis kyis gri gug dang DA ma ru/ g.yon gyis kha TwAM ga dang pad+ma'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /brgyad po 'di dag kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gar gyi tshul gyis gnas pa dbu skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa/ dbu la thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang ldan pa
126a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa/ mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu mgul du 'phyang ba mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas lngas rgyas
126a2(rgyud 'grel): btab pa'o/ /sna tshogs sde ma la sogs pa rnams la mi bskyod pa dang rnam snang dang rin 'byung dang snang mdza' rnams kyis so/ /chang tshong ma la sogs pa rnams kyis yang de dag rnams so/ /yang na bcom ldan 'das 'di dang phyogs kyi lha mo rnams kyang mdog dkar
126a3(rgyud 'grel): ma mtshams kyi lha mo rnams dmar po 'di ni yum dang bral ba'am yum dang bcas ba'o/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi dbus su gzhal yas khong/ /de'i dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du 'jigs
126a4(rgyud 'grel): byed dang dus mtshan g.yon bskum g.yas brkyang bas mnan pa'i 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i bcom ldan 'das khro bo ni bskal pa 'jig dus kyi me lta bu'i 'od zer 'bar zhing 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad rab tu
126a5(rgyud 'grel): bsal bar mdzad pa sku mdog sngon po dang ser po dang ljang khu'i zhal rtsa ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi mi bsdugs ba gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa rab tu gtum ba ljags bsgril ba 'jigs su rung ba'i zhal gsum pa re re zhing spyan gsum gsum
126a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar la ? smin ma g.yo ba khro gnyer dang bcas pa/ dbral ba'i steng na thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang ldan pa khrag 'dzag pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i phreng ba mngul? bar 'phyang ba yum dang bcas ba klu mdza' yas sngon pos dbu skra 'bar zhing dmar ser gyen du
126a7(rgyud 'grel): bcings pa/ klu 'dzeg po dmar pos rna rgyan byas pa/ klu pad+ma chen po pad+ma'i rtsa ba lta bu dkar pos mgul? rgyan byas pa/ klu kar ko Ta dur ba lta bur ljang gus mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ nor rgyas dkar pos ska rags byas pa/ pad+ma dkar pos kun ta'i me
126b1(rgyud 'grel): tog lta bur mdzes pas rkang gdub byas pa/ dung skyong ser pos lag gdub byas pa/ rigs ldan du ba lta bu khra bos dpung rgyan byas pa/ rdo rje sems dpas dbu la rgyas btab pa/ rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag gnyis kyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
126b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyag rgyal rang gi yum la snyoms par zhugs pa g.yas gnyis kyis lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang g.yon gnyis kyis thod pa dang kha TwAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /'di'i shar phyogs su rdo dbyug pa sngon po sngon po dang ser mo dang ljang gu ni rtsa ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi
126b3(rgyud 'grel): zhal lo/ /g.yas pa gnyis kyis rdo rje tho ba dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gyen du 'phyar ba/ g.yon pa gnyis kyis thod pa dang kha TwAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du rdo rje nyi ma ser po dang sngon po dang ljang gu'i zhal lo/ /khyad par ni phyag dang pos rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin
126b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ khyad par du rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams kyang rdo re dbyug pa lta bu'o/ /'og nas 'chad pa rnams kyang da ltar shes par bya'o/ /byang du rdo rje gtsug tor dmar po dmar po dang ljang gu'i zhal lo/ /pad+ma dmar pos mtshan pa'i phyag go/ lhor rdo rje ?
126b5(rgyud 'grel): ba ljang gu ni ljang gu dang dkar bo dang ser po'i zhal lo/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag go/ mer rdo rje gnod sbyin du ba'i mdo gdang ? po dang ljang gu'i zhal lo/ /lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /srin par rdo rje bdud rtsi dus dmar po dmar po dang/ ser po dang ljang
126b6(rgyud 'grel): bu'i zhal lo/ /dgra sta 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du nag po chen po sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal tri shul 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba nag po mi g.yo ba nag po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje dbyug pa la sogs
126b7(rgyud 'grel): pa brgyad po 'di rnams ni rim pa ji ltar gshin rje mthar byed dang shes rab mthar byed dang pad+ma mthar byed dang bgegs mthar byed dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang/ dbyug pa sngon po dang stobs po che dang yi g.yo ba rnams kyi ming gzhan no/ /steng du gtsug?
127a1(rgyud 'grel): tor 'khor los sgyur ba dkar po dang sngon po dang ljang gu'i zhal 'khor lo 'dzin ba'o/ /'og tu rdo rjes 'og gnod mdzes kyi ming rnam grangs can sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal rol pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gtun shing 'dzin pa'o/ /
127a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i phyag g.yon gnyis kyis klu'i zhags pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas ba dang kha TwAM ga'o/ /rdo rje dbyug pa la sogs pa'i khro bo 'di rnams ni phyag mtshan gyi gtso bo dang thod pas mtshan pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang mtshungs ba'i yum dang mnyam par sbyor
127a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ dang bu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du 'khyil ba rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag pos cod pan mdzes par rgyan pa smin ma g.yo ba bcas pa'i khro gnyer can mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa dmar zhing zlum pa mi mgo'i
127a4(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa dang klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnaS pa'i phyogs skyong brgyad dang steng du tshangs pa dang 'og tu thag? bzangs ris rnaMs la g.yos brkyang gis mnan nas bzhugs pa rang gi rigs kyi bdag
127a5(rgyud 'grel): pos dbu brgyan pa ste/ ji ltar 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsibs bcu pa'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lor bshad pa bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo/ /oM kha badzra d+h+rik badzra hUM kar badzra hUM phaT/ ces bya
127a6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi snying po'i sngags so/ /las thams cad ba'i sngags ni oM badzra kuN+Da li badzra hUM phaT ces bya ba'o/ /yang shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang steng dang 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan rnams la g.yas skor gyis gshin
127a7(rgyud 'grel): rje mthar byed la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu'o/ /'di rnaMs kyi gnas dang sku mdog la sogs pa bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar bzhin no/ /yang na 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu pa bzhin no/ /yang na kun tu kha sbyor gyi
127b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje? sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor bzhin no/ /phyogs 'di gsum ka la yang oM A(rgyud 'grel): big+h+n+n+ta? krid hUM zhes bya ba bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags te las thams cad pa'o// //bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze
127b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bru la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas pI ?  zhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba'i steng du nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mo g.yas brkyang gi zhabs gnyis kyis mnan ba'i bcom ldan 'das sku mdog nag po
127b3(rgyud 'grel): shar dang byad pa sogs ba'i zhal bzhi nag po dang ljang gu dang dmar po dang ser ngo zhal re re la spyan gsuM gsuM pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ phyag bcu gnyis pa rdo rje dang dril bu dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa/ phyag gnyis
127b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis rgyab tu glang po che dkar po'i pags ba khrag dang bcas pa brgyangs nas 'dzin pa/ de las gzhan pa'i g.yas pa'i phyag rnams kyis Da ma ru dang dgra sta dang gri gug dang rtse gsuM 'dzin pa/ g.yon rnams kyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha TwAM ga dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod
127b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang rdo rje zhags pa dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo rnams so/ /mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul du 'phyang ba/ phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa'i mi'i rgyu mas mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ dbral ba'i steng du thod pa lnga dang ldan pa/ nor bu dang g.yon ngos su gnas pa'i
127b6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba byed pa dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ral pa'i thor cog nag po rnam par 'gyur zhing gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal can gar gyi nyams dgu'i tshogs dang ldan pa'o/ /rdo rje phag mo ni dmar mo zhal kha cig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa skra'i tshogs
127b7(rgyud 'grel): grol ba gcer du thod pa'i dum bu'i ska rags bcings pa 'khyud ba'i phyag gis bzung ba'i thod pa khrag gis dkar ba 'dzags pa'i rgyun gtso bo la stob pa/ sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa rdo rje steng du 'phyar ba'i phyag g.yas pas gdug po rnams la
128a1(rgyud 'grel): bsdigs par byed pa khrag dang bral ba'i mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba can nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa cung zad bzhad pa zla mtshan 'bab pa dang bcas pa spu gyen du langs pa'o/ /de nas shar la sogs pa'i
128a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs rnams la g.yon skor gyis dang ma la sogs pa'i phyogs bral rnams la g.yas skor gyis dgod do/ /de la phyogs kyi 'dab ma la mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang/ dum skyes ma dang/ gzugs can ma rnams kyi nag mo dang ljang gu dang dmar mo
128a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ser mo'i mdog can rnams zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa dbu sgra grol ba phyag bzhi ma g.yon pa gnyis kyis kha TwAM ga dang thod ba 'dzin pa/ g.yas bdag gis DA ma ru dang gri gug 'dzin pa/ g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa rnams so/ /mtshams kyi 'dab
128a4(rgyud 'grel): mar byang chub kyi sems dang khrag dang bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga rnams grub pa'i bcud lta bu'i bdud rtsir gyur pas gang ba'i pad+ma'i snod rnams so/ /yang na bzhi car yang bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'o/ /de nas thugs kyi 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs su thod pa'i dum bu
128a5(rgyud 'grel): dang rab tu gtum mo'o/ /byang du keng rus chen po dang gtum pa'i mig can ma'o/ /nub tu keng rus dang 'od ldan ma'o/ /lho ru mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang sna chen ma'o/ /mer chang dgra dang dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'o/ /srin por 'od dpag med dang
128a6(rgyud 'grel): mi ? ma'o/ /rlung du rdo rje 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /dbang ldan du rdo rje'i lus dang shing grib ma'o/ /rim pa de bzhin du gsung gi 'khor lo la myu gu can dang sa bsrungs pa'o/ /rdo rje ral pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo'o/ /dpa' bo chen po dang rlung
128a7(rgyud 'grel): gi shugs can ma'o/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad dang chang 'thung ma'o/ /rdo rje bzang po dang lha mo sngo bsangs ma'o/ /rdo rje 'od dang shin tu bzang mo'o/ /'jigs byed chen mo dang rta rna ma'o/ /mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma'o/ /de bzhin du sku'i 'khor lo la stobs po che
128b1(rgyud 'grel): dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/ /rin chen rdo rje dang du ma skyes ma'o/ /rta mgrin dang chang 'tshong ma'o/ /nam mkha' i snying po dang 'khor lo'i go cha 'dzin ma'o/ /dpal te ru ka dang shin tu bzang mo'o/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen ma'o/ /rnam par
128b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad dang 'khor los sgyur ma'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson 'grus chen mo'o/ /de la thod pa'i duM bu la sogs ba dpa' bo rnams zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa ral pa'i thor tshugs can dbral ba'i gnas pa'i rdo rje phreng bas mtshan pa'i dpa' bo'i dar
128b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs can phyag bzhi pa 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu g.yon pas kha TwAM ga dang g.yas pa DA ma ru bsnams pa/ tshangs pa'i skud pa dang dpung brgyan can mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa g.yas brkyang gis gnas pa'o/
128b4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa drag po'i gzugs can ma/ dbu skra grol ba'i gcer bu ma/ phyag gnyis pa 'khyud pa'i phyag gis thod pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa gdug pa rnams bsdigs pa'i gri gug 'dzin pa'o//
128b5(rgyud 'grel): sgo rnaMs la khwa gdong ma dang 'ug gdong ma dang khyi gdong ma dang gdong ma rnaMs ni nam mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhin no/ /khyad par du 'di rnams kyi zhal ni ming gi rjes su mthun pa'o/ /mtshams rnams su gshin rje brtan ma dang/ gshin rje pho nya dang/ gshin rje mche ba
128b6(rgyud 'grel): ma dang gshin rje 'joms ma rnams ni mi'i zhal lo/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyogs kyi lha mo gnyis kyis g.yas dang g.yon gyi sku phyed phyed 'dra ba'o/ /brgyad po 'di rnams ni ro'i gdan can no/ /DA ki ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni mi mgo'i phreng ba can
128b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phreng bas dpral ? brgyan pa phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa ska rags la sgra dang bcas pa'i g.yer ga la sogs pas brgyan pa'o/ /rigs kyi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mi bskyod pa'o/ /rdo rje phag mo'i rnam par snang mdzad do/ /DA ki ma la sogs 
129a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lor gnas pa rnams ni mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mdza' yas dang rtag pa rnams so/ /dam tshig gi 'khor lo la gnas pa rnams ni don yod grub pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
129a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo?/ /oM sh+rI badzra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzwa la saM baM ba raM swAhA/ snying po'o/ /oM khaN+Da ro he hUM hUM phaT ces bya ba ni dum skyes ma'i sngags te/ las thams cad pa'o/ /lha gzhan rnams kyi ni kho bos dpal bde mchog gi mngon par
129a3(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa'i sgrub thabs su bshad pa'o/ /yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug la sogs pa nas gshin rje 'joms ma'i bar thams cad ni zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa de la dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa lnga ni 'khyud pa'i g.yas g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril
129a4(rgyud 'grel): bu 'dzin pa/ DA ki ma la sogs pa bzhi dang khwa gdong ma la sogs pa rnams ni g.yon pas thod pa dang dpung pa la brten pa'i kha TwAM ga dang/ g.yas pa DA ma ru 'dzin pa gzhan thams cad ni gong bzhin no/ /yang na 'dir 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la sogs pa phyag
129a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa nyid kyi phyogs la dpal bde mchog dang rdo rje phag mo gnyis kyi gser gyi mdog gam sngon pos yang ste/ bcom ldan 'das ni phyag g.yas pas rdo rje bsor ba la mchog tu brtson pa/ g.yon pas thod pa dang kha TwAM ga 'dzin pa 'am yang na rdo
129a6(rgyud 'grel): rje dang dril bu'i phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pas gnas pa'o/ /DA ki ma la sogs pa bzhi ni ser mo g.yas pa DA ma ru 'dzin pa rnams so/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams nag po rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /dpa' mo rnams dkar mo phyag g.yas
129a7(rgyud 'grel): pas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub can rnams so/ /gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni dmar po pad+ma dang pad+ma'i dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /DA ki ma rnams ni nag mo phyag g.yas pa na pad+ma dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o/ /sku'i 'khor lo'i
129b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo rnams ni dkar po 'khor lo dang 'khor lo'i dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /lha mo rnams ni dmar mo g.yas pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa rnams so/ /dpa' bo thams cad ni yum la 'khyud par brtson pa g.yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa rnams so//
129b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' mo rnams ni de'i brla gnyis la mkhril ba'i tshul lo/ /khwa gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi g.yas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i gri gug 'dzin pa'o/ /lha mo thams cad ni g.yon pas thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /gshin rje brtan ma la sogs pa ni g.yas
129b3(rgyud 'grel): pas DA ma ru g.yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i mi mgo 'dzin pa'o/ /DA ki ma la sogs pa rnams dang khwa gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi g.yon pa'i dpung pa la kha TwAM ga'o/ /bcu gnyis po 'di rnams ni skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas pa khyad
129b4(rgyud 'grel): par gzhan thams cad ni gong bzhin no/ /'di ni bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum mo// //gang gi tshe 'di rnams la dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa lnga mi bsgom par rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gyur pa de'i tshe rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor
129b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum mo/ /rdo rje phag mo'i snying ga'i sa bon ni baM mo/ /oM badzra bai ro tsa ni ye hUM hUM hUM phaT ces pa ni snying po'o/ /bde mchog gi phyag gnyis pa la sogs lha 'di rnams ni phyag g.yas su gnas pa'i phyag mtshan ni bri bya'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// //
129b6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod pa lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi dbus su gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi nang du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa nag po la gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi
129b7(rgyud 'grel): ze 'brur ro/ /gan rkyal gyi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka sku mdog nag po skyil krung phyed pa gar gyi nyams dgus gar byed pa zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa g.yas kyi phyag gnyis na DA
130a1(rgyud 'grel): ma ru dang gri gug/ g.yon gyi phyag gnyis na thod pa dang kha TwAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /phyag rgya drug pa mi mgo rlon pI lnga bcu'i phreng ba la 'phyang ba/ gnyis 'thung gi pags pa'i sham thabs cung zad rgyab na nyil ba sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba
130a2(rgyud 'grel): phyed pas mtshan pa'i ral pa'i thor cog nag po can dpral ba'i steng du thod pa lngas brgyan pa sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu brgyan can no/ /mnga' bdag 'di'i btsun mo ni sna tshogs sde ma gcer bu mi mgo'i phreng ba can bsil bur grol zhing gyen du 'bar ba
130a3(rgyud 'grel): zod pa lngas dbu brgyan pa/ mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa/ yab kyi mgrin pa la chags pa'i phyag g.yon pas thod pa khrag gi rgyun 'jig pa yab la stob pa/ g.yas kyi phyag gis
130a4(rgyud 'grel): gri gug brdegs pa'i tshul lo/ /shar gyi rtsibs nag po'i steng gi 'dab ma la legs phreng can ma'o/ /byang du thod pa can ma'o/ /nub tu 'jigs can ma'o/ /lhor mi thub ma'o/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la g.yas skor
130a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis byang sems dkar ba dang dmar ba dang bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron me lngas gang ba'i thod pa rnams so/ /rim pa dang po 'di ni rdo rje phreng ba sngon pos bskor ba'o/ /de nas rim pa gnyis pa ni rtsibs brgyad dmar po la gnas pa'i pad+ma brgyad kyi phyir mi rdo rje dmar
130a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i phreng? bas bskor ba'o/ /de'i shar gyi rtsibs la dge ba'i ska rags ma'o/ /byang du ni gzugs can ma'o/ /nub tu rnam rgyal ma'o/ /lhor 'dod can ma'o/ /dbang ldan du dus can ma'o/ /mer ni mtsho chen ma'o/ /bden bral du byad ma'o/ /rlung
130a7(rgyud 'grel): du bsod ma'o/ /de nas rim pa gsum pa la ni 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa la gnas pa'i pad+ma brgyad de rdo rje dkar po'i phreng bas bskor ba'o/ /de'i shar gyi rtsibs la sgrol ma'o/ /byang du 'jigs mthong ma'o/ /nub tu legs mthong
130b1(rgyud 'grel): ma'o/ /lhor thub dka' ma'o/ /dbang ldan du dge ma'o/ /mer grib non ma'o/ /bden bral du sa mtshan ma'o/ /rlung du grag chen ma'o/ /shar gyi sgo'i pad+ma la mdzes ma'o/ /byang gi sgo'i pad+ma la nor 'dzin ma'o/ /nub sgo'i pad+ma la bskal bzangs ma'o/ /lho sgo'i
130b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la mthong ba yid 'ong ma'o/ /'di rnams thams cad g.yas g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa po cung zad ston pa zhal gcig ma spyan gsum ma rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa mi mgo'i phreng ba dang bral ba/ dbu skra sil bu
