130b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar ser gyi tshogs gyen du brdzes ma byang sems 'dzag pa nyi ma'i gdan la skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyi tshul gyi gnas pa rnams so/ /sgo skyong ma rnams ni g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang ba'o/ /thams cad kyang stag gi pags ba gyon ma sku mdog sngon mo'o//
130b4(rgyud 'grel): yang na legs phreng can ma la sogs pa bzhi nag mo'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams dkar ser ro/ /rim pa gsum pa la gnas pa rnams ljang gu ma'o/ /sgo'i lha mo rnams nag mo'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la mi bskyod pa la sog spa'i
130b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa lngas rgyas btab pa'o/ /sna tshogs sde ma ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis so/ /legs phreng can ma la sogs pa bzhi ni rin 'byung gis so/ /rim pa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams ni snang ba mdza' yas kyis so/ /rim pa gsum
130b6(rgyud 'grel): pa la gnas pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis so/ /sgo'i lha mo rnams kyi don yod grub pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis snying ga'i sa bon ni hUM ngo/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI A(rgyud 'grel): hI he:hUM phaT snying po'o/ /sngags 'di nyid kyis dkyil 'khor 'di'i las
130b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad pa'o// //dpal rnal 'byor nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rgya mtsho chen po la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang rdo rje rgya gram
131a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi lte ba la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dkyil du dbus kyi rim pa'i lte bar seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das dpal rnal 'byor nam mkha' nag po rtsab
131a2(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal gsum nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po zhal re re la spyan gsuM pa phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa dpral bar gnas pa thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang nor bu dang zla ba phyed pa dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan pa'i ral pa nag po'i cod pan can/ de bzhin
131a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa lnga 'phro ba'i dbu rgyan can stig? pags pa'i sham thabs rgyab du cung zad nyil ba/ phyag drug pa/ rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa'i phyag gnyis kyis ye shes kyi DA ki ma nag po 'am dkar mo la 'khyud pa/ lag pa g.yas pa gnyis kyis
131a4(rgyud 'grel): nu ma dang mnga' 'dzin pa g.yon pa gnyis kyis pad snod dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /de nas shar gyi re mig la glang po che'i rgyal po la 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'i rdo rje DA ki ma dkar mo/ byang du rma bya la skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa'i 'jigs
131a5(rgyud 'grel): byed DA ki ma ser mo sgrul gyis brgyan pa/ nub tu bya khyung la tsog pur gnas pa'i ro langs ma dmar mo lhor khol po'i gdan la byin pa'i skyil krung gis gnas pa'i gtum mo sngon mo dbu skra dmar po bkram pa grol zhing spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba'o//
131a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ye shes kyi DI ka ma la sogs pa lnga ni g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis kha TwAM ga dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams ni glang po che la sogs pa la gnas pa'i pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa glang po che'i pags pa smad la gon
131a7(rgyud 'grel): pa mi'i pags pa stong la gon pa'o/ /dbang ldan du seng+ge la 'gying tshul gyis gnas pa'i seng+ge ma dkar ser phyag gnyis ma g.yas pas steng du 'byar ba'i kha TwAM ga 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o//
131b1(rgyud 'grel): med rdo rje phag chu ma zlum po'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'i stag mo kha dog dkar nag mo phyag g.yas pa dang cig shos kyis lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du ma he la skyil krung byed pas bzhugs pa ce sbyang ma ce spyang gi gdong can sku mdog dmar nag dgra sta
131b2(rgyud 'grel): dang zhags pa 'dzin pI phyag gnyis so/ /rlung du ce spyang gi gdan la tsog bur bzhugs pa'i 'ug pa ma 'ug pa'i gdong can dmar ser mo phyag gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /'di rnams ni rang rang gi chibs rnams la pad+ma dang nyi mar gnas
131b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /shar du rdo rje DA ki ma'i rgyab du DA ki ma dkar mo phyag gnyis rtse mo khar bcug pa'o/ /byang du 'jigs byed DA ki ma'i rgyab du mar me ma ser mo/ /spyi bor mar me lta bur thal mo sbyar ba dang bcas pa'o/ /nub tu ro langs ma'i rgyab tu 'jigs byed ma dmar mo snyim?
131b4(rgyud 'grel): pa khrag gis bkang ba zhal du gsol ba'o/ /lhor gtum mo'i rgyab tu skam po 'dzi nag mo/ /phyag gnyis kyis thugs kar gtun shing 'phyar pa'o/ /bzhi po 'di rnams pad+ma dang nyi ma dang ro la gnas pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje phreng ba dang 'od zer gyi zlum? pa'i
131b5(rgyud 'grel): rim pa bskor ba la pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la shar phyogs puk+ka sI dang DA mi DAM dang gtum mo rnams phyag gnyis kyis bdud rtsi'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du 'jigs byed ma dang grags ma dang sha ma rnams ni sha lngas bkang ba'i pad+ma'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu
131b6(rgyud 'grel): drag shul ma dang 'bar ma dang mi sdug pa rnaMs gtor ma'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor thod pa ma dang rdo rje ma dang bum pa ma rnams btung ba'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du sgeg mo bsnyems pa'i phyag rgya can dang dri chab ma dri'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /me'i mtshams su pi wang ma yi?
131b7(rgyud 'grel): wang bsgreng ba dang me tog ma me tog 'thor pa'o/ /bden bral du glu mkha' i thad khar mdzub mo g.yo ba dang/ bdug spos ma spos dang bcas pa'i spos phor 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du gar ma gar gyi tshul gyis steng du thal mo sbyar ba dang/ mar me ma mar me
132a1(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i mar me'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /ye shes DA ki ma la sogs pa'i lha mo sum cu rtsa gsum po 'di dag ni zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa dbu skra grol ba/ dbu la thod pa lnga'i phreng ba can no/ /'di?
132a2(rgyud 'grel): byed DA ki ma ni dbu skra gyen la brdzes pa/ seng+ge ma la sogs pa ni gos dmar po gyon pa'o/ /puk+ka sI la sogs pa dang me'i mtshams kyi lha mo rnams dkar mo'o/ /'jigs byed DA ki ma la sogs pa dang dbang ldan gyi lha mo dag ser mo'o//
132a3(rgyud 'grel): drag shul ma la sogs pa dang rlung mtshams kyi lha mo dag dmar ma'o/ /thod pa ma la sogs pa dang bden bral gyi lha mo dag nag mo'o/ /de nas rdo rje breng ba zlum po'i phyi rol pa'i gyi rim pa'i sgo rnams dang snam bu rnams la chu skyes dang zla ba'i gdan rnams so
132a4(rgyud 'grel): de la shar sgor khyab 'jug nag po dang/ byang du tshangs pa ser po dang/ nub du dbang phyug chen po dkar po dang/ lhor gdong drug dmar po dang/ dbang ldan du dbang po ser po dang/ mer lus ngan ser po dang/ srin por gshin rje nag po
132a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rlung du chu lha dkar po'o/ /lho'i snam bu la shar du keng rus 'jigs byed dang kha TwAM ga'i srin po dang tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang/ dril bu'i rna ba can rnams dkar po'o/ /byang du gtum mo'i dbang phyug dang mdun sa'i lha dang rigs kyi dbang
132a6(rgyud 'grel): phyug dang/ dzhaM kaM? ra 'jigs su rung ba rnams ser po'o/ /nub tu drag po'i 'dod pa dang Sha Na Di la'i dbang phyug dang Da ma ru'i 'dul byed dang rnga sgras 'jigs byed rnams dmar po'o/ /lho ru gtum bu ra'i dbang phyug dang ? na dang/ mche ba gtsigs
132a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa rnams ni nag po'o/ /khyab 'jug la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis kyis kha TwAM ga dang rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis kyis lha
132b1(rgyud 'grel): mo la 'khyud pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /ral pa nag po'i thor cog can rnams thod pa lnga'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan pa phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can no/ /'di rnams kyi yum lha mo rnams kyang phyag g.yas pa dang cig shos
132b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis kha TwAM ga dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /'dir dpal rnal 'byor nam mkha' la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lngas rgyas btab pa'o/ /ye shes kyis mkha' 'gro ma la mi bskyod pa 'am/ rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab pa'o//
132b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje DA ki ma la sogs pa bzhi dang/ DA ki ma la sogs pa bzhi la rtag pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang/ don yod grub pa rnams kyis so/ /seng+ge ma la sogs pa bzhi ni mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang/
132b4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ snang ba mdza' las rnams kyis/ /tshangs pa la rnam par snang mdzad kyis so/ /dbang phyug chen po la snang ba mdza' yas kyis so/ /lha gzhan dkar po rnams la rnam par snang mdzad kyis so/ /ser po rnams kyis rin chen
132b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ldan gyis so/ /dmar po rnams la snang ba mdza' yas kyis zhes pa ni snying po'i sngags so/ /oM g+hu g+ha:swAhA/ ro phyug gi snying ga'i sa bon ni hUM ngo/ /oM hUM ha:swAhA/ zhes pa ni snying po'i sngags so/ /oM g+hu g+ha:swAhA/ ro langs ma'i
132b6(rgyud 'grel): las thams cad pa'i sngags so/ /zhes bya ba rim pa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang lta bu la DA ki ma la sogs pa bzhi po rnams ni sgo rnams su'o/ /zhes pa gzhan no/ /rim pa gnyis pa yang gzhal yas
132b7(rgyud 'grel): khang gi dbyibs so zhes pa ni gzhan no/ /de yang zlum pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni kha cig go/ //bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi dbus su chos 'byung gi lte bar gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna 
133a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs mtsho skyes dang nyi ma'i steng du gnas pa'i ma he nag po khros pa rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyab tu sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i gshin rje'i gdan la g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bas mnan nas bzhugs pa'i
133a2(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed nag po smin ma dang ag tshom gyen du langs shing dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/ rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa sku bong thung zhing gsus pa 'phyang ba dregs pa mi mgo'i phreng ba mgul par 'phyang ba/ ljags 'gyur ba mche ba
133a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba gtsigs pa/ rtsa ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po dang/ phyag drug pa gri gug dang thod par ldan pa'i g.yas dang cig shos kyi phyag gnyis kyi rang 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa g.yas pa gnyis
133a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis rdo rje dang ral gri/ g.yon pa gnyis na 'khor lo dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba bzhin du mdza' yas la sogs pa'i klus brgyan pa'o/ /'di'i shar du rnam par snang mdzad dkar po ste/ rtsa ba dang g.yas
133a5(rgyud 'grel): dang cig shos kyi zhal dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po phyag g.yas gnyis na 'khor lo dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon gyi phyag gnyis ni rin po che dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /lho phyogs su rin chen 'byung ldan gser btso ma'i mdog lta bu zhal gsum ser po dang sngon
133a6(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ dkar po g.yas kyi phyag dang ni rin po che dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon pa dag na 'khor lo dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu snang ba mdza' yas dmar po zhal gsum dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po'o/ /g.yas pa dag na pad+ma dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon
133a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dag na nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /byang phyogs su phrag dog gshin rje bshed ljang gu zhal gsum ljang gu dang nag po dang/ /dkar po g.yas pa dag na 'khor lo dang ral gri/ g.yon pa dag na nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /bzhi char yang
133b1(rgyud 'grel): khro bo 'khor lo'i bdag po'i mtshan nyid can g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin cing rang dang 'dra ba'i yum la 'khyud pa'o /me'i mtshams su rdo rje tsar tsi ka ma ni skam zhing gzugs dang phyag mtshan rnams ni gti mug
133b2(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed lta bu'o/ /bden bral du rdo rje phag mo phag zhal can ma zhe sdang gshin rje gshed lta bu'o/ /rlung du rdo rje dbyangs ma 'dod chags gshin rje gshed lta bu'o/ dbang ldan du dkar mo phrag dog gshin rje gshed lta bu'o/ /'dir
133b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i rwa'i rtsa ba rnams su'o/ /rdo rje'i rwa mtshams rnams su rdo rje tsar tsi ka la sogs pa bzhi ni rang dang 'dra ba'i thabs dang bcas pa'o/ /shar sgor thob gshin rje gshed nag po zhal gsum ni nag po dang dkar
133b4(rgyud 'grel): po dang dmar po'o/ /g.yas dag gis rdo rje thob dang ral gri/ g.yon dag gis nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /lto sgor dbyug pa gshin rje gshed dkar po zhal gsum dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po'o/ /g.yas pa dag gis dbyug pa
133b5(rgyud 'grel): ral gri/ g.yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /nub sgor pad+ma gshin rje gshed 'dod chags gshin rje gshed lta bu'o/ /byang sgor ral gri gshin rje gshed phrag dog gshin rje gshed lta bu la cung zad sngo pa'o/ /thams cad kyang klu ma rungs
133b6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'jigs pa gang rgyangs can dbu skra dmar ser 'bar ba gyen la brdzes shing mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal can rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin cing rang 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o/ /'dir rnam par snang mdzad dang lha mo
133b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla pa la gnas pa'o/ /lta gzhan rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi mar gnas pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhir sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i thod pa bzhi ni byang sems dkar ba dang dmar
134a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lngas bkang ba'o/ /gshin rje gshed nag po'i rigs kyi bdag po ni spyi bor mi bskyod pa'i bdag nyid do/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bzhi yang de bzhin no/ /de rnams ni go rims ji lta bar
134a2(rgyud 'grel): spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi dang tho ba gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams kyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni yang ngo/ /oM h+rI:Sh+Ti bi kri tA na nA hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes pa ni snying po'i sngags dang las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang
134a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di'o// //rdo rje sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi dkyil du gzhal yas khang gi lte ba la sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar zla ba la bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje sgrol ma gser bcom lta bu
134a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can? rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang rgyab dang g.yon gyi zhal bzhi gser mdog dang dkar po dang sngon po dang/ dmar po phyag brgyad ma g.yas kyi phyag rnaMs kyis rdo rje dang zhags pa dang mda' dang dud rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyi utpa
134a5(rgyud 'grel): la ser po dang gzhu dang lcags kyu dang sdig mdzub bo/ /shar gyi 'dab mar me tog sgron ma dkar mo ni phyag gnyis kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa/ lhor bdug spos sgrol ma nag mo ni phyag gnyis kyis bdug spos 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu mar me'i
134a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma ser mo ni phyag gnyis kyis mar me'i skong bu 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du dri'i sgrol ma dmar mo ni phyag gnyis kyi dri chab kyi dung 'phyar ba'o/ /lha mo bzhi po 'di rnams ni zla ba la gnas pa'o/ /me la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la rnam par snang
134a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad la sogs pa'i mdog lta bu 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang pad+ma dang ral gri'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu ma dkar mo ni g.yas pa na lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /lho ru rdo rje zhags pa ma ser mo ni phyag g.yas pa zhags pa
134b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog la rdo rjes mtshan pa phyag g.yas su'o/ /byang du rdo rje dril bu ma ljang gu ma ni phyag g.yas pa rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams su gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma rnams la spyan ma la
134b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i byang sems kyi bum pa dang/ ri rab dang me thab dang rgyal mtshan chen po'o/ /steng du gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dkar mo ni 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i phyag g.yas pa'o/ /'og tu gnod mdzes ma sngon mo ni g.yas pa klu'i zhags
134b3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dzin pa'o/ /lha mo drug po 'di rnams ni phyag g.yon pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi mar gnas pa'o/ /bcu po 'di rnams kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o/ /bcu gcig po rnams kyang zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung gis
134b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa gser gyi sna cha g.yo bag brgyan pa gos sna tshogs dang rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa pad+ma rA ga'i 'od zer phro ba'o/ /rdo rje sgrol ma'i rigs bdag ni rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /me tog sgrol ma la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad
134b5(rgyud 'grel): dang mi bskyod pa dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams te rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang ngo/ /gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i rin 'byung ngo/ /gnod mdzes ma'i mi bskyod pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying ga'i sa
134b6(rgyud 'grel): bon ni tAM nga/ /oM tA re tut+ta re tu re swAhA/ zhes pa ni snying po'i sngags dang las thams cad pa'i yang sngags so// /'od zer can ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ rdo rje gur gyi nang du gnas pa'i chos 'byung gi nang du gzhal yas khang ngo/ /kha cig gi
134b7(rgyud 'grel): lugs la chos 'byung med do/ /ri rab kyi steng du gzhal yas khang ngo zhes so/ /gzhal yas khang gi lte bar mchod rten gyi phug gi dkyil du sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'am nyi ma la g.yas bskum pa g.yon brkyang? pas gnas pa'i bcom
135a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das ma 'od zer can ma ser mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi cod pan can dbu skra la mchod rten gyi brgyan pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa rtsa ba'i zhal ser po g.yas dkar po g.yon zhal nag po
135a2(rgyud 'grel): phag pa'i zhal khros pas khro gnyer dang zur mig tu ldan pa/ ljags 'dril ba 'jigs par byed ma phyag drug ma g.yas pa rnams kyis mda' dang rdo rje dang khab 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis gzhu dang skud pa dang/ mya ngan med pa'i shing me
135a3(rgyud 'grel): tog dang bcas pa'i yal ga 'dzin pa'o/ /smad gos sngon po gyon pa stod g.yogs rnam par bkra ba'i gos sngon po can/ gser mdog lta bu'i phag pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa rang gi mdog lta bu'i phag pas yongs su bskor ba/ mya ngan med pa'i me
135a4(rgyud 'grel): tog gi phreng ba dbu la brgyan pa/ shar phyogs su arka ma si zhes bya ba me tog baM du ka'i mdog lta bu khab dang skud ba 'dzin pa g.yas g.yon gyi phyag go/ /lho ru marka ma sI zhes bya ba'i lha mo gser gyi mdog lta bu'i g.yas pas skud pa dang bcas pa'i
135a5(rgyud 'grel): khab dang/ g.yon pas mya ngan med pa'i shing gi yal ga 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu an+ta ra d+hA na ma sI ser mo ni g.yas pa mya ngan med pa'i yal ga g.yon pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du te dzo ma sI zhes bya ba sku mdog dmar
135a6(rgyud 'grel): po phyag gnyis kyis gzhu dang mda''dzin pa'o/ /me'i mtshams la sogs par u de ya ma sI dang/ gul ma ma sI dang/ ba na ma sI dang/ tsI ba ra ma sI rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du arka ma la sogs pa'i mdog dang phyag mtshan bzhin no/ /
135a7(rgyud 'grel): rim pa gnyis pa'i shar gyi snam bu la mahA tsI ba ra ma sI dang/ ba rA ha mu khi ni nag mo mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs su rung ba/ g.yas pa rdo rje lcags kyu dang g.yon pas rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /lho ru dA kra ma sI dang ba ra li ser mo ni g.yas
135b1(rgyud 'grel): pas mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang g.yon pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu pa ra kra ma sI dang bi da li dmar mo ni g.yas pa dang g.yon mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du a'ur ma ma sI dang/ bA ra li ljang gu khab dang skud pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa dang g.yon gyi phyag go/
135b2(rgyud 'grel): me'i mtshams su pa tA li dmar mo g.yas g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis khab dang skud pa 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du ba dA laM ser mo ni g.yas pa skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang g.yon pas yal 'dab dang bcas pa'i mya ngan med pa'i me tog gi chun po 'dzin
135b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rlung du ba rA? li sku mdog dkar mo g.yas pa dang g.yon pa gnyis kyis mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du bA rA ha mu khi dmar mo ni phyag gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor A lo dang tA lo dang
135b4(rgyud 'grel): kA lo dang sat tsa lo sam ba mu d+ha? DI rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu phyag gnyis ma rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrog dang/ dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /arka ma si la sogs pa'i lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi po
135b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams ni mngon par gsar du byung ba'i lang tsho can mchod rten gyis dbu la brgyan pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gos sngon pos stod g.yogs byas pa phag zhal cig ma phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa gser mdog lta bu'i pag
135b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang ldan pa gser mdog lta bu'i pag pa la cibs pa'o/ /sgo skyong ma rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la g.yon bskum pa g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa'o/ /gzhan nyi shu po ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang
135b7(rgyud 'grel): bas gnas pa'o/ /'od zer can ma'i rigs bdag rtag pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs la gnas pa rnams kyis mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams so/ /me la sogs pa'i phyogs bral
136a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams su yang de bzhin no kha cig go/ yang na dkar po rnams la rnam snang/ nag po rnams la mi bskyod pa/ ser mo rnams la rin chen 'byung ldan/ dmar mo rnams la snang mdza' / ljang gu rnams la don yod grub pa'o zhes pa ni
136a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan no/ /'od zer can gyi snying ga'i sa don ni mAM ngo/ /oM ma ri tsyai swAhA zhes pa ni snying po'i sngags so/ /oM mA ri tsyai hUM sarba big+ha nA notpA? da ya hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes pa ni las thams cad pa'i sngags so// //bsrung ba lnga'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi
136a3(rgyud 'grel): nang du ri rab kyi steng du gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte bar gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo ni 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can zhal bzhi pa phyag bcu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i
136a4(rgyud 'grel): zhal ser po g.yas dkar po nub sngon po g.yon dmar po'o/ /g.yas pa rnams kyi rin po che'i pa tra dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang mda' dang ral gri dang/ mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyi rdo rje dang zhags pa dang rtse
136a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa dang/ gzhu dang dgra sta dang dung rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /dbu la mchod rten gyis brgyan pa rdo rje'i skyil krung can ma'o/ /de'i shar phyogs su stong chen mo rab 'joms ma ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la rol pa'i kun nas skyong pas bzhugs
136a6(rgyud 'grel): pa sku mdog dkar po zla ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhal bzhi ma rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po g.yas sngon po rgyab ser po g.yon pa ljang gu'o/ /de'i g.yas pa rnams kyi pad+ma la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang mchog sbyin pa dang lcags
136a7(rgyud 'grel): kyu dang mda' dang ral gri rnams so/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub dang/ zhags pa dang gzhu dang dgra sta rnams so zhes bya ba'i phyag bcu'o /lho ru sna tshogs pad+ma dang/ nyi mar nyi ma'i 'od can gyi gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma chen
136b1(rgyud 'grel): mo ni rdo rje skyil krung can ma nag mo dang dkar po dang dmar po ni rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal lo/ /phyag bcu gnyis pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa/ gzhan rnam pa gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag
136b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya'o/ /g.yas pa'i gzhan rnams kyis rdo rje dang mda' dang/ mchog sbyin dang mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyi sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang/ gzhu dang rin po che'i pa tra dang pad+mas mtshan pa'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o//
136b3(rgyud 'grel): nub tu sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/ nyi ma'i 'od can gyi bsil ba'i tshal chen po ni dmar mo dmar pa dang dkar po dang nag po ni rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal lo/ /phyag brgyad pa'i g.yas rnams kyis pad+ma dang
136b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang mnga' dang rdo rje dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu dang/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang snying gar gnas pa'i pa ti 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du sna tshogs pad+ma
136b5(rgyud 'grel): dang zla ba la zla ba'i 'od can sems dpa' i skyil krung can/ rma bya chen mo ljang gu ni ljang gu dang nag po dang dkar po ni rtsa ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal lo/ /phyag brgyad ma g.yas pa rnams kyis rma bya'i gzhug sgro dang mnga' dang mchog sbyin dang ral gri'o//
136b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa rnams kyis lhung bzed la gnas pa'i dge slong dang gzhu dang pang du gnas pa'i bum pa rin po che 'bar ba 'bab pa can dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje la rin po ches mtshon pI rgyal mtshan 'dzin pO/ /rim pa gnyis pa la me'i mtshams su nag po ni phyag gnyis
136b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis dung 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du dus mtshan mo ser mo ni phyag gnyis kyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung gi mtshams su rna ba nag mo dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis dgra sta 'dzin pa'o// //dbang ldan gyi mtshams 
137a1(rgyud 'grel): su dkar mo sku mdog dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /bzhi po 'di rnams ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o/ /dgu po 'di dag ni rang na sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang gos dang rin po che'i cod pan can/ zhal re re la spyan
137a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsuM pa riM pa ji lta ba bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ mi bskyod ba dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang/ don yod grub pa dang/ mi bskyod pa dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang/ rnam par
137a3(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang rdo rje zhags pa ma dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang/ rdo rje dril bu ma rnams kyi yang sngar bzhin no/ /so sor 'brang ma la sogs pa rnams kyi
137a4(rgyud 'grel): sa bon ni praM ngo/ /oM ma Ni d+ha ri badzra Ni ma hA pra ti sa ri hUM hUM phaT phaT ces bya ba ni snying po'o/ /sa bon ni buM mo/ /oM A:ma hA sa hA swa pra ma ra da ni buM hUM snying po'o/ /sa bon ni hUM ngo/ /oM A:mahA man+tA nu sA ri Ni hUM hUM snying po'o/ /sa bon ni dzrAM ngo/ /oM A:
137a5(rgyud 'grel): ma hA shi ta ba ti dzri hUM snying po'o/ /sa bon ni maM ngo/ /oM mahA mA yu ra bidya rA dzA hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes pa snying po'o/ /dgos pa'i dbang gis 'di rnams gang yang rung bas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug ma bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug ma'i snying
137a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i sngags kyis ni las thams cad ba'i sngags kyang bya'o// //rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la/ rdo rje gur gyi nang du gling dang nye ba'i gling phran dang rgya mtsho dang ri bdun la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i ri rab kyi steng gzhal yas khang
137a7(rgyud 'grel): ste de'i dbus su seng+ge'i steng du sna tshogs ? pad+ma'i ze 'bru la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dkar po rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas pa nyi ma'i 'od can/ sangs rgyas ldas spras pa'i rang na'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i ral pa'i thor cog can
137b1(rgyud 'grel): ratna sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang gos dang ldan pa zhi ba'i zhal bzhi dkar po dang ser po dang/ dmar po dang ljang gu dang/ phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa gnyis kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya mdzad pa'o/ /gzhan gnyis kyis bsaM
137b2(rgyud 'grel): gtan gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas pa gnyis kyis bgrang phreng dang mda''dzin pa'o /g.yon pa gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /yang na 'di ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dang bcas pa'i byang chub mchog gi
137b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo langs pa la g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ba byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya'o/ /shar gyi 'dab ma la sems ma rdo rje ma sngon mo g.yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po 'dzin pa g.yon pas sdigs
137b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzub dang bcas pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor rin chen rdo rje ma ser mo g.yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i rin po che 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas sdigs par byed pa'i sdigs mdzub bo/ /nub tu chos kyi rdo rje ma dmar mo ni rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i
137b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa dkar dmar g.yas pas 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du las kyi rdo rje ma ljang gu g.yas pa sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog can 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas sdigs mdzub
137b6(rgyud 'grel): bsdigs par byed pa'o/ /de nas shar phyogs su blang po che'i dbang po'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar mi bskyod pa sngon po rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas pa/ phyag g.yas kyis gung mos rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po bzung nas sa gnon gyi tshul byed cing phyag
137b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa gan rkyal du pang du gzhag pa'o/ /shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po phyag g.yas pa'i gung mos snying gar 'gying ba'i tshul gyis rdo rje gsor ba'i sbyor ba'o/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i dril bu
138a1(rgyud 'grel): dkur brten pa'o/ /lhor rdo rje rgyal po ser po g.yas par gnas pa'i rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa'i tshul byed cing phyag g.yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /kha cig ni phyag gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pas 'gugs pa'i tshul
138a2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o/ /zhes so/ /byang du rdo rje chags pa dmar po phyag g.yon dang cig shos rnam pa gnyis kyis gzhu dang mda''dzin pa'o/ /nub tu legs pa mar gang kyi mdog lta bu rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis snying gar legs so sbyin pa'i tshul
138a3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o/ /lhor rta'i rgyab tu sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar rin chen 'byung ldan ser po rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ g.yas pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che gung mos bzung ste/ mchod sbyin gyi tshul byed pa/ g.yon pa mnyam gzhag go/
138a4(rgyud 'grel): shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje rin chen ser bo ni g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdza' gnyis la rdo rje gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'ching bar byed cing g.yon pas rdo rje dril bu bsnyems pa dang bcas pas
138a5(rgyud 'grel): bkur brten pa'o/ /lho ru rdo rje gzi brjid dmar po snying gar phyag gnyis kyiS 'dzin pa'i nyi mas gsal bar byed pa'o/ /byang du rdo rje tog ljang gu g.yon gyi bar du lhur gnas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing 'phyar
138a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /nub tu rdo rje gzhad pa dkar po g.yas pas so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas kyang de bzhin te so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje gnyis par gzhag pa'o/ /nub tu rma bya'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la snang ba mdza' 
138a7(rgyud 'grel): yas rdo rje skyil krung can dmar po phyag g.yon pa dang cig shos gan rkyal du byas pa pang pa'i steng du bzhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i g.yas pa'i gung mos rdo rjes mtshan pa'i pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje chos dmar skya g.yon
138b1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'gying ba'i tshul dang bcas pas pad+ma'i yu ba 'dzin cing g.yas pas kha 'byed pa'o/ /lho ru rdo rje gnon po nam mkha' lta bu sngon po g.yon pas thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa g.yas pas ral gri 'phyar ba'i tshul du 'dzin
138b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /byang du rdo rje rgyu gser btso ma'i mdog can g.yon par gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa g.yas pa'i gung mo mgal me lta bu bskor zhing chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu rdo rje bsrung ba dmar po g.yon pa chos kyi dung dang
138b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i lce 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du khyung gi steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar don yod grub pa ljang gu rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas pa'i gung mo sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul byed
138b4(rgyud 'grel): cing g.yon pa gan rkyal du pang par? bzhag pa'o/ /shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje las ljang gu g.yas pas snying gar bslang ba'i sbyor bas sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu dkur brten pa/ yang na
138b5(rgyud 'grel): lag pa gnyis kyi thal mo spyi bor sbyar nas sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor rdo rje bsrung ba ser po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje'i go cha 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du rdo rje gnod sbyin nag po phyag gnyis kyis mthe chung gnyis kyi rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon gyi
138b6(rgyud 'grel): rtse mo gnyis rang gi khar bcug pas gdug pa rnams bsdigs par byed pa'o/ /nub tu rdo rje? khu tshur? ser po khu tshur mtshams su rdo rje ste/ rdo rje khu tshur dag gis bzung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsdams pa'o/ /dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi me'i pad+ma la rdo rje sgeg?
138b7(rgyud 'grel): mo dkar mo rdo rje dkur brtan pa'i phyag rgya'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje gnyis 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du pad+ma la phreng ba ma ser mo phyag gnyis rang na'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du pad+ma la glu ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis pi wang gi rgyud bsgreng ba'o/ /
139a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan du pad+ma la gar ma ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyis bzung nas phyag gnyis kyis gar byed pa'o/ /dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi phyi ru snam pu la shar du pad+ma rnams la byams pa dang mthong ba don yod dang ngan song kun 'dren dang/
139a2(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad? 'joms pa'i blo gros rnaMs ni mi bskyod pa lta bu'o/ /lhor pad+ma rnams la spos kyi glang po dang/ dpa' bar 'gro ba dang/ nam mkha' mdzod dang/ ye shes rtog rnaMs rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu'o/ /nub tu pad+ma rnams la 'od dpag med dang/ zla ba'i 'od dang
139a3(rgyud 'grel): bzad skyong dang dra ba can gyi 'od rnams ni 'od dpag med lta bu'o/ /byang du pad+ma rnams la rdo rje snying po dang/ blo gros mi zad pa dang/ spobs pa rtsegs pa dang/ kun tu bzang po rnams ni don yod grub pa lta bu'o/ /yang na shar la sogs pa'i snam bu
139a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams la bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' i byams pa la sogs pa stong du bzhis mtshang ba bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i mtshan rnams mangs pas 'jigs pas ma bshad do// //me'i mtshams kyi pad+ma la rdo rje bdug spos ma dkar mo dang
139a5(rgyud 'grel): bden bral gyi pad+ma la rdo rje me tog ma ser mo dang/ rlung gi pad+ma la rdo rje mar me dkar dmar dang/ dbang ldan gyi pad+ma la rdo rje dri chab ma ljang gu'o/ /bdug spos ma la sogs pa 'di rnams gong bzhin du phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo'i pad+ma rnamS
139a6(rgyud 'grel): la rdo rje lcags kyu dang rdo rje zhags pa dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog dang/ rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams rim pa bzhin du dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu rnams ni gong bzhin du byag mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings las gzhan
139a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha rnams ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gos dang rang? na sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa rang na'i cod pan rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ma gtogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug la sngon du phyogs pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub
139b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' bcu drug ni/ rang gi rigs kyi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa la sngon du phyogs pa'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi lha rnams ni ji ltar gsungs pa'i lte ba dang 'dab ma rnams la gnas shing nyi ma'i 'od zer
139b2(rgyud 'grel): can no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga las gzhan pa'i lha bzhi bcu zhe brgyad ni sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings rnam par snang mdzad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid la
139b3(rgyud 'grel): rang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa'o/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i rigs kyi bdag pon? rnam par snang mdzad do/ /sems ma rdo rje ma dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
139b4(rgyud 'grel): la bzhi dang sgeg mo dang bdug spos ma dang byams pa la sogs pa bzhi dang/ rdo rje lcags kyu rnams kyis mi bskyod pa'o/ /rin chen rdo rje ma dang rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa bzhi dang/ phreng ba ma dang me tog ma dang spos kyi glang po la sogs pa bzhi dang rdo rje
139b5(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa rnams kyis rin chen 'byung ldan no/ chos kyi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje chos la sogs pa bzhi dang blu ma dang/ mar me ma dang/ 'od dpag med la sogs pa bzhi dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog rnams kyis snang ba mdza' yas so/ /las kyi rdo rje ma dang/ rdo rje las
139b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa bzhi dang/ gar ma dang dri chab ma dang/ rdo rje snying po la sogs bzhi dang rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams kyis don yod grub pa'o/ /'dir nang gi gzhal yas khang gi sgo rnams la'ang rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa sgo skyong bzhi bsgom par bya'o zhes rtso?
139b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan no/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying ga'i sa bon A:a sarba ta thA ga tA mahA yo gAM sho ra hUM zhes pa ni snying po'o/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM zhes pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin byi las thams cad pa'i sngags so/ /gang yang rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa'i rgyud gzhan gyis kyang
140a1(rgyud 'grel): lha'i rnam pa'i khyad par gsungs pa de ni 'dir mangs kyis dogs pas ma bshad do// //bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyis bdag nyid can/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang la sogs pa gzhal
140a2(rgyud 'grel): yas khang gi bar du dang por bshad pa'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no/ /'on kyang 'dir khro bo rnams ni 'og nas 'chad pa'i gzugs can no zhes pa ni phyogs gcig go/ rdo rje gur gyi nang na ri rab kyi steng na sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar gnas
140a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte bar gzhal yas khang zhes pa ni phyogs gnyis pa'o/ /phyogs gnyis ka la yang mchod rten dkar po'i nang du gzhal yas khang ngo/ /de'i lte ba la seng+ge'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la sems dpa' i skyil krung gis
140a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin 'jam pa'i rdo rje sku mdog gser btsom lta bu sdug cing yid du 'ong ba me tog sna tshogs kyi mdzes pa'i gtsug pud gsum gyis rnam par brgyan pa rtsa ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi
140a5(rgyud 'grel): zhal ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mchog sbyin dang mnga' dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang chu skyes sngon po dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /bdag lta bu'i rdo rje
140a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /de'i shar phyogs kyi le tshel glan po che'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la mi bskyod pa sngon po 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal sngon po dang dkar po
140a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dmar po phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa'i gung mos snying gar rdo rje gyen du bsgreng ba/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje dril bu dku la brten pa/ g.yas pa gzhan rnams kyis ral gri dang lcags kyu dang mnga' rnams so/ /g.yon pa
140b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis nu ma dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /lho ru rta'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la rin chen 'byung ldan ser po sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal lo/ /phyag drug
140b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya byas pa/ g.yas pa'i phyag gnyis gyis rin po che dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis kyi nu ma dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu rma bya'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la sems dpa' i skyil mo krung
140b3(rgyud 'grel): gis gnas pa'i snang ba mdza' yas dkar po dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal lo/ /phyag drug pa g.yon pa sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i pad+ma'i yu ba snying gar gzung ste/ g.yas paS kha 'byed pa'o g.yas pa gnyis kyis bgrang phreng dang rdo rje 'dzin
140b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /g.yon gnyis kyis nu ma dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du khyung gi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes rang nyi ma la don yod grub pa sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa kha dog dmar po dmar po dang sngon po dang dkar po rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi
140b5(rgyud 'grel): zhal lo/ /phyag drug pa dang po gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya bcing ba'o/ /g.yas gnyis kyis ral gri dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis kyis nu ma dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du spyan ma ser mo ni sems pa'i skyil
140b6(rgyud 'grel): krung can phyag brgyad ma g.yas pa rnams kyis mchog sbyin dang mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda''dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang/ rin po che'i snye ma dang bgrang phreng dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /med? mA
140b7(rgyud 'grel): ma kI sems dpa' i skyil krung can ma? sngon mo ni khro ba dang bcas pas rgod? pa phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda' dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdiD mdzub dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du gos
141a1(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo dmar mo ni phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis pad+ma dang bgrang phreng dang gzhu 'dzin cing 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o/ /rlung du sgrol ma mar gad lta bu'i mdog can
141a2(rgyud 'grel): ma sems dpa' i skyil krung gis gnas pa/ phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda''dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang utpa la dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su
141a3(rgyud 'grel): sems ma rdo rje ma dang rin chen rdo rje ma dang chos kyis rdo rje ma dang las kyis rdo rje ma rnams rim pa bzhin du sku mdog dang phyag dang phyag mtshan ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhin no/ /'on kyang nu ma 'dzin pa med pas sems ma rdo rje ma rin chen rdo rje
141a4(rgyud 'grel): ma las kyis rdo rje ma rnams sdigS mdzub 'dzin pa'o/ /chos kyi rdo rje ma ni zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du tsun da dkar mo zla ba'i mdog can phyag nyi shu rtsa drug ma rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis snying gar rtsa ba'i phyag rgya dang g.yas pa rnams kyis mi
141a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa dang ral gri dang rad na'i phreng ba dang pi dza pu ra dang mda' dang dgra sta dang mdung thung dang tho pa dang lcags kyu dang rdo rje dang ba dan gsum gyi tshul dang bgrang phreng ngo/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang pad+ma dang spyi blug dang zhags
141a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang gzhu dang shaka ti dang 'khor lo dang ral gri dang sdigs mdzub dang bum pa bzang po dang bi di pa la dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti'o/ /kan dzI ka'i stod g.yogs bcings pa bla gos phrag pa la gzar ba gar gyi nyams dbu'i rang bzhin rtsa
141a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i? zhal dkar po g.yas pa'i sngon po ljags mgul zhing mche ba bag tsam gtsigs pa/ g.yon pa ser po ma mchu mnan pa/ spal?  mo sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i tshigs par zlum po'i rnam par bzhag ste mthe bong gnyis mdzub
141b1(rgyud 'grel): mo'i rtsa ba'i logs la bzhag par bya ste/ snying gar gzhag pa 'di ni rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /mer ni rin chen skar mda' sor mo phyag drug pa gnyis kyis snying gar rin po che kha sbyor 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas pa gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang/ mda''dzin pa g.yon
141b2(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du khro gnyer tsan dkar mo phyag drug ma g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dar dbyug pa dang mda''dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyi sdigs mdzub dang spyi blugs dang/ gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /
141b3(rgyud 'grel): rlung du rdo rje lcags sgrog ma ljang gu phyag drug ma g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang mda''dzin pa g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang gzhung dzin pa'o/ /spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bcu gnyis po 'di rnams ni rol pa'i kun
141b4(rgyud 'grel): tu bskyod pa dang ldan pa zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing 'od dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can/ rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag po bzhin du zhal gsum pa'o/ /rim pa gsum po'i dkyil 'khor du shar gyi snam bu la byams pa gser gyi mdog lta
141b5(rgyud 'grel): bu phyag dang po gnyis tshas 'chad kyi phyag rgya dang/ g.yas pa mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang/ g.yon pa me tog dang bcas pa'i klu shing gi yal ga 'dzin pa'o/ /'jam dpal ni brjod zin pa'i gzugs can te/ khyad par du shes rab ma dang
141b6(rgyud 'grel): bral ba'o/ /spos kyi glang po ljang gu g.yon pas bum par gnas pa'i glang po che'i sna 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas kyis mchog sbyin no/ /ye shes tog ser po g.yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas mchog sbyin no/ /
141b7(rgyud 'grel): lho ru bzang skyong sku mdog dmar po/ /g.yon pa rang na 'dzin pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin no/ /blo gros rgya mtsho dkar po phyag gnyis kyis sor mo thams cad brgyad pas chu rlabs kyi tshul byed pa'o/ /blo gros mi zad pa gser mdog lta bu g.yon
142a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag ste/ g.yas pas mchog spyin no/ /spobs pa brtsegs pa ljang gu g.yon pas khu tshur mkhal khung du bzhag pa'o/ /g.yas pas se gol tog ba'o/ /nub tu mthu chen tho ba dkar po g.yon bas
142a2(rgyud 'grel): bag tsam kha phye ba'i pad+ma dkar po'o/ /g.yas pas mchob sbyin no/ /ngan song kun 'dren dkar po phyag gnyis kyis sdigs ba sbrug pa'i tshul lo/ /mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros gser gyi mdog lta bu phyag gnyis kha
142a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bsngabs pa'i tshul lo/ /dra ba can gyi 'od dmar po g.yon pas utpa lar gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas pas mchog sbyin no/ /byang du zla 'od sku mdog zla ba'i 'od lta bu g.yon pas utpa lar gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
142a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin no/ /'od dpag med dmar po phyag gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /nam mkha' mdzod sku mdog gser lta bus g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur 'gying bas dkur rten ba'o/ /g.yas pas nam mkha' 
142a5(rgyud 'grel): la bskor ba'o/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sngon po 'am dkar po g.yon pas sa la reg pa/ g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mthe 'od dang sdigs mdzub sbyar te/ dri ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o/ /byams pa la sogs pa'i byang
142a6(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' 'di rnams ni zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od can no/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa spyan gsum pa rang phyogs kyi bdag po bzhin du zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa/ phyag gnyis kyis mnyam gzhag gi
142a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya byas pa/ gnyis kyis gzhu dang mda''dzin pa'o/ /byams pa dang 'jam dbyangs gnyis la ni mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya med do/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha thams cad gos sna tshogs pa dang rin po che'i rgyan
142b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ral pa'i thor tshugs dang 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i zhal dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o/ /shar gyi sgor ma he'i steng du gshin rje mthar byed nag po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang rdo rje dang mnga' 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pas zhags pa dang
142b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub gyen du bsgrengs pas bsdigs par byed pa/ g.yon pa'i gnyis bas 'khyud pa'i lha mo'i nu ma 'dzin pa'o/ /de yang zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po g.yon pas pad+ma dkar po 'dzin pa phyag g.yas pas yang
142b3(rgyud 'grel): la 'khyud par brtson pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i gsum pas dngul gyi gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /mar gang lta bu'i lha mo ljang gu phyag gnyis ma g.yas utpa la sngon po 'dzin pa phyag g.yon pa yab kyi rke la 'khyud pas g.yas pas phyogs su brgyan pa/ zhal drug pa
142b4(rgyud 'grel): gsus pa 'phyang ba/ zhal drug ni sngon po rtsa ba'i zhal dgyes pa'i gang mos bzhad pa/ gnyis pas 'jigs par byed pa gsum pa'i zhal gdangs pa bzhi pa 'jigs su rung ba/ lnga pa rdo rje mche ba can/ drug pa mgo'i steng du gnas pa ljags
142b5(rgyud 'grel): mgul ba'o/ /yang na steng gi sngon po rtsa ba la sogs pa'i zhal rnams ni g.yas bskor gyis sngon po dang dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu rnams so/ /lho sgor gzhan gyis mi thub pa ser po ser po dang nag po dang dkar po rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon
142b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi zhal lo/ /phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug tho dang mnga' 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /nub du rta mgrin dmar po dmar po dang sngon po dang dkar po rtsa
142b7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ g.yas g.yon gyi zhal lo/ /phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug ba dang ka na ya dang mnga' rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ byang du bdud rtsi
143a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khyil pa sngon po rkang pas bgegs mnan pa/ phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang nga gra sta dang mnga' rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang
143a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan gyi mtshams su rang na'i ri bo'i steng du mi g.yo ba sngon po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang zhags pa dang mnga' 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon ngos su 'phyab?
143a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gos sngon po 'dzin pa'o/ /khrag gis rlan pa'i ljags mgul ba'i zhal gdangs pa'o/ /mer 'dod pa'i rgyal po sngon po phyag drug pa dang po gnyis kyis rang gis phyag rgya byas pa g.yas pa gnyis kyis rdo rje dang mda' dang g.yon pa gnyis nu ma dang
143a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis phan tshun rgyab sbyar te mche chung gnyis bsnol te sdigs mdzub gnyis phyir brkyang nas zhags pa'i tshul? byas pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /bden brel du dbyug pa sngon po sku mdog sngon po 'di phyag
143a5(rgyud 'grel): drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang mnga' / g.yen? pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhabs pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'i/ /rlung du stobs po che sngon po phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang ral gri
143a6(rgyud 'grel): dang mnga' o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang tho ba dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi steng du gnod mdzes rgyal po sngon po phyag drug pa phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings?
143a7(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yas pa gnyis kyis ral gri dang mnga' 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis kyis nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /'dir 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi mdzub mo gnyis gyen? du bsgreng ba ni gcod mdzes kyi phyag rgya'o/ /'og tu rdo rje sa 'og sngon
143b1(rgyud 'grel): po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang/ mda''dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis nu ma dang zhags pa dang bcas pa'i rtse gcig pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /bgegs mthar byed la sogs pa bdun po ni sngon po dang ser po
143b2(rgyud 'grel): dang dmar po rtsa ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gsum mo/ /khro bo bcu yang khros pa'i lta stangs can spyan dmar ba smin ma g.yo ba bag cam rtsa ba'i zhal kha phye ba/ g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs pa/ g.yon pa'i zhal ma mchu mnad pa mche ba
143b3(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs pa stag gi pags pas smad dang stod la gon pa thod pa'i phred bas dbu la brgyan pa/ dbu skra 'bar ba gyen la bcings shing 'khyil ba/ sma ra dmar ser rol pa'i kun du bskyod pa can/ klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ phud? kyi sgra
143b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrogs pa dang bcas pa'i gdengs ka can rnams kyis 'jigs pa sna tshogs pad+ma dang/ nyi ma'i gdan la g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa'o/ /gshin rje mthar byed ni g.yas brkyang ba 'am rdo rje skyil krung gis kyang bzhugs pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor
143b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di la gnod mdzes rgyal po'i gzugs kho nas rnam par gnas pa'i phyir gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ni dkyil 'khor nyid du tha dad du ma bshad de/ dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las rnal 'byor rgyas par bstan pa la'o/ /'bring por
143b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa la ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i spyi bo'i steng du rang na'i raM? la gnas pa'i pad+ma dang nyi ma la rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas pa'i gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ser po ser po dang sngon po dan dkar po rta ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal lo
143b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag brgyad pa'i phyag gnyis kyis mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya byas pa/ g.yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang bgrang phreng dang mnga' 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyi 'khor lo dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin
144a1(rgyud 'grel): po che'i rgyan can/ ral pa'i thor cog gi cod pan can gzhog gnyis su spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi po rnams kyis brgyan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de'i rjes su 'brangs nas rnal 'byor rgyas pa la yang gtsug tor 'khor los
144a2(rgyud 'grel): sgyur ba ni dkyil 'khor pa tha dad du dang de'i steng du gnod mdzes rgyal po shes par bya'o zhes pa ni kha cig go/ lha bzhi bcu zhe gsum po rnams kyang zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa'o/ /'dir nu ma 'dzin par bstan pa de yan mi bskyod pa
144a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa bzhi bdag lta bu'i shes rab ma la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams kyi'o/ /khro bo rnams kyis ni bdag lta bu'i shes rab ma g.yon ngos su gnas pa'i nu ma 'dzin pa'o/ /zhes shes par bya'o/ /gshin rje mthar byed las gzhan rnams
144a4(rgyud 'grel): la shes rab ma med kyang/ de'i nu mar 'dzin pa'i tshul gyi bdag gi nu mar 'dzin pa'o zhes pa ni gzhan no/ /'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin 'jam pa'i rdo rje chos kyi dbyings rnams par dag pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid lta bu'i rdo rje sems
144a5(rgyud 'grel): dpas rgyas btab pa/ me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang/ spyan ma dang tsun d+ha rnams la 'jam pa'i rdo rjes rgyas btab pa/ mA ma kI dang sems ma rdo rje ma dang byams
144a6(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs bzhi dang/ khro bo bcu la mi skyod pas rgyas btab pa/ rin chen rdo rje ma dang rin chen skar mda' na dang/ bzang skyong ma la sogs pa bzhi la rin 'byung gis rgyas btab pa/ gos dkar mo dang chos kyi rdo rje ma dang khro
144a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyer ma dang mthu chen thob la sogs pa bzhi la snang ba mdza' yas kyis rgyas btab pa/ sgrol ma dang las kyi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang/ zla 'od la sogs pa bzhi la don yod grub pas rgyas btab pa'o/ /'jam pa'i rdo
144b1(rgyud 'grel): rje'i thugs kar sa bon nu? tha'o?/ /oM A:zhes pa snying po'i sngags so/ /oM a mri ta kuN+Da li bigtan+ta ka hUM zhes pa las thams cad pa'i sngags so// //chos kyi dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur la sogs pa bsgom
144b2(rgyud 'grel): par rnam par bzhag pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no/ /khyad par du gsha'i lan? rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo rnams ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can no/ /mchod rten ni 'dir med do/ /gzhal yas khang gi lte ba la sna tshoD
144b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i the 'bru la gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la 'jam pa'i dbyangs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa nyi ma 'char ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang ldan pa sku mdog gser lta bu/ in+d+ra nI la lta bu'i gtsug phud dang ldan pa/
144b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'i cod pan gyi steng du sangs rgyas lnga dang rin po che'i cod pan can/ rad na sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs bsnams pa/ sgeg pa'i nyams kyi tshogs dang ldan pa/ ser po dang
144b5(rgyud 'grel): sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po ni rtsa ba dang g.yas dang nub dang g.yon gyi zhal lo/ /phyag brgyad pa'i phyag gnyis kyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'o/ /g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mda' dang rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon
144b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang gzhu dang do rje dril bu bsnams pa'o/ /'dab ma brgyad la gnas pa'i seng+ge'i steng du gnas pa'i pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su gtsug
144b7(rgyud 'grel): tor chen po dang gdugs dkar po dang gzi brjid phung po dang/ rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor rnams dang/ dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba dang 'phags pa dang cher 'phags pa dang rgyal ba rnams so/ /
145a1(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor brgyad po 'di rnams ni rdo rje skyil krung dang rin po che'i cod pan sku mdog ser po phyag gnyis pa'o/ /phyag g.yas pas 'khor lo gyen du bzung ba/ g.yon pas rang gi gdan la mnan pa rnams so/ /de nas shar gyi
145a2(rgyud 'grel): re mig gi dbus su glang po che'i rgyal po la mi bskyod pa sngon po/ /zhal bzhi pa rtsa ba'i zhal sngon po bag cem khro ba dang bcas pa'i rol pa dang? ldan pa g.yas pa dkar po kha gdangs pa drag po'o/ /nub kyi ser po dpa' po g.yon pa dmar po mche
145a3(rgyud 'grel): bas ma mchu mnan pa phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang rdo rje dang mnga' dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ rdo rje rgyal po dang rdo rje ?
145a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang rdo rje legs pa rnams kyi yongs su bskor ba'o/ /lto'i re mig dbus su rta mchog gi steng du rin chen 'byung ldan ser po ser po dang/ nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri
145a5(rgyud 'grel): dang mda' dang lcags kyu'o/ g.yon pa rnams kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang rdo rje dril bu dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje rin chen dang rdo rje nyi ma dang rdo rje tog dang rdo rje bzhad pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /nub kyi
145a6(rgyud 'grel): re mig gi dbus su rma bya'i steng du snang ba mdza' yas dmar po dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po dang ser po'i zhal bzhi'o/ /phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams kyi rdo rje dang mnga' dang ral gri dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis pad+ma dang
145a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhu dang zhags pa dang/ dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje chos dang rdo rje rnon po dang/ rdo rje rgyu dang rdo rje bsrung ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /byang gi re mig gi dbus su khyung gi steng du don yod grub pa ljang gu zhal bzhi pa rtsa ba'i zhal
145b1(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu mche ba gtsigs pa g.yas ser po zhi ba/ nub dmar po sgeg pa dang bcas ba/ g.yon dkar po zhi ba phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang rdo rje dang mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa rnams kyi sdigs mdzub
145b2(rgyud 'grel): dang dril bu dang gzhu dang/ zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje las dang rdo rje bsrung ba dang rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang rang gi chibs kyi steng du sna
145b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ rang na sna tshogs dang gos kyis brgyan pa rin po che'i cod pan can no/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bcu drug po 'di rnams ni dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su
145b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla pa'i gdan la gnas pa rdo rje dbyings kyis dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang bzhin can rnams so/ /'di dag kyang phyogs su gnas pa'o/ /zhes pa'i phyogs kyang yod do/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams la
145b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la sems dpa' i skyil krung can/ sangs rgyas spyan ma dang mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang mi bskyod pa dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang
145b6(rgyud 'grel): don yod grub pa lta bu'o/ /shar gyi sgo ru rdo rje lcags kyu dmar ser rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ g.yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa'o/ /lho ru rdo rje zhags pa ser po rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin pa g.yon brkyang gis gnas pa'o/ /nub tu rdo rje lcags
145b7(rgyud 'grel): sgrog dmar po rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag gnyis kyis 'dzin pa sa ga'i stang stabs kyis gnas pa'o/ /byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang gu phyag gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa/ zlum pa'i stang stabs kyis gnas pa'o/ /bzhi po 'di
146a1(rgyud 'grel): dag sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa sma ra dmar ser dang ldan pa klu chen brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor 'di las dkyil
146a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gnyis pa la/ shar gyi phyogs kyis dbang ldan nas brtsams nas g.yas bskor du rim pa bzhin du sa bcu gnyis kyi lha mo rnams zhal cig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas pa thams cad kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rang rang gi
146a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /de la mos pa spyod pa'i sa ma pad+ma bzhin du dmar pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rab tu dga' ba dmar po yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa'o/ /dri ma med ma dkar mo chu skyes dkar po 'dzin pa'o/ /'od byed ma
146a4(rgyud 'grel): dmar mo sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /'od 'phro ma mar ga ta lta bu'i mdog utpa la sngon po 'dzin pa'o/ /sbyang dka' ma ser mo pang par gnas pa'i phyag gan rkyal gyis mar ga ta'i nor bu bsnams pa'o/ /mngon
146a5(rgyud 'grel): du gyur pa'i sa ma gser gyi mdog can pa'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa'o/ /ring du song ba ma nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /mi g.yo ba ma ston ka'i zla
146a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mdog lta bu zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar pos mtshan pa'i pad+ma'i yu ba 'gying ba dang bcas pas 'dzin pa'o/ /legs pa'i blo gros ma dkar mo ral gris mtshan pa'i utpa la 'dzin pa'o/ /chos kyi sprin ma ser mo
146a7(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi sprin gyis yongs su bskor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa'o/ /kun tu 'od ma nyi ma phyed kyi nyi ma'i mdog can pad+ma'i steng du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par byed pa'i bde bar gshegs pa'i sku
146b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs 'dzin pa'o/ /lho? ru pha rol tu phyin ma bcu gnyis ni phyag gnyis pa g.yas pa thams cad kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pas rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ni phyag gnyis kyis lhag pa'o/ /de la rin po che pad+ma'i pha rol tu
146b2(rgyud 'grel): phyin ma dmar mo pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ma dkar dmar gyi mdog can 'dras so ba'i snye ma sna tshogs 'dzin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
146b3(rgyud 'grel): phyin ma dkar mo mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang bcas pa'i me tog gi chun po 'dzin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ma ser mo chu skyes dkar mo 'dzin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin ma mar ga ta lta bu'i mdog can utpa la sngon po 'dzin pa'o/ /
146b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs pad+ma dkar po 'dzin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma gser mdog lta bu yid du 'ong ma pad+ma la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin ma/ phyag gnyis kyis
146b5(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'o/ /thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin ma me tog pri yang ku lta bu ljang gu pad+ma ser po la gnas pa'i ral gri dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin ma utpa la sngon po'i mdog can utpa la sngon
146b6(rgyud 'grel): po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /stobs kyis pha rol tu phyin ma dmar mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa'o/ /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dkar mo rang na sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bus brgyan pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi yal
146b7(rgyud 'grel): ga 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ni sku mdog sna tshogs pa utpa la sngon po la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu dbang bcu gnyis ma ni phyag gnyis g.yas pa rnams kyis pad+ma 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa rnams kyi
147a1(rgyud 'grel): snyems pas rang rang gi phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o/ /de la tshe la dbang ba ma ni dkar dmar? gyi mdog can nor bu pad+ma ra ga la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can gyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sku 'dzin pa'o/ /sems la dbang ba ma ni dkar
147a2(rgyud 'grel): mo rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po 'dzin pa'o/ /yo byad la dbang ba ma ni ser mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /las la dbang ba ma ni ljang khu sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /skye ba la dbang tha ma ni sku mdog sna tshogs ma me tog 'dza' ti kha dog
147a3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pa'i yal 'dab 'dzin pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba ma ni nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /mos pa la dbang ba min pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba'i pri yang ku'i me tog gi snye ma 'dzin pa'o/ /
147a4(rgyud 'grel): smon lam la dbang ba ma ni ser mo utpa la sngon po 'dzin pa'o/ /ye shes la dbang bam sngon mo utpa la sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /chos la dbang ba ma sku mdog dkar mo pad+ma la gnas pa'i bum pa bzang po 'dzin pa'o/ /de bzhin
147a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid ma dkar mo phyag g.yas pas pad+ma dkar po 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rdo rje rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma gser bzhu ba lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yas kyis pad+ma ser po la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa'o/
147a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi steng du 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du gzugs ma bcu gnyis ni phyag gnyis ma g.yas pa rnams kyis sna tshogs rdo rje dang g.yon pa snyems pa dang bcas pas rang rang gi mtshan ma 'dzin pa ste/
147a7(rgyud 'grel): de la dbyig gi blo gros ma ser mo 'bras kyi snye ma 'dzin pa'o/ /rin chen dkar mda' ma dmar mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dkar mo nor bu zla ba chu shel gyi bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /'od zer can dkar
147b1(rgyud 'grel): dmar skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab 'dzin pa'o/ /ri khrod lo ma can ljang khu rma bya'i mjug sgro 'dzin pa'o/ /dug sel ma dkar mo dug gi me tog gi chun po 'dzin pa'o/ /sgo mdza' yas ma me tog pri yang ku ltar ljang khu chu skyes dmar po la gnas pa'i mi zad
147b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gter chen po'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /tsun d+ha ma dkar mo bgrang phreng 'phyang ba'i ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /shes rab 'phel ma dkar mo utpa la sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /las dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ma
147b3(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu ste rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i pad+ma dkar dmar 'dzin pa'o/ /ye shes mi zad pa'i za ma tog dmar mo rad na'i za ma tog 'dzin pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod ma ser mo pad+ma la gnas pa'i rad na sna tshogs kyi dpe sgrom 'dzin pa'o/ /
147b4(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs kyi sgor chos so so yang dag par rig pa ma sku mdog dkar dmar phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor don so so yang dag par rig ma pad+ma rA ga'i mdog can phyag g.yon gyis rin po che'i zhags pa
147b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o/ /nub kyi sgor nges pa'i tshigs so so yang dag par rig pa dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis? mdza' gnyis su pad+mas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog 'dzin pa'o/ /byang gi sgor spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ma ma ra ka ta lta bu ljang gu phyag gnyis
147b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /me'i mtshams su sgeg mo ser mo sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje gnyis 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du phreng ba ma dmar ser phyag gnyis kyis rang na'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du glu ma
147b7(rgyud 'grel): dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis pi wang bsgreng ba'o/ /dbang ldan du gar ma ljang khu phyag gnyis kyis gar byed pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /mos pas spyod pa'i sa la sogs pa'i lha mo 'di rnams thams cad ni rang
148a1(rgyud 'grel): na'i rgyan sna tshogs dang gos dang rad na'i cod pan dang ldan pa dang cung zad 'dzum ba dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /khyad par du sgo
148a2(rgyud 'grel): skyong ma rnams ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'o/ /gzhan de rnams kyang zla ba la gnas pa'o zhes so/ /dkyil 'khor gsum pa dbang ldan nas brtsams nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams te/ de la shar phyogs kyi snam bu la kun tu bzang
148a3(rgyud 'grel): po ser po phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin/ g.yon pas utpa la la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /blo gros mi zad pa ser po g.yas pa ral gri dang g.yon pas mi 'jigs pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /sa'i snying po ser po g.yas pas sa gnon
148a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing 'dzin pa'o/ /nam mkha' i snying po ljang khu g.yas pas rang na sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa/ g.yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi snam bul?
148a5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' mdzod ser po g.yas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas bum pa bzang po la 'phyang ba'i dpag bsam gyi shing 'dzin pa'o/ /phyag na rin chen ljang khu phyag g.yas pas rin po che dang g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas
148a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho dkar po g.yas dung dang g.yon pas rdo rje ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje snying po utpa la sngon po'i lo ma lta bu'i mdog can g.yas pas rdo rje dang g.yon pas mdo sde sa bcu pa'i po ti 'dzin
148a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /nub tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug g.yas pas mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya g.yon pas chu skyes dkar po 'dzin pa'o/ /mthu chen thob ser po g.yas pas ral gri g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /zla 'od dkar po g.yas paS rdo rje 'khor
148b1(rgyud 'grel): lo dang g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /dra ba can gyi 'od dkar dmar g.yas pas ral gri dang g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du 'od dpag med dkar po g.yas na sna tshogs pad+ma
148b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i buM pa 'dzin pa'o/ /spobs pa brtsegs pa ser po g.yas pas se gol g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros gur kum lta bu g.yas
148b3(rgyud 'grel): pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang g.yon pas shag ti 'dzin pa'o/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sngon bo g.yas pas ral gri g.yon pas sna tshogs rdo rje mtshan pa'i ba dan 'dzin pa'o/ /bcu drug po 'di dag ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
148b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa rin po che'i cod pan can rin po che dang na bza' sna tshogs pas brgyan pa zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa rnams so/ /shar sgor ma he la gshin rje mthar byed nag po zhal drug pa gsus pa dpyad ba zhabs ?
148b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug gi g.yas pa rnams kyis lcags kyu dang ral gri dang mda''dzin pa/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang dril bu dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /zhal dang zhabs rnams kyi bye brag gong bzhin no/ /lho phyogs sgor
148b6(rgyud 'grel): shes rab mthar byed ser po zhal bzhi pa rtsa ba'i zhal sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i g.yas gdangs pa/ nub drag po chen po g.yon zhi ba yang na 'di rnams ni go rims ji lta bas ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang ljang khu rnaMs so/ /'di ni phyag brgyad pa g.yas
148b7(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyi zhags pa dang rdo rje dang ral gri dang mnga' rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis snying kar lcags kyu dang rdo rje dril bu dang mdung dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu pad+ma mthar byed dmar po zhal bzhi dmar ba sgeg pa dang drag po dang 
149a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhad pa dang zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan pa ni/ rtsa ba dang g.yas dang rgyab dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams so/ /yang na 'di rnams ni dmar po dang nag po dang ser po dang dkar po rnams so/ phyag brgyad pa phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags
149a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrog 'dzin pa phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda''dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /gsum po 'di dag ni rol pa'i kun tu bskyod pas gnas pa'o/ /
149a3(rgyud 'grel): byang du bgegs mthar byed sngon po zhal bzhi sngon po 'am yang na sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang khu rnams so /phyag brgyad pa gnyis kyis rdo rje bsdams pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje dril bu dang g.yas pa rnaMs ni ral gri dang? mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis ?
149a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /tshogs kyi bdag po g.yon brkyang bas kun nas mnan nas bzhugs pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi mtshams su 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba sngon po zhal bzhi sngon po rtsa
149a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i zhal khro ba dang bcas pa'i sgeg pa g.yas drag po rgyab dpa' ba g.yon mi sdug pa'o/ /yang na 'di dag sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams so/ /'di ni phyag brgyad pa phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu dang ldan

149b4(rgyud 'grel): dang dril bu dang ba dan dang bcas pa'i kha TwAM? 'dzin pa'o/ /phyag gnyis kyis pags pa rlung gis gos 'dra ba 'dzin pa'o/ /chung ma dang bcas pa'i tshangs pa g.yon brkyang baS mnan nas gnas pa'o/ /rlung du rta mchog ljang khu ljang gu'i zhal
149b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa rtsa ba khro ba dang bcas pa'i sgeg pa g.yas pa drag po g.yon pa'i zhal tshangs pa lta bu ste/ yang na ni 'di ni ljang gu dang sngon po dang dkar po rnams te/ spyi bor rta mgo ljang gu'o/ /'di ni phyag brgyad pa g.yas dang po sna tshogs rdo rje

149b7(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma gsum gyis shag ti dang dbyug pa dang gzhu rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /zhabs g.yon bskum pa g.yas brkyang ba dang g.yas bskum zhing g.yon brkyang ba'i zhabs bzhi'o/ /g.yas dang po gcig gis dbang po dang dpal mo gnyis pas
150a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' mo dang tshim mo/ /g.yon pa gcig gis dbang po dang sbrang rtsir byed pa dang/ gnyis pas rgyal bar byed pa dang/ dpyid kyi lha mnan nas gnas pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i steng du nam mkha' la gtsug tor 'khor
150a2(rgyud 'grel): los sgyur ba ser po zhal bzhi ser ba 'am yang na ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po'o/ /phyag brgyad pa'i g.yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang lcags kyu dang ral gri dang mda'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang zhags pa dang bgrang
150a3(rgyud 'grel): phreng dang gzhu bsnams pa/ rol pa'i kun tu bskyod pas gnas pa'o/ /'og tu gnod mdzes rgyal po nag po zhal bzhi pa drag po dang zhi ba dang/ bzhad pa dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i nag po'o/ /yang na zhal bzhi ni nag po dang

153b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdog can chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'o/ /shar gyi rtsibs la rdo rje gtsug tor dkar pos gnon gyi phyag rgya can no/ /lho'i rtsibs la rin chen gtsug tor sngon po mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa'o/ /nub kyi rtsibs la pad+ma gtsug tor dmar

153b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros dkar ser 'dres pa'i mdog can phyag g.yas dbyug pa 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi snam bu la spos kyi glang po dkar po ljang
154a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyis dri'i dung phor 'dzin pa/ g.yon bas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba dkar po g.yas pas ral grig yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /nam mkha' mdzod dkar ser g.yas pas pad+ma la
154a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /ye shes rtog sngon po phyag g.yas kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa g.yon pa khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /nub kyi snam bu la bdud rtsi'i 'od dkar po
154a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas cod pan gyi steng du bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /zla ba'i 'od dkar po g.yas pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /bzang skyod dkar po
154a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas rin po che 'bar ba dang bcas pa 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /dra ba can gyi 'od dmar po g.yas bas rdo rje'i gur 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /byang gi snam bu la rdo rje snying po sde skya g.yas
154a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang bcas pa'i utpa la sngon po 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /blo gros mi zad pa dkar po phyag gnyis kyis bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /spobs pa brtsegs pa dmar po g.yas pas chu skyes la gnas pa'i ra? na
154a6(rgyud 'grel): brtsegs pa bsnams pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /kun tu bzang po gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas bas rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs pa rnams la me tog ma
154a7(rgyud 'grel): dang bdug spos ma dang mar me ma dang/ dri chab ma rnams ni dkar mo dang nag mo dang dmar mo dang ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis me tog la sogs pa 'dzin pa'o/ /shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu dkar po phyag gnyis kyis lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /lho ru
154b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje zhags pa sngon po phyag gnyis kyis zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /lha sum cu so bdun po
154b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag kyang gos sna tshogs dang rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par rang na'i cod pan can zhal gcig spyan gnyis pa phyag gnyis pa sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /'dir rnam par snang mdzad
154b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po ni rang nyid dang mtshungs pa'i rnam snang gis rgyas btab pa'o/ /rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa bzhi la rnam par snang mdzad chen pos so/ /shar gyi phyogs dang me'i mtshams na gnas pa'i lha rnams la rdo rje gtsug tor gyis so/ /lho phyogs dang bden
154b4(rgyud 'grel): bral gyis mtshams na gnas pa rnams la rin chen gtsug tor gyis so/ /nub phyogs dang rlung gi mtshams na gnas pa rnams la pad+ma gtsug tor gyis so/ /byang phyogs dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams na gnas pa rnams la sna tshogs gtsug tor gyis so//
154b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dir phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gnas kyi snam bu la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa brgyad po lta'o zhes rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir 'dod yon gyi snam bu rnams la byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug dgod par mi rigs so/ /'ga' zhig ni
154b6(rgyud 'grel): nang gi dkyil 'khor zhes rgyud du gsungs pas phyi rol gyi gzhal yas khang gi nang du gzhal yas khang gnyis pa'o zhes smra'o/ /'ga' zhig tu ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgu gtsug tor dang bcas pa
154b7(rgyud 'grel): dge slong gi cha lugs 'dzin par gsungs so/ /pad+ma'i phreng bas yongs su bskor ba dang/ khor yug gi nang du dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams nas g.yas skor gyis mgrin pa sngon po la sogs pa bskyed par bya ste/ de la dbang ldan
155a1(rgyud 'grel): du glang la mgrin pa sngon po dkar po mchod phyir thogs pa can phyag g.yaS gnyis na rdo rje dang mchod sbyin gyi phyag rgya g.yon gnyis na rtse gsum pa dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /mgrin sngon ma mgrin pa sngon po lta bu'o/ /nam mkha' lding la khyab
155a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jug nag po g.yas gnyis na dbyug tho dang rdo rje/ g.yon gnyis na dung dang 'khor lo'o/ /gser gyi rdo rje ma khyab 'jug lta bu khyad par gser gyi mdog can no/ /rma bya la rdo rje dril bu zhal drug pa dmar ba g.yas pa gnyis na shag ting nge rdo rje
155a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa gnyis na khyim bya dang rdo rje dril bu'o/ /rdo rje gzhon nu ma rdo rje dril bu lta bu'o/ /dang pa la mi smra rdo rje ser po zhal bzhi pa g.yas pa gnyis na rdo rje dang sngags bzla ba'i phreng ba g.yon pa gnyis na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs so/ /rdo rje zhi ba ma
155a4(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa lta bu'o/ /glang po che mche ba drug pa'i dbang po dkar po dang zla ba la rdo rje mtshon cha dkar po rol ba'i kun tu bskyod pas gnas pa phyag g.yas na rdo rje rtse lnga pa g.yon pas rdo rje rtse gsum dkur brten pa'o/ /lha mo rdo rje khu tshur ma ni rdo
155a5(rgyud 'grel): rje mtshon cha ji lta ba'o/ /rta bdun gyi shing rta la rdo rje 'khyil pa dmar po khros pa g.yas pan pad+ma g.yon pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi ma rdo rje 'khyil pa bzhin no/ /dad ba la rdo rje 'od dkar po khro bo phyag
155a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje mdog ma rdo rje 'od lta bu'o/ /ral rdo rje dmar ser khro bo g.yas kyis rdo rje dmar po 'dzin cing g.yon pas mi bzung nas za ba'i tshul lo/ /rdo rje skar Da ma rdo rje dmar ser
155a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /pad+ma la rdo rje zhi ba khro bo ser po mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje zhi ba ma rdo rje zhi ba ma rdo rje zhib bzhin no/ /sbal ba la rdo rje bla ma khro bo ser po g.yas bgrang gleng dang g.yon spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje bla ma ma rdo rje bla ma bzhin no/ /pad+ma la rdo rje
155b1(rgyud 'grel): pa wa? sangs khro bo dkar po g.yas na bgrang phreng dang g.yon na spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje pa wa sangs ma rdo rje pa wa sangs bzhin no/ /rus sbal la rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo nag po g.yas pa na rdo rje g.yon pa na dbyag ba'o/ /rdo rje dbyug pa ma ni rdo rje dbyug pa dang 'ang?
155b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /rdo rje sgra gcan khro bo 'mar nag g.yas pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang g.yon pas nyi ma 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje lha min ma rdo rje sgra gcan dang 'dra ba'o/ /rdo rje mjug rings khro bo mdog nag po g.yas pas ral gri g.yon pas sprul zhags 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje
155b3(rgyud 'grel): glu ma rdo rje mjug rings bzhin no/ /bzhi po 'di dag dang rdo rje zhi ba la sogs pa drug rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa ltar bdag gis bris so/ /glang po che la rdo rje glang sna dkar po g.yas rdo rje g.yon pas gshol 'dzin pa'i/ /rdo rje 'dul ba ma rdo rje glang
155b4(rgyud 'grel): sna bzhin no/ /de'i khyad par ni g.yon pas kha TwAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /bya ko li la'i shing rta la rdo rje phreng ba can ljang gu g.yas pa na rdo rje g.yon pa na me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje brtan ma rdo rje phreng ba ji lta ba las khyad par ni phyag g.yon pa na mdud do//
155b5(rgyud 'grel): ne tso'i shing rta la rdo rje dbang can ser po g.yas na rdo rje/ g.yon pa na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje dbang can ma rdo rje dbang can dang 'dra'o/ /khyad par ni sku mdog dmar ba'o/ /sbal ba la rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba dkar po rdo rje dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /
155b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gdan ma rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba dang 'dra ba'o/ /me tog la rdo rje gtun shing ser po g.yas g.yon gyis rdo rje dang gtun shing 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje pho nya mo rdo rje gtun shing lta bu'o/ /khyad par ni g.yon pas kha TwAM 'dzin pa'o/ /ral rdo rje me dmar po
155b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas gnyis kyis rdo rje dang go cha g.yon gnyis dbyug to dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje 'bar ma rdo rje mi lta bu'o/ /ma he la rdo rje nag po sku mdog nag po rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o /ro langs la rdo rje nag po sku mdog nag mo rdo rje dang kha
156a1(rgyud 'grel): TwAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /klu ltag pa la rdo rje lcags kyu sngon po phag pa'i zhal rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /mi la rdo rje gdong ma sngon mo phag gdong rdo rje dang ral gri 'dzin ba'o/ /chu srin la rdo rje klu dkar po sbrul mgo brgyud dang
156a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa g.yas pas rdo rje g.yon pas klu'i zhags pa'o/ /chu srin la rdo rje chu srin ma dkar mo sbrul mgo brgyad dang ldan pa g.yas pas rdo rje dang g.yon pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i chu srin 'dzin pa'o/ /ri dags la rdo rje rlung sngon po g.yas pas rdo rje g.yon pas
156a3(rgyud 'grel): rlung sgrib pa'i gos 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje shugs can ma rdo rje rlung lta bu'o/ /ro langs la rdo rje 'jigs byed sngon po rdo rje dang dbyug to 'dzin ba'o/ /rdo rje rnam par rtsigs ma rdo rje 'jigs byed lta bu'o/ /khyad par ni g.yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o//
